T02TD1401E:1b-1: s'a dha na ni d'a na shr'i tsakra samba ra n'a ma panytsi k'a / bod skad du /
T02TD1401E:1b-2: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dka' 'grel sgrub pa'i thabs kyi gleng gzhi zhes bya ba /
T02TD1401E:1b-3: bcom ldan 'das [dd] dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1401E:1b-4: mgon po sku gsum bde ba'i bdag / he ru ka dpal la btud de //
T02TD1401E:1b-5: bla ma brgyud rim las 'ongs pa //
T02TD1401E:1b-6: dad pas cung zad bri bar bya //
T02TD1401E:1b-7: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni //
T02TD1401E:1b-8: rgyud 'di rgyud gzhan gyi mtha' dang yang dag par ldan pa ste /
T02TD1401E:1b-9: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni sngon gyi rgyud la ltos pa yin no //
T02TD1401E:1b-10: 'dis ni rgyud 'di bar chad med par gsal bar byed do //
T02TD1401E:1b-11: gang gi phyir 'bum phrag gsum pa zhes bya bar 'di skad bdag gis zhes gsungs te /
T02TD1401E:1b-12: de nyid kyis na dang po gleng gzhi'i tshig rab tu sbyor ba med de sngon rab tu sbyar ba'i phyir /
T02TD1401E:1b-13: rgyud ces bya ba ni rab tu 'brel pa ste /
T02TD1401E:1b-14: rgyu'i rgyud dang thabs kyi rgyud dang 'bras bu'i rgyud do //
T02TD1401E:1b-15: rgyu'i rgyud ni rigs te 'dir shin tu rnyed par dka' ba'i sgrub pa po nyid do //
T02TD1401E:1b-16: thabs kyi rgyud ces bya ba ni /
T02TD1401E:2a-0: sngon du dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa'i rim pas @2a * //
T02TD1401E:2a-5: sngags kyi rab tu sbyor ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1401E:2a-6: 'bras bu'i rgyud ces bya ba ni gnyis su med pa gsal ba gcig tu gnas pa ste /
T02TD1401E:2a-7: ngag gi spyod yul ma yin pa dang /
T02TD1401E:2a-8: sems kyi yul las ring ba nyid do //
T02TD1401E:2a-9: rab tu 'brel ba de ji lta bu zhe na /
T02TD1401E:2a-10: gang 'dir sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams gnas pa'o zhes bya ba'i don te /
T02TD1401E:2a-11: 'di'i phyag rgya ni yi ge aa'o //
T02TD1401E:2a-12: aas sdom pas na yi ge thams cad aa las byung ba'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD1401E:2a-13: dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las kyang /
T02TD1401E:2a-14: snying ga'i dbus na mi shigs pa //
T02TD1401E:2a-15: rab tu 'bar ba mar me bzhin //
T02TD1401E:2a-16: mi 'gyur mchog tu phra ba yi //
T02TD1401E:2a-17: aa ni gtso bo dam pa'o //
T02TD1401E:2a-19: yang brtag pa'i rgyal po gnyis pa las /
T02TD1401E:2a-20: lte bar phyag rgya chen po gnas //
T02TD1401E:2a-21: 'bar ba mar me'i rtse lta bu //
T02TD1401E:2a-22: dbyangs yig dang po'i rang bzhin te //
T02TD1401E:2a-23: blo zhes sangs rgyas rnams kyis brtag / ces gsungs so //
T02TD1401E:2a-24: de phyir zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1401E:2a-25: yi ge aa las bshad pa thams cad 'byung ba'o zhes bya bar spyar ro //
T02TD1401E:2a-27: gsang ba zhes bya ba la 'di'i rigs rnams gsal bar ma byas pa'o //
T02TD1401E:2a-28: gsal bar ma byas pa de ci zhe na /
T02TD1401E:2b-1: de nyid gsal bar bshad pa ste /
T02TD1401E:2b-2: gsang ba de nyid yul dang ni //
T02TD1401E:2b-4: gsang ba sbas pa bden pa ste //
T02TD1401E:2b-5: gsang ba gsang ba'i padma ste //
T02TD1401E:2b-6: gsang ba sa bon gyis dga' ba //
T02TD1401E:2b-7: gsang ba thams cad 'dus pa ste //
T02TD1401E:2b-8: gsang ba bar chad med bde ba'o //
T02TD1401E:2b-10: mdor bsdus pa'o zhes bya ba ni yang dag par bsdu pa ste gzhung gi tshad la bya'o //
T02TD1401E:2b-12: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang sdud par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1401E:2b-13: de nyid ni sdom pa ste /
T02TD1401E:2b-14: sdom pa zhes bya ba ni thams cad 'dzin zhes bya ba'i don no //
T02TD1401E:2b-15: dpal he ru ka yang dag sbyor //
T02TD1401E:2b-17: dpal he ru ka ni bdag nyid do //
T02TD1401E:2b-18: rdo rje phag mo ni phyag rgya ste /
T02TD1401E:2b-19: de dag gi yang dag par sbyor ba ni phyag rgya chen po'i mtshan nyid do //
T02TD1401E:2b-20: 'dod par bya bas na 'dod pa ste /
T02TD1401E:2b-21: 'dod pa'i don phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T02TD1401E:2b-22: 'dis sangs rgyas nyid dang rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid sgrub par byed pas na 'dod pa'i don kun nas sgrub par byed pa'o //
T02TD1401E:2b-24: bla ma las kyang bla ma ste //
T02TD1401E:2b-25: zhes bya ba la bla ma'i don gsungs te /
T02TD1401E:2b-26: sems can mos pa sna tshogs pa'i bsam pa'i dbye ba'i dbang gis 'jig tshogs la lta ba dag par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong dag bstan to //
T02TD1401E:2b-27: de las kyang bla mar gyur pa nyid snying la gnas pa'i de kho na nyid bla na med pa ste /
T02TD1401E:2b-28: rdo rje can dang bcas pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis so so rang gis rig pa'i rang bzhin nyid tshig gi lam las 'das pa nyid do //
T02TD1401E:2b-30: bskal pa bye ba brgyar yang ni //
T02TD1401E:2b-32: zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
T02TD1401E:2b-33: mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom //
T02TD1401E:2b-34: zhes bya ba ni 'khor phun sum tshogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1401E:2b-38: na ma mkhar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD1401E:2b-39: d'a zhes bya ba'i sgra la gsungs pa'o //
T02TD1401E:2b-40: aa ka ni gya gyur 'gro ba ste /
T02TD1401E:2b-41: 'dir thams cad du 'gro ba ni gya gyur 'gro ba'o //
T02TD1401E:2b-42: des na nam mkhar 'gro ba'i ngang tshul 'di la yod pas na mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya ste /
T02TD1401E:3a-0: bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi sku'i rdzu 'phrul gyis thams @3a * //
T02TD1401E:3a-1: cad du cig car 'gro bas zhes bya ba'i don no //
T02TD1401E:3a-2: de rnams kyi dra ba ste /
T02TD1401E:3a-3: tshogs zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD1401E:3a-4: sngom pa ni bde ba'i mchog ste /
T02TD1401E:3a-5: de rnams kyi lhan cig tu skad cig re re la bde bas yang dag par tshim pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1401E:3a-6: gsang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni stong pa nyid bcu drug gi rang bzhin gyi brda'i yi ge ste /
T02TD1401E:3a-7: thams cad kyi sgra ni de rnams gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD1401E:3a-8: ra ni mtshal chen po yi khams //
T02TD1401E:3a-9: ha ni ri las skyes pa ste //
T02TD1401E:3a-10: ri skyes zhes pa mgo skyes so //
T02TD1401E:3a-11: sa ni dri yi snod yin te //
T02TD1401E:3a-12: lus la dri ni ji lta bar //
T02TD1401E:3a-13: sa ni rlung du gsungs pa sta //
T02TD1401E:3a-14: ra ni dri nyid yin par gsungs //
T02TD1401E:3a-15: yi ge me ni me tog ste //
T02TD1401E:3a-16: ra ni de bzhin lan tshva'o //
T02TD1401E:3a-17: me ni sha chen por 'dod de //
T02TD1401E:3a-18: sa ni rab tu sbyor ba nyid //
T02TD1401E:3a-19: rba ni mgo bor rab tu gsungs //
T02TD1401E:3a-20: lha mo me ni rkang yin te //
T02TD1401E:3a-21: ni ni dri yi mar khu'o //
T02TD1401E:3a-22: sa ni so dang sen mo ste //
T02TD1401E:3a-23: da ni rgya mtsho las skyes so //
T02TD1401E:3a-24: sthi ni kha ba'i snying po ste //
T02TD1401E:3a-25: ta ni ga pur bstan pa'o //
T02TD1401E:3a-27: gcig tu thams cad mkhyen pa ste //
T02TD1401E:3a-28: kun du 'gro ba shin tu phra //
T02TD1401E:3a-29: snying gi gsang chogs mnyam pa ste //
T02TD1401E:3a-30: sgyu ma'i rang bzhin stong pa nyid //
T02TD1401E:3a-31: sems kyi rang bzhin bsam me khyab //
T02TD1401E:3a-32: yid bzhin nor bu 'dra ba bzhin //
T02TD1401E:3a-33: shes rab ming du de brjod do //
T02TD1401E:3a-34: gsang ba zhes kyang bshad pa yin //
T02TD1401E:3a-35: mchog ni don dam nyid kyis te //
T02TD1401E:3a-36: chos kyi sku zhes de brjod do //
T02TD1401E:3a-37: lhag mthong kun mkhyen ye shes kyi //
T02TD1401E:3a-38: dgyes pa zhes ni bshad pa yin //
T02TD1401E:3a-39: bsam gyis mi khyab brtan pa dang //
T02TD1401E:3a-40: g-yo ba'i dngos po thams cad kyi ;
T02TD1401E:3a-41: / rang bzhin lhan cig skyes pa yi //
T02TD1401E:3a-43: thams cad bdag nyid ces bya ni //
T02TD1401E:3a-44: dbang po kun dang rnam shes sems //
T02TD1401E:3a-45: thams cad nas ni thams cad du //
T02TD1401E:3a-46: yid kyi rnam shes zhes bshad cing //
T02TD1401E:3a-47: shes rab blo gros blor yang brjod //
T02TD1401E:3a-48: rtag tu zhes bya ba ni //
T02TD1401E:3a-50: da lta'i bdag nyid can gyi mchog /'di yis skye dang 'jig spangs 'di //
T02TD1401E:3a-51: khyab nyid rdo rje'i sku nyid de //
T02TD1401E:3a-52: dbang du byed cing rtag shar nyid //
T02TD1401E:3a-53: dus kun can nyid bshad pa yin //
T02TD1401E:3a-55: kun nas sems can thams cad kyi //
T02TD1401E:3b-0: @3b khams kun la ni thams cad du //
T02TD1401E:3b-1: lus kun la ni mnyam khyab par //
T02TD1401E:3b-2: sems kyi rgyun nyid yang dag gnas //
T02TD1401E:3b-3: zag pa med cing bsam mi khyab //
T02TD1401E:3b-4: dri ma med cing bdag gis med //
T02TD1401E:3b-5: rang nyid stong pa mkha' mnyam pas //
T02TD1401E:3b-6: dngos dang dngos med rnam par spangs //
T02TD1401E:3b-7: thog ma tha ma med zhi ba //
T02TD1401E:3b-8: chos rnams kun gyi dbang phyug sku //
T02TD1401E:3b-9: kun gyi rang bzhin 'dzin pas na //
T02TD1401E:3b-10: bden pa gnyis la yang dag brten //
T02TD1401E:3b-11: ji ltar shing la rab brten pa //
T02TD1401E:3b-12: me yi sa bon rnam gnas dang //
T02TD1401E:3b-13: ji ltar til gyi 'bru rnams la //
T02TD1401E:3b-14: til gyi mar khu de ltar ni //
T02TD1401E:3b-15: khams gsum la ni rnam gnas pa //
T02TD1401E:3b-16: phyag rgya chen por shes par bya //
T02TD1401E:3b-18: mkha' 'gro kun dngos sems dpa' ni //
T02TD1401E:3b-20: mkha' 'gro ma kun gyi sgras ni rab tu gtum mo la sogs par 'dod la /
T02TD1401E:3b-21: de rnams kyi phra rab yongs su bsgrubs pas na /
T02TD1401E:3b-22: de rnams kyi dngos kyi rang bzhin no //
T02TD1401E:3b-25: rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i bye brag gi gnyis so //
T02TD1401E:3b-26: sems can rgyu ba zhes bshad la //
T02TD1401E:3b-27: snod kyi 'jig rten mi rgyu ba'o //
T02TD1401E:3b-29: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba mchog / ces bya ba la /
T02TD1401E:3b-30: mi phyed pas na rdo rje ste /
T02TD1401E:3b-31: rdo rje dang chos mthun pas gzhan rnams 'bigs pa'i phyir ro ;
T02TD1401E:3b-32: / de bas na sems dpa' ste /
T02TD1401E:3b-33: dngos bo thams cad gcig tu gyur pa nyid do //
T02TD1401E:3b-34: rdo rje yang yin la sems dpa' yang yin pas rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
T02TD1401E:3b-35: dngos bde dngos po med pa bde //
T02TD1401E:3b-36: rdo rje sems dpa' bde bar brjod //
T02TD1401E:3b-37: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni des par gzung ba ste /
T02TD1401E:3b-38: de nyid bcom ldan rang 'byung zhes bya ba la /
T02TD1401E:3b-39: brtan pa dang g-yo ba dang grol ba ma lus pa rnams rang 'byung bas na /
T02TD1401E:3b-41: 'di la bcom pa yod pas na bcom ldan te /
T02TD1401E:3b-42: bcom pa'i sgras dbang phyug la sogs pa rnams pa drug gzung ngo //
T02TD1401E:3b-43: yang na 'joms pas na bcom zhes gzung ste /
T02TD1401E:3b-44: nyon mongs pa'i bdud la sogs pa bcom pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1401E:3b-45: de yang nyon mongs shes rab kyis 'joms pas /
T02TD1401E:3b-46: de'i phyir shes rab kyis 'joms zhes gsungs so //
T02TD1401E:3b-47: nyon mongs pa dang bral bas na dpa' ba'o //
T02TD1401E:3b-48: rtsa yi 'khor lo'i gzugs kyis bsdams pas na //
T02TD1401E:3b-49: mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom pa ste //
T02TD1401E:4a-1: mchog sdom pa 'khor lo'i yin par bshad //
T02TD1401E:4a-3: yang na bla ma las kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la bla ma ni khams bcu drug yin la /
T02TD1401E:4a-4: de las kyang bla mar gyur pa ni mkha' 'gro nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
T02TD1401E:4a-5: de rnams kyi tshogs ni dra ba ste /
T02TD1401E:4a-6: de rnams nyid rtsa ba'i 'khor lo'i tshul gyis bsdams pas na sdom pa ste /
T02TD1401E:4a-7: shin tu yang sbas pa'i gleng gzhi'i tshig gsal bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1401E:4a-8: ji ltar 'byung ba gsungs pa la /
T02TD1401E:4a-9: gsang ba zhes pa ni 'di skad do //
T02TD1401E:4a-11: dgyes pa ni thos pas so //
T02TD1401E:4a-12: thams cad bdag nyid du ni gsum pa'i don gyis bdun pa ste /
T02TD1401E:4a-13: gzhan dang gzhan gyis ma yin no zhes pa'i don no //
T02TD1401E:4a-14: dus nam gyi tshe zhe na /
T02TD1401E:4a-15: rtag tu bzhugs pa'i tshe na'o //
T02TD1401E:4a-17: bde ba chen po'i gnas su'o //
T02TD1401E:4a-18: de yang gang zhig ce na /
T02TD1401E:4a-22: gsang pas yi khams yin te //
T02TD1401E:4a-23: de bzhin mchog ni chu yin la //
T02TD1401E:4a-24: dgyes pa me zhes rnam par bshad //
T02TD1401E:4a-25: thams cad bdag nyid rtag 'gro ba //
T02TD1401E:4a-26: rtag tu bzhugs pa nam mkha'i khams //
T02TD1401E:4a-28: gang yang sems can gyi khams thams cad ni mkha' 'gro ma kun gyi rang bzhin te /
T02TD1401E:4a-29: de nyid rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02TD1401E:4a-30: bde ba ni bde ba chen po ste /
T02TD1401E:4a-31: mchog ni phul du byung ba'o //
T02TD1401E:4a-32: ji lta bur gyur pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad do zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02TD1401E:4a-35: de'i chags pa chen po'i rjes su dpag par bya ba'i phyir 'byung ba'o ;
T02TD1401E:4a-36: / de bas na sgra'i tshul la zhes pa ste /
T02TD1401E:4a-37: rdo rje nor bu'i nang du chud pa'i h'um gi sgra'i tshul nges par byung ba ni dus gsum dang khams gsum pa'i ma lus pa'i dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma'o //
T02TD1401E:4a-38: de rnams kyi dam tshig ni 'dus par 'dod pa ste /
T02TD1401E:4a-39: rdo rje dang padma lhan cig tu mnyam par sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD1401E:4a-40: yul dang dbang po bcu gnyis po rnams kyis nye bar longs spyod pa ni spyod pa ste /
T02TD1401E:4a-41: so so rang gis rig pa'i tshul gyis rang gi sems kyi spyod yul thob pa'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid ni spyod yul lo //
T02TD1401E:4a-42: thog ma ni gsang ba la sgrib pa lnga spangs shing /
T02TD1401E:4b-0: nam mkha' ltar dag pa dbus dang @4b mtha' dri ma med pa shin tu gnas pa nyid kyi ye shes la 'khrul pa tsam zhig gzhom par bya'o //
T02TD1401E:4b-1: gzhan du na rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1401E:4b-2: bsrub bya bsrub bya'i sbyor ba bzhin //
T02TD1401E:4b-3: de bzhin zhes bya ba 'di lta ste /
T02TD1401E:4b-4: gtsub gtan dang gtsub shing dang skyes bu'i lag pa'i rtsol ba las du ba rab tu skye zhing me mngon par mched mod kyi /
T02TD1401E:4b-5: me de yang gtsub shing la yang med gtsub gtan la yang med skyes bu'i lag pa dag la yang med yongs su brtags na gcig la'ang mi gnas so //
T02TD1401E:4b-6: me 'di ji lta ba bzhin du /
T02TD1401E:4b-8: bsrub bya'i chos 'byung rab tu gsung //
T02TD1401E:4b-9: bsrub pa rdo rjer brjod pa'o //
T02TD1401E:4b-10: de yang dag par sbyor ba las /
T02TD1401E:4b-11: de bzhin du bdud rtsi lta bu'i ye shes 'byung ba ni /
T02TD1401E:4b-12: mngon par sangs rgyas pa nyid kyi byed pa po ste /
T02TD1401E:4b-13: shes rab lus 'byung ye shes ni //
T02TD1401E:4b-14: mkha' mnyam thabs dang lhan cig nyid //
T02TD1401E:4b-15: bde chen rnam pa gcig pu ni ;
T02TD1401E:4b-16: / yang dag dbang bskur las shes bya //
T02TD1401E:4b-17: sngags bzlas bsam gtan la sogs ldan //
T02TD1401E:4b-18: rgyud 'di bshad kyis nyan par gyis //
T02TD1401E:4b-19: zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po la gsungs pa'o //
T02TD1401E:4b-20: rgyud kyi sgras ni 'dir rab tu brjod pa rdo rje'i nges pa'i tshig ma lus pa rnams te /
T02TD1401E:4b-21: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas yongs su rdzogs pa'i mthar thug pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa'i don bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i don no //
T02TD1401E:4b-22: yid skyob par gyur pas na sngags te ye shes so //
T02TD1401E:4b-23: bsam gtan ni sems rtse gcig pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02TD1401E:4b-24: yang na a'a li dang k'a li'i don ni sngags kyi bzlas par bshad la /
T02TD1401E:4b-25: byang chub sems la rab brtson na //
T02TD1401E:4b-26: rnal 'byor dbang phyug rang nyid gtso //
T02TD1401E:4b-27: byang chub sems 'di rdo rje ste //
T02TD1401E:4b-28: sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin no //
T02TD1401E:4b-29: dbugs 'byung bar ma mchog ngag dang //
T02TD1401E:4b-30: zhes bya ba la dang por bcud kyi len gyi don du lo bcu gcig pa'i bdag nyid padma bskul ba'o //
T02TD1401E:4b-31: gnyis pa lo bcu gnyis pa dang /
T02TD1401E:4b-32: dam tshig gi don du shin tu dga' bar bya'o //
T02TD1401E:4b-33: gsum pa lo bcu drug pa'i me tog dang ldan pa dang /
T02TD1401E:4b-34: dngos grub kyi don du sngags la dang por goms par bya'o //
T02TD1401E:5a-0: bzhi pa lo nyi shu ma'i shes rab kyi bdag nyid kyis ni mkha' la spyod @5a * //
T02TD1401E:5a-2: lnga pa lo nyi shu rtsa lnga ma'i bdag nyid kyis ni dbang bskur ba'i don du'o zhes bya ba'i bar du ni me long lta bu la sogs pa'i ye shes lnga rnam par dag pa'i rim pa bzhin du bstan to //
T02TD1401E:5a-3: dbugs 'byung zhes bya ba ni rang gtso bo'i lhas legs par sbyangs pa'i btsun mo dang lhan cig spyod pa la rjes su 'jug pa'o //
T02TD1401E:5a-4: rigs ldan ni rigs kyi bu mo'o //
T02TD1401E:5a-5: med na gzhan yang gzung bar bya ste /
T02TD1401E:5a-6: legs par 'dus pa la byang chub kyi sems gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD1401E:5a-7: dri zhes bya ba ni me tog sna tshogs la sogs pa dang /
T02TD1401E:5a-8: gos dang rgyan la sogs pa rnams kyis brgyan par bya'o ;
T02TD1401E:5a-9: / chus zhes bya ba ni chang rnam pa sna tshogs par shes par bya ste /
T02TD1401E:5a-10: rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan las skyes pa rnams la phan pa'i rjes su mthun pa'i sbyin pas mchod pa ste /
T02TD1401E:5a-11: mchod pa'i bdag nyid du gyur pas sangs rgyas rnams kyi bdag nyid mchog tu dga' ba'i skus phyogs bcu gsal bar bya ste /
T02TD1401E:5a-12: ye shes sgron mas mngon par byang chub par mdzad do //
T02TD1401E:5a-13: kyang gi sgras ni nges par shes par mdzad pa'i don no //
T02TD1401E:5a-14: rtag tu ni rgyun mi 'chad par de kho na nyid bsgom pa la gzhol ba'o //
T02TD1401E:5a-15: yang na dbugs dbyung ba zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1401E:5a-16: g-yon dang g-yas kyi dbugs gnyis snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbugs de rnams lte ba'i rtsa bar yang dag par 'du ba'i dus su phyag rgya mi 'gyur ba'i mchog go //
T02TD1401E:5a-17: gang du bar ma mchog dang zhes bya ba'i tshig gzhan yod pa der brjod par bya ste /
T02TD1401E:5a-18: dang po dang tha ma dag ste /
T02TD1401E:5a-19: gzhon nu ma dang rgan mo dag gi bar du gyur pa'i rdul ni bar ma zhes bya'o //
T02TD1401E:5a-20: bar ma mchog dang bsdus pa'i tshogs ni des mtshon pa'o //
T02TD1401E:5a-21: de nyid kyis na gsungs pa /
T02TD1401E:5a-22: dri yi chu dang bcas pas kyang //
T02TD1401E:5a-24: dri'i chu ni sihla kam ngo //
T02TD1401E:5a-25: de dang bcas pa ni ga pur te /
T02TD1401E:5a-26: de lta bur gyur pas rigs ldan rnams la mchod par bya zhes so //
T02TD1401E:5a-27: dus kyi khyad par gyis zhes bya ba la /
T02TD1401E:5a-28: dus kyi nges pa bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1401E:5a-29: de 'dod chags la sogs pas mi 'phrog par 'jug par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1401E:5a-30: sngon du nyi ma'i dus las dus drug yang dag par gsal bar bya ste /
T02TD1401E:5b-0: 'dod @5b lhas mnyam du 'ong ba'i dus te /
T02TD1401E:5b-1: dus rnams gsal bar shes par byas la /
T02TD1401E:5b-2: las thams cad brtsam par bya'o //
T02TD1401E:5b-3: tho rangs dgun smad las 'ongs pa //
T02TD1401E:5b-4: dpyid dang dbyar gnyis nyin cha gnyis //
T02TD1401E:5b-5: nyin phyed sa gar mkhas pas sbyar //
T02TD1401E:5b-6: srod na de bzhin ston ka ste //
T02TD1401E:5b-7: dgun stod mtshan mo'i cha yin no //
T02TD1401E:5b-9: 'di rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su shes par byas la /
T02TD1401E:5b-10: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa dang sbyar bar bya ste /
T02TD1401E:5b-11: rdo rje sems dpa' dgun smad de //
T02TD1401E:5b-12: rnam par snang mdzad thub pa dpyid //
T02TD1401E:5b-13: kye ho rta mchog so ga ste //
T02TD1401E:5b-14: de bzhin dbyar ni he ru ka /
T02TD1401E:5b-15: rdo rje nyi ma ston ka la //
T02TD1401E:5b-16: padma gar dbang dgun stod do //
T02TD1401E:5b-17: so ga mar me bza' bya ste //
T02TD1401E:5b-18: de bzhin du ni dbyar kha chu //
T02TD1401E:5b-19: ston gyi dus su mar khu ste //
T02TD1401E:5b-20: de bzhin dgun stod me tog go //
T02TD1401E:5b-21: kye ho dgun smad ga pur te //
T02TD1401E:5b-22: de bzhin dpyid ni bzhi mnyam mo //
T02TD1401E:5b-23: de rnams sman ni chen po ste //
T02TD1401E:5b-24: dus drug dus ni shes par bya //
T02TD1401E:5b-25: dus tshod 'di dang mnyam med de //
T02TD1401E:5b-26: sbyor ba kun gyi dam pa yin //
T02TD1401E:5b-27: de dag rang bzhin grub pa ru //
T02TD1401E:5b-32: pho nya zhes bya ba ni mchod pas mnyes par 'gyur ba rnams so //
T02TD1401E:5b-33: mchog dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sngar bstan pa rnams te /
T02TD1401E:5b-34: des ni lhan cig gang skyes pa de yid ni nang du chud pa yis te /
T02TD1401E:5b-35: bsgom par bya ba ni rtag tu de'i rang bzhin du bya ba'o //
T02TD1401E:5b-36: 'dod pa'i dngos grub ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dngos grub bo ;
T02TD1401E:5b-37: / ni zhes bya ba'i sgra ni nges par gzung ba'i sgra'i don no //
T02TD1401E:5b-38: rang rdzas ni ga pur ro //
T02TD1401E:5b-39: mchod par bya zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
T02TD1401E:5b-40: sbrang rtsi ni sbrang rtsi chen po'o //
T02TD1401E:5b-42: ga pur bcas zhes bya ba ni ga pur dang lhan cig par yod pa'i me tog ste /
T02TD1401E:5b-43: mi phyed pa'i rim pas so //
T02TD1401E:5b-45: sbyar zhes bya ba ni bshang ba la sogs pa dang bcas pas mnyam med drug po bcud kyis len no //
T02TD1401E:5b-46: rdo rje mtshan ma ni chos kyi 'byung gnas las byung ba'o //
T02TD1401E:5b-47: yang na thams cad rdo rje ni bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka yin la /
T02TD1401E:6a-2: 'dzin pa ni de la rang gi lag pas blang bar bya ba ste /
T02TD1401E:6a-3: ming med ni sa gzhir byas la /
T02TD1401E:6a-4: mthe bo ni ri rab tu sbyar bar bya ba'o //
T02TD1401E:6a-5: rgya mtsho bsrubs pa'i bdud rtsi bzhin //
T02TD1401E:6a-6: rtog pa gsum du shes par bya //
T02TD1401E:6a-9: ha zhes bya bas snyigs ma 'phrog / yi ge ho: yis dre 'joms la //
T02TD1401E:6a-10: gang zhig me 'bar hr'i: yig ste //
T02TD1401E:6a-11: pa ba ka zhes rab tu bsgrags //
T02TD1401E:6a-12: mkhas pas bsgrubs pa'i bdud rtsi myang //
T02TD1401E:6a-13: dang por bla mar dbul bya ste //
T02TD1401E:6a-14: de yi rjes su he ru ka / rdo rje can gyis sbyor dbul lo //
T02TD1401E:6a-15: phyag rgya la ni phul nas ni //
T02TD1401E:6a-16: bdag nyid kyis ni yang dag myang //
T02TD1401E:6a-17: sbyor ba kun gyi snying po yis //
T02TD1401E:6a-18: bdud rtsi rnam pa ldar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1401E:6a-19: 'di lta bu yi sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1401E:6a-20: rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam 'gyur //
T02TD1401E:6a-21: yang na ga pur bcas pa ni //
T02TD1401E:6a-22: byang chub sems dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD1401E:6a-23: tshogs kyi dbus su gzhag par bya //
T02TD1401E:6a-25: mig la sogs pa dbang po thams cad kyi tshogs te /
T02TD1401E:6a-26: grangs bdun par gyur pa dbang po gnyis kyi bye brag tu tshogs te de rnams 'dus pa'o //
T02TD1401E:6a-27: gnyis po de gang zhe na /
T02TD1401E:6a-28: mthe bong srin lag rtse sbyar zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1401E:6a-29: mthe bong ni rdo rje yin la /
T02TD1401E:6a-31: de dag gi sbyar ba ni mthe bong srin lag rtse sbyar ba'o //
T02TD1401E:6a-32: myang zhes bya ba ni rig par bya zhes bya ba'i don no //
T02TD1401E:6a-33: mchod bzhi de bzhin rnal 'byor ma //
T02TD1401E:6a-34: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bzhi yis te /
T02TD1401E:6a-35: dang por stong pa'i byang chub po //
T02TD1401E:6a-36: gnyis pa la ni sa bon bsdu //
T02TD1401E:6a-37: gsum ba la ni gzugs brnyan rdzogs //
T02TD1401E:6a-38: bzhi pa la ni yi ge dgod //
T02TD1401E:6a-40: bum pa'i steng gi thod pa bzhi rnams dang /
T02TD1401E:6a-41: de bzhin du mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma rnams te /
T02TD1401E:6a-42: 'di dag gi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i bdag nyid mchod par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don no //
T02TD1401E:6a-44: dba' bo gnyis med snyoms 'jug pa'i //
T02TD1401E:6a-47: de la dpa' bo zhes bya ba ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang lhan cig tu spyod pa snyoms par 'jug pa'o //
T02TD1401E:6a-48: 'dir dad pa la sogs pa rnam rnam par dag pa'i khva'i gdong pa la sogs pa rnams so //
T02TD1401E:6b-0: @6b dpa' bo'i sgras ni thams cad gzung bar bya ste /
T02TD1401E:6b-1: dper na rgyal po zhes bstan pas /
T02TD1401E:6b-2: 'khor thams cad yongs su gzung ba bzhin no //
T02TD1401E:6b-3: byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa'i rim pa'i sgom pa pos ni 'di ltar rab tu shes par bya ste /
T02TD1401E:6b-4: de bzhin du mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i lha mo rnam par thar pa bzhi'i bdag nyid can rnams dus bzhi pa rnams su dpa' bo dang gnyis su med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pas mchod par bya'o //
T02TD1401E:6b-5: gzhan yang yongs su rdzogs pa'i rim pas sgrub pa pos ni /
T02TD1401E:6b-6: thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i nga rgyal gyis gnas pa'i dus kyis nges pa med par 'gyur bas ci zhig bya ba gsungs pa ji lta ba'i phyag rgya dang lhan cig snyoms par zhugs pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas thams cad du khyab pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'i nam mkha'i khams thams cad du rab tu gnas pa'i kun du bzang po thams cad kyi bdag nyid sangs rgyas kyi byang chub khams gsum pa brjod pa dang bral ba bsgom par bya ste /
T02TD1401E:6b-7: ji ltar nyi ma phyed du song ba'i nyi ma ni dman pa dang bar ma dang mchog tu 'byung bar mi rtog pa bzhin du thams cad du snang bar byed pa de ltar rnal 'byor bas kyang kun du rab tu snang ba'i ye shes kyis mu stegs thams cad dang /
T02TD1401E:6b-8: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa shin tu mnan nas snang ba med par nam zhig tu gyur pa de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi nyi ma'i 'od kyis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams kun du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyis khams gsum du snang bar byas te /
T02TD1401E:6b-9: rtog pa med cing mi rtog pa ji lta ba bzhin shes par byas pa ni de nyid ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don no //
T02TD1401E:6b-11: ji ltar mi rnams kyi bdag nyid kyi bde ba gong bur bsdus par byas nas zhes shes par bya'o //
T02TD1401E:6b-12: rdo rje phra mo 'di dang rnal 'byor gzhan la brten pa sgrin par bya bar 'dod pa de'i tshe /
T02TD1401E:6b-13: bcu drug char yang mi phod do //
T02TD1401E:6b-14: zhes bya ba ni nye bar mtshon pa tsam ste /
T02TD1401E:6b-15: char yang mi bzod bgrang bar yang mi bzod dper yang mi bzod rgyur yang mi bzod do zhes pa'o //
T02TD1401E:6b-16: da ni gnas phun sum tshogs pa gsungs pa /
T02TD1401E:6b-17: ri sul zhes bya ba sogs pa ste /
T02TD1401E:6b-18: sgra ji bzhin pa ni go sla ba kho na ste /
T02TD1401E:7a-0: @7a * // brda yis ni sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya chu skyes chen po yon tan dang ldan pa khyad par gyi gsang ba'i gnas bstan pa'i phyir ri sul zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD1401E:7a-1: don ni nags tshal 'khrigs shing dben pa'i yul te /
T02TD1401E:7a-2: der gnas pa zhes 'dir gzung bar bya'o //
T02TD1401E:7a-3: 'dir gtso bor bzung bas 'khor rnams kyang gzung bar bya'o zhes so //
T02TD1401E:7a-4: yang bud med kyi phyag rgya ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nags tshal gyis 'khrigs pa'o //
T02TD1401E:7a-5: de nyid thabs kyi rnam par dag pa ni byang chub kyi lam du gyur pa'o //
T02TD1401E:7a-6: de'i rnam par dag pa ni rab kyi mthar thug par 'gro ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD1401E:7a-7: yul ni chos 'byung du bstan te de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bsngags pa'i rdo rje'i rigs la sogs pa'i khyad par can gyi bu mo skye bo las byung ba'i phyir dben pa'o //
T02TD1401E:7a-8: yang na de kho na nyid kyi bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid ni mi g-yo ba'i ri ste /
T02TD1401E:7a-9: mu stegs can ngan pa las rab tu byung ba'i rlung gis mi sgul ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD1401E:7a-10: dman pa'i sems can gyis gting dpag mi nus pas na tshang tshing ngo //
T02TD1401E:7a-11: rgyal ba'i bdud rtsis yongs su gang pa'i khu bar gyur pas na phug go //
T02TD1401E:7a-12: chu bo chen po'i 'gram rnams zhes bya ba la de nyid thabs dang shes rab yang dag par sbyor bas zab pa dang rgya che ba'i shes rab kyi chu'i gnas su gyur pas na /
T02TD1401E:7a-14: gdod nas grub pa ni rtag tu yongs su grub pa ste /
T02TD1401E:7a-15: 'char ba dang nub pa spangs shing yongs su rdzogs pa rtag tu nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'o //
T02TD1401E:7a-16: de yang 'dod chags kyi me 'bar bas nyan thos la sogs pa'i byang chub bsregs pas na dur khrod do //
T02TD1401E:7a-17: yang na sems can thams cad kyi rgyud la mnyam pa nyid kyis gnas pas na dur khrod ces bya'o //
T02TD1401E:7a-18: der ni zhes bya ba ni de lta bu'i khyad par du'o //
T02TD1401E:7a-19: dkyil 'khor ni snying po de len zhing 'dzin par byed pas na dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD1401E:7a-20: bri bar bya zhes bya ba ni yid kyis bsgom par bya ba'o zhes bya ba'i don no //
T02TD1401E:7a-21: phyi rol ni go sla ba nyid do //
T02TD1401E:7a-22: dkyil 'khor de nyid dam pa ste //
T02TD1401E:7a-23: he ru ka dpal ye shes che //
T02TD1401E:7a-24: phag mo'i lus las byung ba yin //
T02TD1401E:7b-1: dkyil 'khor bde ba'i mchog yin te //
T02TD1401E:7b-3: kha sbyor gnyis su med pa nyid //
T02TD1401E:7b-4: bdag gi de nyid mnyam gzhag dang //
T02TD1401E:7b-5: lha yi de nyid kyang de bzhin //
T02TD1401E:7b-6: sngags kyi de nyid phyag rgya dang //
T02TD1401E:7b-7: de ni dkyil 'khor mchog yin no //
T02TD1401E:7b-8: yan lag kun bsgom las 'das pa //
T02TD1401E:7b-9: rtog pa'i rnam rtog spangs pas ni //
T02TD1401E:7b-10: gug skyed thig le dang bral ba //
T02TD1401E:7b-11: de ni dkyil 'khor mchog yin no //
T02TD1401E:7b-12: chos dang chos min rnam dpyad na //
T02TD1401E:7b-13: rnam dag nam mkha' lta bu ni //
T02TD1401E:7b-14: chos kun nye bar mi dmigs pa //
T02TD1401E:7b-15: de ni dkyil 'khor zhes byar bshad //
T02TD1401E:7b-16: chags dang chags min rnam 'phro ba //
T02TD1401E:7b-18: shin tu chags shing chags pa'i sems //
T02TD1401E:7b-19: de ni dkyil 'khor mchog yin no //
T02TD1401E:7b-20: bcu drug khams na rnam bzhugs shing //
T02TD1401E:7b-21: gzugs dang gzugs med dri med pa //
T02TD1401E:7b-22: rtog pa po dang skul byed sems //
T02TD1401E:7b-23: de ni dkyil 'khor zhes su brjod //
T02TD1401E:7b-24: dkyil 'khor lus su gsungs pa dang //
T02TD1401E:7b-25: bha ga'i dkyil 'khor nyid dang ni //
T02TD1401E:7b-26: byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor te //
T02TD1401E:7b-28: 'di ltar sa 'og sa stengs sa bla dang ;
T02TD1401E:7b-29: / rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i dkyil 'khor ro zhes brjod do //
T02TD1401E:7b-30: dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel sgrub pa'i thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u dang po'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02TD1401E:7b-32: // / de la zhes bya ba ni sgra ji bzhin pa'i gnas su'o //
T02TD1401E:7b-33: lci ba zhes bya ba ni sa la ma lhung ba'i byug pa ste /
T02TD1401E:7b-34: der brtsam par bya zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
T02TD1401E:7b-35: 'di'i rab tu byed pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi thabs kyi cho gar shes par bya'o //
T02TD1401E:7b-36: dur khrod du ni kun spyod bya //
T02TD1401E:7b-37: zhes pa ni dur khrod kyi bdag nyid las byung ba'i tshon sna lnga mngon par 'du bya ba ste /
T02TD1401E:7b-38: tshon sngon po ni ro bsregs pa'i sol ba'i phye mas so //
T02TD1401E:7b-39: tshon dmar po ni dur khrod kyi so phag gis so //
T02TD1401E:7b-40: tshon dkar po ni mi'i rus pa'i phye mas so //
T02TD1401E:7b-41: tshon ser po ni yung ba dang mi rus kyi phye mas lhan cig sbyar bas so //
T02TD1401E:8a-0: tshon ljang gu ni mi rus kyi phye ma @8a * //
T02TD1401E:8a-1: dang lo ma ljang gu'i phye ma dang ldan pas so //
T02TD1401E:8a-2: des dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa bri bar bya ste /
T02TD1401E:8a-3: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i 'byung gnas pas na 'jigs pa'o //
T02TD1401E:8a-4: slob dpon mtshan nyid bzang dang ldan //
T02TD1401E:8a-5: zhes bya ba ni rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga la mkhas pa'o /
T02TD1401E:8a-6: sbyor ba shes pa ni bsam gtan la gnas pa'o //
T02TD1401E:8a-7: pha rol 'gro zhes bya ba gsungs pa /
T02TD1401E:8a-8: dang po stong pa nyid kyi rgya mtsho'i tshul ma lus pa'i sdig pa bkrus pas nam mkha' ltar dri ma med cing snying rje chen po dang byams pa nas brtsams nas /
T02TD1401E:8a-9: brtson 'grus kyi spro ba dang dga' ba dang ldan pas bdag nyid dpal he ru ka bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1401E:8a-10: thod pas spyi bor brgyan byas pas //
T02TD1401E:8a-11: zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i gzugs bris pa'i phreng ba sna tshogs kyi ral pa'i cod pa na la shin tu brgyan pa'o //
T02TD1401E:8a-12: yan lag thams cad byugs pa ni ro bsregs pa'i thal ba dang /
T02TD1401E:8a-13: bdud rtsi lnga bsres pas so //
T02TD1401E:8a-14: dum gcig ces pa ni sor mo lnga'i 'khor lo'o //
T02TD1401E:8a-15: rus pa'i phreng ba rnam 'phyang dang //
T02TD1401E:8a-16: zhes bya ba ni mgo bo lnga bcu tham pa la byas pa'i phreng ba'o //
T02TD1401E:8a-19: kha tv'am ga zhes bya ba ni lag pa g-yon par te thod pa dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD1401E:8a-20: g-yas pa ni rdo rje gsor bar bya'o //
T02TD1401E:8a-21: bdag nyid ces bya ba ni go sla'o //
T02TD1401E:8a-22: de ltar byas nas bri bar bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02TD1401E:8a-23: ro'i skud pa zhes bya ba ni mi ro dang lhan cig dur khrod du bskyal ba'i skud pas la ma lhung ba gzung la mi 'chi bcu phyed bcas pa'i khrag chen pos bsgo bar bya'o //
T02TD1401E:8a-24: yang na ro'i skud pa zhes bya ba ni mi ro'i rgyus pa las byas pa'i thig skud do //
T02TD1401E:8a-25: khru gang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni khru gang nas brtsam pa nas nyi shu'i bar du ste /
T02TD1401E:8a-26: de las lhag par mi bya'o //
T02TD1401E:8a-27: sngags pas nyis 'gyur rnam par spyad //
T02TD1401E:8a-28: ces bya ba ni bgo ba'i thig skud kyi mtshan nyid do //
T02TD1401E:8a-29: mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde mchog mchod //
T02TD1401E:8a-30: ces bya ba ni mchod pa bya ba'o //
T02TD1401E:8a-31: gang gis gzhal zhing gdab pa gsungs pa /
T02TD1401E:8a-32: cha 'phen pa yi rim nyid kyis //
T02TD1401E:8a-33: blo bzang dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya //
T02TD1401E:8a-34: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1401E:8b-0: cha gsum @8b po rnams kyis 'phen pa ni cha 'phen pa ste /
T02TD1401E:8b-1: de'i rim pa ni cha 'phen pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1401E:8b-2: cha 'phen pa'i rim pa des dkyil 'khor thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD1401E:8b-3: dkyil 'khor tshad gzhal sa la ni //
T02TD1401E:8b-4: shar nas nub tu gzung bya ste //
T02TD1401E:8b-5: nyis 'gyur gyis ni thig btab nas //
T02TD1401E:8b-6: de 'og bya rog rjes btsal bya //
T02TD1401E:8b-7: shar nas lho ru phyin bya zhing //
T02TD1401E:8b-8: nub nas kyang ni de bzhin te //
T02TD1401E:8b-9: byang gi phyogs su des gzhal nas //
T02TD1401E:8b-10: tshangs pa'i thig ni gdab par bya //
T02TD1401E:8b-11: shar phyogs la sogs bzung nas ni //
T02TD1401E:8b-12: thig bzhi dag ni btab byas nas //
T02TD1401E:8b-13: phyi nas phyogs ni re re zhing //
T02TD1401E:8b-14: cha brgyad brgyad du 'di btab nas //
T02TD1401E:8b-15: der ni cha chen tshad du bya //
T02TD1401E:8b-16: slar yang cha bzhir bgo byas la //
T02TD1401E:8b-17: re mig drug cu bzhir ldan pa'i //
T02TD1401E:8b-18: mtshams nas thig ni gdab par bya //
T02TD1401E:8b-19: so so'i mtshams nas thig btab pas //
T02TD1401E:8b-20: 'dus pa'i thig skud mchog yin no //
T02TD1401E:8b-21: phyi nas cha ni re re zhing //
T02TD1401E:8b-22: cha gnyis su ni gzhal bar bya //
T02TD1401E:8b-23: thig btab 'di yi tshad gzhal nas //
T02TD1401E:8b-24: dbang po la sogs gnyis gnyis bya //
T02TD1401E:8b-25: thig skud tshad ldan bzung nas ni //
T02TD1401E:8b-26: ji snyed btsal ba kha sbyar bya //
T02TD1401E:8b-27: de snyed bde chen 'khor lo dang //
T02TD1401E:8b-28: sku gsung thugs kyi tshad du bya //
T02TD1401E:8b-29: re mig bdun bdun ldan pa ni //
T02TD1401E:8b-30: thig skud bskor ba mchog yin no //
T02TD1401E:8b-31: 'khor lo snying po de las drug / rtsibs kyis mdzes pa de ltar bya //
T02TD1401E:8b-32: lte ba dang ni padma rnams //
T02TD1401E:8b-33: re mig bzhi dang gsum du bya //
T02TD1401E:8b-34: tshangs pa yi ni ngos gnyis su //
T02TD1401E:8b-35: rtsibs kyi nang du mdzes par bya //
T02TD1401E:8b-36: gsum po nyid ni thams cad du //
T02TD1401E:8b-37: rtag tu rdzogs pa nyid du bya //
T02TD1401E:8b-38: thugs ni rdo rje phreng bas bskor //
T02TD1401E:8b-39: de bzhin gsung ni pad phreng gis //
T02TD1401E:8b-40: sku yi 'khor lo phreng bas bskor //
T02TD1401E:8b-41: lhag ma ji ltar mdzes pas so //
T02TD1401E:8b-42: de la shar phyogs su dbang po'i gnas su shi ri'i shing la lha'i tshogs dkar po'o //
T02TD1401E:8b-43: lho phyogs su ni tsu ta'i shing la gshin rje nag po'o //
T02TD1401E:8b-44: nub phyogs su ni mya ngan 'tshang la gnas pa sprin gyi rgyal po dmar po'o //
T02TD1401E:8b-45: byang phyogs su ni byang chub kyi shing la gnod spyin gyi sde dpon ser po'o //
T02TD1401E:9a-0: me yi mtshams su ni ka ranydza la gnas pa drang srong @9a * //
T02TD1401E:9a-2: srin po'i mtshams su ni la ta dz'a ti la srin po'i tshogs sngon po'o //
T02TD1401E:9a-3: rlung gi mtshams su ni rlung gi bdag po srid sgrub la gnas pa ljang gu'o //
T02TD1401E:9a-4: dbang ldan gyi mtshams su ni n+ya gro dha la gnas pa'i yi dags kyi tshogs du ba'i mdog tu gnas pa ni dur khrod chen po rab tu 'jigs pa zhes bya'o //
T02TD1401E:9a-5: lte bar dgod bya dpa' po ni //
T02TD1401E:9a-6: zhes bya ba ni lha'i dgod pa bstan no //
T02TD1401E:9a-7: gzi brjid ldan zhing zhes bya ba ni drag po bas kyang shin tu drag pos 'jigs par byed pa ste /
T02TD1401E:9a-8: zhal dang po char sprin gyi mdog lta bu rin po che aindra n'i la chen po'i tshogs spungs pa ltar 'od zer 'bar ba la bskal ba'i me ltar shin tu 'bar ba'i 'od kyis 'khrigs pa'i spyan gsum pa /
T02TD1401E:9a-9: mche ba gtsigs shing rngam pa dang bcas pa 'jigs pa dag kyang 'jigs par mdzad pa'o //
T02TD1401E:9a-10: ha ha zhes bzhad ces bya ba la lha mo dang kun du 'khyud pas dga' ba dang bcas shing zhal padma lta bur rgyas pa cher bzhad cing rnam par 'phro ba'i nor bu'i tshigs spungs pa lta bu'i tshems kyi 'od kyis g-yo ba dang mi g-yo ba la gsal bar mdzad cing ro'i mchog gi rgyal po lhun po'i rtse mor sna tshogs padma dang /
T02TD1401E:9a-11: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la zhabs gnyis kyis bsnun cing h'um yig gis h'um zhes mdzad pa dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD1401E:9a-12: zhal g-yas pa gser bsregs pa lta bur shin tu ser zhing rab tu dga' ba'i spyan rgyas pas 'jig rten gsum snang bar mdzad pa'o //
T02TD1401E:9a-13: zhal g-yon pa rin po cha margada ltar rab tu gsal zhing 'od zer ljang gu 'khrigs pa 'phro bas rnam par bzhad pa dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD1401E:9a-14: nub phyogs kyi zhal bandu ka dang /
T02TD1401E:9a-15: da di ni'i me tog ltar shin tu dmar zhing nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char ka'i mdog lta bu'i 'od zer sgeg pa'i nyams dang ldan zhing rnam par rol pas bu mo mchog rnam par chags par mdzad pa'o //
T02TD1401E:9a-16: de lta bu phyag bcu gnyis pa bri bar bya ste /
T02TD1401E:9a-19: gzhan ni sngar bshad pa bzhin te /
T02TD1401E:9a-20: kha tv'am ga thod par bcas pas ni gcig gis so //
T02TD1401E:9a-21: de yi zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1401E:9a-22: de yi sku mdog mtshon cha 'chang /
T02TD1401E:9b-1: mi bskyod pa gtso bor gyur pa'i tshe'o //
T02TD1401E:9b-2: rdo rje sems dpa'i tshe mdog dmar po phyag na rdo rje dang thod pa bsnams pa'o //
T02TD1401E:9b-3: de'i rjes su 'khor lo gsum gyi go rims bzhin du rdo rje dang padma dang 'khor lo rnams dgod par bya'o //
T02TD1401E:9b-4: khva'i gdong pa la sogs pa yang ji lta bu'i mtshan ma ste /
T02TD1401E:9b-5: mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
T02TD1401E:9b-6: de nas bum pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1401E:9b-7: rgyal dang bkra shis ni shar gyi phyogs kyi sgor ro //
T02TD1401E:9b-8: dngos grub dang rdzu 'phrul dag ni byang du'o //
T02TD1401E:9b-9: rgyal dang rnam par rgyal ba dag ni nub phyogs su'o //
T02TD1401E:9b-10: grub pa dang srub pa ni lho phyogs su'o //
T02TD1401E:9b-11: dgu pa ni dngos grub thams cad rnam par rgyal ba ste mdun du dgod par bya'o //
T02TD1401E:9b-12: bdag nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa ni tshon gyi las zin nas dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub ba brtsam par bya'o //
T02TD1401E:9b-13: mar me zhes bya ba ni me dang /
T02TD1401E:9b-16: / lha bshos la sogs pa dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD1401E:9b-17: de nas lo grangs bcu drug pa //
T02TD1401E:9b-18: me tog bcas dang lhan cig des //
T02TD1401E:9b-19: phyag rgya dang sbyor legs gnas nas //
T02TD1401E:9b-20: dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub par bya //
T02TD1401E:9b-21: bde ba las byung dkyil 'khor ni //
T02TD1401E:9b-22: 'dod pa kun ldan mchod byas te //
T02TD1401E:9b-23: sngags pas lte bar bsam bya ba //
T02TD1401E:9b-24: rlung dang me yi dbus su ste //
T02TD1401E:9b-25: de dbus a'a li k'a li'o //
T02TD1401E:9b-26: dbus su stong pa'i ri mo ni //
T02TD1401E:9b-27: so sor rtog 'gyur dam pa dang //
T02TD1401E:9b-28: de nyid bya grub sgrub pa'o //
T02TD1401E:9b-29: shin tu rnam par dag bshad cing //
T02TD1401E:9b-31: chos rnams ro gcig byed ba yi //
T02TD1401E:9b-32: rang gi 'khor lo blta bar bya //
T02TD1401E:9b-33: ma lus 'gro ba gsum bskyed pa //
T02TD1401E:9b-34: rmi lam dang ni sgyu ma dang //
T02TD1401E:9b-35: gzugs brnyan bzhin du bsgom bya ste //
T02TD1401E:9b-36: brtse ldan sna tshogs pa yi gnas //
T02TD1401E:9b-37: dgod ces bya ba ni gnas ji lta ba bzhin du 'og nas 'byung ba ltar sku la sogs pa byin gyis brlab par bya zhing /
T02TD1401E:9b-38: mig la sogs pa yang byin gyis brlab pa bya ste /
T02TD1401E:9b-39: mig gnyis su padma dang zla ba la gnas pa'i yi ge aom yongs su gyur pa'i 'khor lo las gti mug rdo rje zhal gsum pa /
T02TD1401E:9b-40: phyag drug pa ral ba'i dbu rgyan can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa ni thams cad kyi'o //
T02TD1401E:10a-0: @10a * // khyad par du zhal g-yon pa ser zhing g-yas pa ljang gu 'khor lo dang dril bu bsnams pa'i phyag gnyis kyis gzugs rdo rje la 'khyud cing /
T02TD1401E:10a-1: phyag gzhan gyis gti mug gi bdag nyid kyi tshangs pa dral ba'i pags pa rgyab na bsnams pa /
T02TD1401E:10a-2: gzhan gyis rde'u chung kha tv'am ga dang thod pa bsnams pa ste thams cad la sbyor ro //
T02TD1401E:10a-3: kun kyang sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa nyid de rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbu rgyan can no //
T02TD1401E:10a-4: rnam gnyis su ni padma dang nyi ma la gnas pa'i yi ge h'um yongs su gyur pa'i rdo rje las zhe sdang rdo rje ste /
T02TD1401E:10a-5: yan lag thams cad dang rtsa ba'i zhal sngon po /
T02TD1401E:10a-6: g-yon pa ser zhing g-yas ba ljang gu rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams pa'i phyag gnyis kyis sgra rdo rje la 'khyud cing /
T02TD1401E:10a-7: gzhan gyis zhe sdang gi bdag nyid kyi khyab 'jug dral ba'i pags pa bsnams pa /
T02TD1401E:10a-8: mi bskyod pa'i dbu rgyan can bsgom par bya'o ;
T02TD1401E:10a-9: / sna bug gnyis su padma dang nyi ma la gnas pa'i yi ge tr'am yongs su gyur pa'i rin po che las ser sna rdo rje ste /
T02TD1401E:10a-10: rtsa ba'i zhal ser po zhal g-yas pa sngo zhing g-yon dmar ba rin po che dang dril bu bsnams pa'i phyag gnyis kyis dri rdo rje la 'khyud cing /
T02TD1401E:10a-11: gzhan gyis ser sna'i bdag nyid kyi 'dod pa'i lha dral ba'i pags pa bsnams pa rin chen 'byung ldan gyi dbu rgyan can bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1401E:10a-12: lce'i rtsa bar padma dang nyi ma la gnas pa'i yi ge a'a: yongs su gyur pa la padma de las 'dod chags rdo rje ste /
T02TD1401E:10a-13: rtsa ba'i zhal dmar po g-yon pa ser zhing g-yas pa dkar po padma dang dril bu bsnams pa'i phyag gnyis kyis ro rdo rje dang mnyam par ldan pa /
T02TD1401E:10a-14: gzhan gyis 'dod chags kyi bdag nyid kyi dbang phyug chen po dral ba'i pags pa bsnams pa snang ba mtha' yas kyi dbu rgyan can bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1401E:10a-15: dpal bar padma dang nyi ma la gnas pa'i yi ge bam yongs su gyur pa'i ral gri las phrag dog rdo rje ste /
T02TD1401E:10a-16: zhal gsum phyag drug pa ral pa'i thor tshugs can yan lag thams cad dang rtsa ba'i zhal ljang gu g-yon pa ser zhing /
T02TD1401E:10a-17: g-yas pa sngo ba ral gri dang dril bu bsnams pa phyag gnyis kyis reg rdo rje la 'khyud cing /
T02TD1401E:10b-0: @10b gzhan gyis phrag dog gi bdag nyid kyi tshogs kyi bdag po dral ba'i pags pa bsnams pa /
T02TD1401E:10b-1: don yod grub pa'i dbu rgyan can bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1401E:10b-3: nyi ma la gnas pa'i yi ge h'um yongs su gyur pa'i rdo rje las dbang phyug rdo rje ste /
T02TD1401E:10b-4: yan lag thams cad dang rtsa ba'i zhal dkar po g-yon pa ser zhing g-yas pa sngo ba rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams pa'i phyag gnyis kyis chos kyi dbyings rdo rje dang shin tu snyoms par 'jug pa gzhan gyis dbang phyug thams cad kyi bdag nyid dbang po dral ba'i pags pa bsnams pa mi bskyod pa'i dbu rgyan can bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1401E:10b-5: tha bas ji lta ba de bzhin du shes rab ste de la 'khyud pa'i rtsa ba'i phyag gis me long dang /
T02TD1401E:10b-10: chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi phyag rgya rnams bsnams pas 'khyud pa go rims ji lta ba bzhin du gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa blta bar bya'o //
T02TD1401E:10b-11: de'i rjes su go cha'i phyag rgya bsam par bya ste /
T02TD1401E:10b-12: thugs rdo rje'i 'og tu snying ga'i padma dang zla ba la gnas pa'i aom ha yongs su gyur pa'i rdo rje las rdo rje sems dpa' dkar po dmar po'i mdog can phag mo la 'khyud pa'o //
T02TD1401E:10b-13: mgo bor sku rdo rje'i steng du padma dang zla ba la gnas pa'i na ma hi yongs su gyur pa'i 'khor lo las rnam par snang mdzad ser po sngon po'i mdog can gshin rje ma la 'khyud pa'o //
T02TD1401E:10b-14: spyi gcug [*gtsug] tu padma dang nyi ma la gnas pa'i sv'a h'a hu yongs su gyur pa'i padma las padma gar gyi dbang phyug dmar po dkar po'i mdog can rmongs byed ma la 'khyud pa'o //
T02TD1401E:10b-15: phrag pa gnyis su padma dang nyi ma la gnas pa'i booshta he yongs su gyur pa'i rdo rje las he ru ka sngon po ljang ba'i mdog can skyod byed ma la 'khyud pa'o //
T02TD1401E:10b-16: mig gnyis su ni padma dang nyi ma la gnas pa'i h'um h'um ho yongs su gyur pa'i rin po che las rdo rje nyi ma dmar po du ba'i mdog can skrag byed ma la 'khyud pa'o //
T02TD1401E:11a-0: yan lag thams cad du padma dang nyi ma la gnas pa'i phat ham yongs su gyur pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje las rta mchog yan lag thams cad rlung gi khams ltar khyab pa ljang gu du ba'i mdog can gtum mo @11a * //
T02TD1401E:11a-2: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dpa' bo rnams ni zhal gcig pa phyag bzhi pa spyan gsum ba zhal mche ba rnam bar gtsigs shing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa ral pa'i cod pan la dar gyis bcings shing g-yas brkyang ba'i gnas pa dang ldan zhing rtsa ba'i phyag gis rim pa bzhin du rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang padma dang rdo rje sngon po gdengs pa dang rin po che dang sna tshogs rdo rje rnam par bsnams pas 'khyud par blta'o //
T02TD1401E:11a-3: thams cad kyi g-yon pas ni dril bu ste phyag gzhan gnyis kyis rde'u chung dang kha tv'am ga dang thod pa bsnams pa'o //
T02TD1401E:11a-4: phag mo la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams ni de dang 'dra bar zhal gcig pa phyag bzhi ba spyan gsum pa gcer bu skra grol ba la phyag rgya lngas rnam par brgyan pa /
T02TD1401E:11a-5: g-yon pas dril bu dang kha tv'am ga dang thod pa 'dzin pa g-yas na rde'u chung dang zangs gri /
T02TD1401E:11a-6: gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba la snyoms par zhugs shing /
T02TD1401E:11a-7: shin tu chags pas 'dus pa'i bde ba dam pa'o //
T02TD1401E:11a-8: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs ba'i lha thams cad ni mi bskyod pa'i dbu rgyan can no //
T02TD1401E:11a-9: de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje phag mo'i sku dang gsung dang thugs kyang ye shes sems dpa' dang bcas par aom a'a: bam h'um gis byin gyis brlab par bya zhing mig la sogs pa rnams kyang ji ltar bstan pa'i gti mug rdo rje la sogs pas so //
T02TD1401E:11a-10: de'i lte bar ni aom bam gyis rdo rje phag mo'o //
T02TD1401E:11a-11: snying gar ni ham yom gis gshin rje ma'o //
T02TD1401E:11a-12: khar ni hrim mom gis rmongs byed ma'o //
T02TD1401E:11a-13: mgor ni hrem hrim gis skyod byed ma'o //
T02TD1401E:11a-14: spyi gtsug tu ni h'um h'um gis skrag byed ma'o //
T02TD1401E:11a-15: yan lag thams cad la ni phat phat ste gtum mo'o //
T02TD1401E:11a-16: de'i rjes la rang gi sa bon las 'od zer spros te /
T02TD1401E:11a-17: dza: h'um bam ho:'i sbyor bas rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i rim pas bsang gtor dang /
T02TD1401E:11a-18: zhal bsil dang mchod yon la sogs pa phul la mchod ba thams cad kyis cho ga bzhin du yang dag par mchod do //
T02TD1401E:11b-0: nam mkha'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa la khams gsum pa go rims bzhin du ye shes kyi 'khor lo dam tshig gi 'khor lo la dgug pa @11b ba dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du bya ba ste /
T02TD1401E:11b-1: rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer spros te yang dag par bskul nas /
T02TD1401E:11b-2: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs ba kun gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur de ring bdag la stsol /
T02TD1401E:11b-3: sangs rgyas bdag nyid chen po rnams kyis 'od zer spros pa las gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa'i rim gyis rnal 'byor ma sprul te /
T02TD1401E:11b-4: nam mkha'i khams yongs su gang ba'i bdud rtsi lnga'i bum pa phyag gis bsnams nas dbang bskur bar phyogs pas tshigs bcad 'di yis dbang bskur bar bya ste /
T02TD1401E:11b-5: dbang bskur rdo rje chen po ni //
T02TD1401E:11b-6: khams gsum gyis ni phyag byas pa //
T02TD1401E:11b-7: gsang gsum gnas las byung ba yin //
T02TD1401E:11b-8: sangs rgyas kun gyis byin pa'o //
T02TD1401E:11b-9: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka sa ma ya shri ye h'um /
T02TD1401E:11b-10: dbang bskur bas thugs kyi gtso bos dbu rgyan du gyur to //
T02TD1401E:11b-11: mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams kyis so //
T02TD1401E:11b-12: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi phyag rgyas ni 'khor lo gsum pa'o //
T02TD1401E:11b-13: khva'i gdong pa la sogs pa dang /
T02TD1401E:11b-14: mtshams na gnas pa rnams kyang rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i phyag rgyas gdab par bya la /
T02TD1401E:11b-15: cho ga bzhin du h'um gis rdo rje sprul pa dang ;
T02TD1401E:11b-16: lha mo'i padma gsum pa'i yi ge aes bskyed pa la /
T02TD1401E:11b-17: ae yig gis lte ba dang bam yig gis ge sar bskyed nas rdo rje lcags kyu'i 'od zer des bkug la padma'i rtsar khu ba phebs par mos shing rjes su chags par bya ste /
T02TD1401E:11b-18: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nu r'a ga na badzra sva sha ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD1401E:11b-19: skye gnas kyi sgra yis bskul bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su chags pas rab tu zhugs nas snying gar zhu bar byas la /
T02TD1401E:11b-20: rdo rje'i nang nas padma'i nang du spro bar bya zhing /
T02TD1401E:11b-21: mchod pa'i lha mo bcu drug gi gzugs kyis ba spu'i bu ga'i rtse mo dang mtshams nas spros la cho ga bzhin du mchod la tshogs dbul bar bya ste /
T02TD1401E:11b-22: aom shr'i he ru ka aargham pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a /
T02TD1401E:11b-23: zhes bas zhabs bkru ba ni zhabs la'o //
T02TD1401E:11b-24: zhal bsil ni zhal du phul la phyi nas mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis mchod par bya ste /
T02TD1401E:11b-25: dri dang me tog la sogs pa rnams kyis so //
T02TD1401E:12a-0: dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i dga' @12a * //
T02TD1401E:12a-1: 'grel sgrub thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u gnyis pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02TD1401E:12a-3: // / de nas sgrub pos dngos kun gyis //
T02TD1401E:12a-4: dang por slob dpon mnyes par bya //
T02TD1401E:12a-5: zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa la sogs pa'i don du ci nus pas mchod pa byas la gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02TD1401E:12a-6: shin tu sgra snyan dril bu 'khrol //
T02TD1401E:12a-7: sgrub pa po yis rnga brdungs shing //
T02TD1401E:12a-8: zhes bya ba la dang por cang te'u ru 'dod do //
T02TD1401E:12a-9: de nas dril bu ni lo grangs bcu drug pa'i bu mor gsungs la /
T02TD1401E:12a-10: lnga ni lo grangs bcu gnyis ma'o //
T02TD1401E:12a-11: shin tu sgra snyan zhes bya ba ni ngag snyan zhing gzugs mdzes pa la mdog sdug pa'o //
T02TD1401E:12a-12: rdul zhes bya ba ni rjes su chags par bya ba'o //
T02TD1401E:12a-13: bu sdug de rnams gdong la zhes bya ba ni go sla ba kho na'o //
T02TD1401E:12a-14: 'di'i cho ga'i rim pa ni dbang bskur ba'i rab tu byed par shes par bya'o //
T02TD1401E:12a-15: gzhung mangs kyis dogs pas 'jigs bas na 'dir ma bris so //
T02TD1401E:12a-16: lho yi phyogs su brten pa ni //
T02TD1401E:12a-17: zhes bya ba la sa'i bdag po dang yul 'khor rnyed pa dang ral gri dang sa 'og gi dngos grub rnams dang /
T02TD1401E:12a-18: nad med pa dang ye shes dang thar pa'i don du ni dkyil 'khor gyi shar sgor ro //
T02TD1401E:12a-19: gser 'gyur rtsi dang bcud kyis len ba dag nad med pa dang ;
T02TD1401E:12a-20: nor dang 'bru rab tu sbyin pa dang /
T02TD1401E:12a-21: dpal dang bkra shes dang rtag tu zhi ba'i don du dkyil 'khor gyi lho sgor ro //
T02TD1401E:12a-22: dbang dang dgug pa dang phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02TD1401E:12a-25: skye bo rnams kyi yid du 'ong ba dang /
T02TD1401E:12a-26: bu dang tsha bo la sogs 'phel ba'i don du ni dkyil 'khor gyi nub sgo nas so //
T02TD1401E:12a-27: bstan pa bsrung ba'i don du gdug pa can rnams tshar bcad pa dang /
T02TD1401E:12a-28: dgra rnams bzlog cing pham par bya ba'i don du dkyil 'khor gyi byang sgor ro //
T02TD1401E:12a-29: de yi snyim pas me tog gtor //
T02TD1401E:12a-30: zhes bya ba ni dad pa 'phel zhing sems tshim par bya ba'i don du dbab par bya ste /
T02TD1401E:12a-31: g-yas brkyang ba'i gnas pas bzhag la thal mo sbyar ba snying gar bzung ste /
T02TD1401E:12a-32: rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rlung gi sa bon la rkang pa gnyi ga mnan pa dang /
T02TD1401E:12a-33: snying gar rlung dang sa dang me ste rlung gi sa bon gyis bskyod cing /
T02TD1401E:12b-0: rdo rje phag mo'i rnal 'byor 'dzin @12b pa la ;
T02TD1401E:12b-1: 'jigs pa'i yi ge h'um gis h'um zhes brjod pa dang /
T02TD1401E:12b-2: aa le le le h'um aa: zhes pas rdo rje dril bu'i sgra dang 'jigs pa'i sgra grag par bya ste /
T02TD1401E:12b-3: rab dang dman pa dang bar ma thams cad la 'dis dbab par bya'o //
T02TD1401E:12b-4: de nas skal ba dman pa la ni gsang ba'i ye shes can gyis rang gi yan lag lnga de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i sa bon gyis byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD1401E:12b-6: gu gul chen po dang bcas pas sman bdun cha bsnyams par byas la /
T02TD1401E:12b-7: chang dang gu gul du ldan pa'i bdug pa'i sbyor bas bdug pa sbyar zhing rdo rje phag mo bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD1401E:12b-8: de'i dri mnam pa tsam gyis de'i mod la byin gyis rlob par 'gyur te /
T02TD1401E:12b-9: gsung babs pas ni sngar ma thos pa'i tshigs bcad brjod la /
T02TD1401E:12b-10: thugs babs pas ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa shes par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1401E:12b-11: sku babs pas ni khru gang dang khru dor 'phar bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1401E:12b-12: aom siddha sa ma ya pa ri pa li te h'um h'um h'um ho ho ho sv'a h'a /
T02TD1401E:12b-13: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis rdo rje spyi bor bzung ste gshegs su gsol la /
T02TD1401E:12b-14: me tog gtor nas gang du lhung ba de'i rigs la sbyin par bya ba'am yang na gang 'dod pas so //
T02TD1401E:12b-15: dpal he ru ka la sogs pa'i /
T02TD1401E:12b-16: gnas ni de la bstan par bya //
T02TD1401E:12b-17: zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor tsam de la bstan par bya'i de kho na nyid ni ma yin no //
T02TD1401E:12b-18: de'i rjes la ni chu'i dbang bskur ba la sogs pa bya'o //
T02TD1401E:12b-19: de'i rjes la bum pa'i dbang ngo //
T02TD1401E:12b-20: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gsang ba'i dbang sbyin pa'i don du slob dpon shin tu mnyam par gzhag la mchod par bya'o //
T02TD1401E:12b-21: phyi de nyin par zhes bya ba ni nam phyed na'o //
T02TD1401E:12b-22: mtshal chen zhes bya ba ni lus dang ngag dang sems chags pa las byung ba'i phyir lan gsum bzlas pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1401E:12b-23: aom a'a: h'um zhes bya ba 'dis so //
T02TD1401E:12b-24: de la thig le bya ba yin //
T02TD1401E:12b-25: zhes bya ba ni snying ga dang /
T02TD1401E:12b-29: de nas gdong phye dkyil 'khor bstan //
T02TD1401E:12b-30: zhes bya ba ni thams cad zin nas dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid la sogs pa'i thams cad rdzogs par bstan to //
T02TD1401E:13a-0: de nas bla ma yon zhes bya ba la sogs @13a * //
T02TD1401E:13a-1: dang po'i sangs rgyas las ji skad du /
T02TD1401E:13a-3: gnyis gnyis 'khrig pa'i gnas skabs te //
T02TD1401E:13a-5: gzhan dag tu ni 'jug ba med //
T02TD1401E:13a-7: yang 'og gi sa bon 'bab ma las ni gang ma'i mngal na gnas pa de na sa bon gyi rnam pa gnas la 'chi ba'i dus na ni lam de nas sa bon 'byung bas 'chi ba yin no //
T02TD1401E:13a-8: de yang dbang 'di nyid las ji skad du /
T02TD1401E:13a-9: lus can thams cad 'chi ba na //
T02TD1401E:13a-10: zla ba'i bdud rtsi thur du 'gro //
T02TD1401E:13a-12: skye dang 'chi ba'i dus dang ni //
T02TD1401E:13a-13: zhes pa ni gong du bstan pa nyid dang /
T02TD1401E:13a-15: zhes pa ni 'og gi dbus ma de nas so //
T02TD1401E:13a-16: gzhan yang rlung gi dbang du byas nas lus can thams cad tha mal par gsungs pa ni /
T02TD1401E:13a-17: nyi ma 'pho dang mnyam pa la //
T02TD1401E:13a-21: mnyam pa ni gnyis ka nas so //
T02TD1401E:13a-22: mun can ma ni steng du 'bab //
T02TD1401E:13a-23: ces pa ni mnyam du 'bab pa'i rlung steng nas 'bab pa'o //
T02TD1401E:13a-24: dus sbyor 'byung ba'i mngon mtshams su //
T02TD1401E:13a-25: dbus ma yis ni mnyam par 'bab //
T02TD1401E:13a-26: ces pa ni gzhan yang dus sbyor bcu gnyis po re re yang g-yas pa dang /
T02TD1401E:13a-27: g-yon pa las drug drug tu 'bab pa ste /
T02TD1401E:13a-28: de yang drug pa ni ye shes can zhes bya ba gnyis ka nas /
T02TD1401E:13a-30: lhag ma ni g-yas g-yon nas dkyil 'khor lnga lnga 'bab pa yin te /
T02TD1401E:13a-31: de yang ye shes can zhes bya ba nyid mngon mtshams zhes bya bar dgongs so //
T02TD1401E:13a-33: dbus ma yis ni mnyam par 'bab //
T02TD1401E:13a-35: rkang pa dang bcas lnga bcu drug / ces pa ni dkyil 'khor lnga lnga po re re nas bcu gcig dang bzhi cha re re dbus mar 'jug cing rgyu ste /
T02TD1401E:13a-36: de ltar dkyil 'khor lnga las lnga bcu rtsa drug dang bzhi cha gcig ni dbus ma'i rgyu yin la /
T02TD1401E:13a-37: de lta bu nyid bcu gnyis su bsgres pa las nyi khri chig stong drug brgya nyin mtshan la tshang bar gnas so //
T02TD1401E:13a-39: zhes pa ni gong du brjod ba de nyid dbus ma'i 'byung 'jug go //
T02TD1401E:13a-40: mi dbang kye zhes ba ni bod pa'o //
T02TD1401E:13a-41: bdun cu rtsa lnga lhag pa yis //
T02TD1401E:13a-42: drug brgya nyin mo mtshan mo'o //
T02TD1401E:13a-43: zhes pa ni nyin zhag tshang ba la 'pho ba bcu gnyis yin zhing /
T02TD1401E:13b-0: 'pho ba re re nas rkang pa @13b dang bcas pa lnga bcu rtsa drug dbus mar rgyu ste /
T02TD1401E:13b-1: de nyid bcu gnyis su bsgres pas nyin zhag gcig la drug brgya bdun cu rtsa lnga rgyu'o //
T02TD1401E:13b-2: gang yang drug brgyas lhag pa yi //
T02TD1401E:13b-3: stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig ste //
T02TD1401E:13b-4: zhes pas ni nyi khri chig stong drug brgya nyid yin te de yang brtsi ba'i lugs ni gcig gis mtshan ma'i 'og tu thig le gsum bkod la /
T02TD1401E:13b-5: de la nyi shu rtsa gcig gis bsgyur bas nyi khri chig stong nyid du gnas pa las /
T02TD1401E:13b-6: de la drug khri mtshan ma'i 'og tu thig le gnyis gnas pas nyi khri chig stong drug brgya'o //
T02TD1401E:13b-7: g-yas ba dang ni g-yon ba'i rtsar //
T02TD1401E:13b-9: zhes pa ni nyi khri chig stong drug brgya'i nang nas drug brgya bdun cu rtsa lngas dman pa'i lhag ma ni nyi khri dgu brgyas nyi shu rtsa lngar gnas pa yin te /
T02TD1401E:13b-10: g-yas ba dang ni g-yon pa'i rgyu'o //
T02TD1401E:13b-11: nyi khri dgu brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga las kyang /
T02TD1401E:13b-12: la la n'a dang ra sa n'a //
T02TD1401E:13b-13: zhes bya ba g-yas g-yon so so nas khri bzhi brgya drug cu rtsa gnyis dang rkang pa gnyis su rgyu ba yin te /
T02TD1401E:13b-14: phye bas gsum dang bcas lo gsum //
T02TD1401E:13b-15: zhes pa ni zla ba phyed dang gnyis dang lo gsum mo //
T02TD1401E:13b-17: lo brgya yis ni dbus mar 'gyur //
T02TD1401E:13b-19: gang yang skyes bu tshe lo brgya pa de la'o //
T02TD1401E:13b-20: de la lo brgya la ni zhag sum khri drug stong yin la /
T02TD1401E:13b-21: sum khri drug stong gang yin pa de drug brgya bdun cu rtsa lngas bsgres par 'gyur bas bye ba phrag bzhi dang sum 'bum gyis lhag pa'i sa ya phrag gnyis su 'gyur bar shes par bya'o //
T02TD1401E:13b-22: steng du g-yas dang g-yon pa ni //
T02TD1401E:13b-23: nyi zla lug dang ser skya gzhan //
T02TD1401E:13b-24: zhes pa ni nyi ma dang zla ba'i ming can la mu stegs can gzhan rnams zhugs pa'i phyir /
T02TD1401E:13b-25: lug dang ser skya zhes bya ba gsungs so //
T02TD1401E:13b-26: yang na nyi zla ni steng ngo //
T02TD1401E:13b-27: lug dang ser skya ni 'og go //
T02TD1401E:13b-28: chu dang me'i rang bzhin zhes ba ni g-yas pa'i steng 'og go //
T02TD1401E:13b-30: zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su bzhag ba'i tshul lo //
T02TD1401E:13b-32: ces pa ni 'og gi g-yon pa dang g-yas pa'o //
T02TD1401E:13b-33: sa dang rlung gi rang bzhin zhes pa ni g-yon gyi steng 'og tu'o //
T02TD1401E:13b-34: g-yas ba dang ni g-yon pa'i rtsa //
T02TD1401E:13b-36: 'khor lo ral gri 'dzin pa zhes pa ni /
T02TD1401E:13b-37: de bzhin gshegs par bzhag pa'i tshul te /
T02TD1401E:14a-4: k'am k'anytsar zhes bya ba snying gar ni 'jigs byed chen mo dang rta rnam ste /
T02TD1401E:14a-6: hi hi ma la ya zhes bya ba chu sor ni mig mi bzang dang bya gdong ma ste /
T02TD1401E:14a-9: prem pre ta pu ri zhes te yi dags gnas pa zhes bya ba mtshan ma ni stobs po che dang 'khor lo'i shugs ma ste /
T02TD1401E:14a-11: grim gri ha de ba t'a zhes bya ba bshang ba'i lam du ni rin chen rdo rje dang dum skyes ma ste rnag 'bab pa'o //
T02TD1401E:14a-13: soom soo r'a shta zhes bya ba brla gnyis su ni rta mgrin dang glang sna ma ste /
T02TD1401E:14a-15: sum su barna dva'i pa zhes bya ba byin ba gnyis su ni nam mkha'i snying po dang 'khor lo'i go cha ma ste /
T02TD1401E:14a-18: nam na gar zhes bya ba sor mo rnams su ni dpal he ru ka dang shin tu dpa' mo ste /
T02TD1401E:14a-20: sim sindhu zhes bya ba rkang pa'i bol la ni padma gar gyi dbang phyug dang /
T02TD1401E:14a-21: stobs chen ma ste mchi ma 'bab pa'o //
T02TD1401E:14a-23: mam ma ru zhes bya ba ma the bong gnyis la ni rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02TD1401E:14a-26: kum ku lu ta zhes bya ba pus mo gnyis la ni rdo rje sems dpa' dang brtson 'grus chen mo ste /
T02TD1401E:14a-29: thugs dang gsung dang sku rnams rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du mkha' spyod ma dang sa la spyod ma dang sa 'og na gnas bar bsam mo //
T02TD1401E:14a-30: 'di dag sngon gyi grub pa yin //
T02TD1401E:14a-31: zhes bya ba la nyi shu rtsa bzhi gtso bor byas pas na ri rab kyi rdul gyi grangs snyed rnams bzung ste de rnams bsdus so //
T02TD1401E:14a-32: sangs rgyas bye ba grangs med pa'o //
T02TD1401E:14a-33: zhes bya ba ni rigs pa'o //
T02TD1401E:14a-34: rang ming brjod pa'i sngags zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1401E:14a-35: gsal byed aom gyi sngags dang ni //
T02TD1401E:14a-36: lhan cig tu ni rang mi brjod //
T02TD1401E:14a-37: hum h'um phat ni mthar sbyar te //
T02TD1401E:14a-38: cho ga de ltar rim bzhin bzlas //
T02TD1401E:14a-40: rang ming zhes bya ba ni dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ma rnams kyi mchog ste /
T02TD1401E:14a-41: aom d'a ki n'i ye hum h'um phat /
T02TD1401E:14a-42: ces bya ba la sogs pa dang /
T02TD1401E:14b-1: khanda ka p'a li na pra tsand'i ye hum h'um phat /
T02TD1401E:14b-2: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1401E:14b-3: yang na snying po'i sngags dang spel ma 'am dkyil 'khor pa'i lha dang gcig pa'i rtsa ba'i sngags bzlas te /
T02TD1401E:14b-4: yan lag ma nyams dung phreng dang //
T02TD1401E:14b-5: sangs rgyas rnal 'byor gyis zhi ba //
T02TD1401E:14b-6: rgyas pa rin chen mkha' 'gro ste //
T02TD1401E:14b-8: bskrad pa rta yi rgyal po ste //
T02TD1401E:14b-9: dbye ba mi bskyod gtso bos so //
T02TD1401E:14b-10: kun tu kun don phun tshogs la //
T02TD1401E:14b-13: dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i dka' 'brel gyi sgrub pa'i thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u bzhi pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02TD1401E:14b-15: // / de nas thams cad chos 'byung bar //
T02TD1401E:14b-16: sna tshogs zhes bya ba la chos thams cad ni stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1401E:14b-17: de rnams kyi 'byung gnas pas na 'dir chos kyi 'byung gnas zhes bya'o //
T02TD1401E:14b-18: sna tshogs ni brtan pa dang g-yo ba'i bdag nyid do //
T02TD1401E:14b-19: gang gi lta bar mi shigs dge / zhes bya ba la mi shigs dge ba ni rdo rje 'dzin pa ste /
T02TD1401E:14b-20: dge ba rnams 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1401E:14b-22: chos kun gcig tu bsdu bar bya //
T02TD1401E:14b-23: zhes bya ste bri bar bya zhes bya ba dang 'grel to //
T02TD1401E:14b-24: 'dir zhes bya ba ni chos kyi 'byung gnas la'o //
T02TD1401E:14b-25: der gnas zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo gsum gyi sbyor ba dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD1401E:14b-26: rab rgyas zhes bya ba ni yi ge rnams phreng du bya ba'o //
T02TD1401E:14b-27: bzhi pa yi ni lnga pa dang //
T02TD1401E:14b-28: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi sngags kyi tshigs bcad brgyad pa dang /
T02TD1401E:14b-29: ka ra ka ra zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang bcas pas rtsa ba'i sngags btu ba'o //
T02TD1401E:14b-30: dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel sgrub pa'i thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u lnga pa'i rnam bar bshad pa'o /
T02TD1401E:14b-32: // / gzhan yang yi ge nyi shu gnyis //
T02TD1401E:14b-33: snying po yig bdun nye snying po //
T02TD1401E:14b-34: zhes bya ba ni 'og nas bshad par bya'o //
T02TD1401E:14b-35: ya tshan brgyad pa'i sa bon zhes bya ba ni ha yig bcu gnyis so //
T02TD1401E:14b-36: dor byas pa zhes bya ba ni dbyangs yig ring po rnams dang /
T02TD1401E:14b-37: lhan cig gyur pa'i dbus na gnas pa rnams te /
T02TD1401E:15a-0: aom ha na ma: hi sv'a h'a @15a * //
T02TD1401E:15a-1: h'u boo shat he hum h'um ho phat ham rnams so //
T02TD1401E:15a-2: snying gar yi ge ha dang rdo rje yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje sems dpa' dkar po zhal gcig ba phyag bzhi pa phyag g-yas na rdo rje dang rde'u chung /
T02TD1401E:15a-3: g-yon pa na dril bu dang kha tv'am ga dang thod pa 'dzin pa /
T02TD1401E:15a-4: rdo rje phag mo mdog dmar mo la 'khyud pa'o //
T02TD1401E:15a-5: mgo bor yi ge hi dang 'khor lo yongs su gyur pa las rnam par snang mdzad ser po phyag g-yas na 'khor lo gzhan ni sngar bstan pa bzhin te /
T02TD1401E:15a-6: gshin rje ma mdog sngon mo la 'khyud pa'o //
T02TD1401E:15a-7: spyi gtsug tu yi ge h'um dang padma yongs su gyur pa las padma gar gyi dbang phyug dmar po phyag g-yas na padma bsnams pa rmongs byed ma mdog dkar mo'i mgrin pa nas 'dzin pa ste /
T02TD1401E:15a-8: gzhan ni sngar bstan pa bzhin no //
T02TD1401E:15a-9: phrag pa gnyis su ni yi ge he dang rdo rje yongs su gyur pa las he ru ka mdog sngon po phyag g-yas na rdo rje gdengs pa bsnams pa yang dag par skyod ma mdog ljang gu la 'khyud pa'o //
T02TD1401E:15a-10: lhag ma sngar bstan pa bzhin no //
T02TD1401E:15a-11: mig gnyis su ni yi ge ho dang rin po che yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje nyi ma gser bsregs pa'i mdog can phyag g-yas na rin po che bsnams pa /
T02TD1401E:15a-12: skrag byed ma nam mkha' ltar mthing skya'i mdog can la 'khyud pa ste /
T02TD1401E:15a-13: lhag ma ni sngar bstan pa bzhin no //
T02TD1401E:15a-14: dpral bar yi ge hi dang sna tshogs rdo rje yongs su gyur ba las rta mchog phyag g-yas na sna tshogs rdo rje bsnams pa /
T02TD1401E:15a-15: gtum mo du ba'i mdog can la 'khyud ba ste /
T02TD1401E:15a-17: thams cad kyang rgyan kun gyis brgyan zhing g-yas brkyang ba'i gnas pas gnas pa ral ba'i cod pan dar gyis bcings pa'o //
T02TD1401E:15a-18: dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel sgrub pa'i thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u drug pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02TD1401E:15a-20: // / de nas dbyangs yig ces bya ba la le'u lnga par bstan pa'i gsal byed dang dbyangs su sbyar bar bya ste /
T02TD1401E:15a-21: bcu gsum nyid ces bya ba ni yi ge ao'o //
T02TD1401E:15a-22: yi ge gnyis pa zhes ba ni /
T02TD1401E:15a-23: rim pa ji lta ba bzhin yi ge ma'o //
T02TD1401E:15a-24: dbyangs yig bcu gcig ni ae'o //
T02TD1401E:15b-0: yi ge drug pa ni ta ste rim pa 'di nyid kyis thams cad la sbyar @15b bar bya'o zhes so //
T02TD1401E:15b-1: dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel sgrub pa'i thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u bdun pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02TD1401E:15b-3: // / de nas rang gi bdag nyid gyi [*kyi] //
T02TD1401E:15b-4: zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad gdod nas skye ba med cing bdag med pa'i rang bzhin yongs su dag cing rang bzhin dang bral bas kun du bsam pa'o //
T02TD1401E:15b-5: dpa' bo kun dang mnyam sbyor bas //
T02TD1401E:15b-6: mkha' 'gro kun gyi dra ba sdom //
T02TD1401E:15b-8: snying rje chen po sprul pa'i rang bzhin te //
T02TD1401E:15b-9: rang gi bdag nyid snying po'i sngags yig ni //
T02TD1401E:15b-10: yongs rdzogs dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mchog / skad cig ye shes kyis rdzogs pa //
T02TD1401E:15b-11: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02TD1401E:15b-12: rta babs bzhi yis brgyan ba ste //
T02TD1401E:15b-13: dra ba dra phyed kyis spras pa //
T02TD1401E:15b-14: dar dang me tog phreng 'phyang ba //
T02TD1401E:15b-15: phyi yi dkyil 'khor bstan par bya //
T02TD1401E:15b-16: dbus su rtsibs brgyad 'khor lo la //
T02TD1401E:15b-17: sna tshogs padma bri bar bya //
T02TD1401E:15b-18: zla ba nyi ma'i dbus gnas par //
T02TD1401E:15b-19: h'um gi ye shes rdzogs ba las //
T02TD1401E:15b-20: bde chen bde ba'i 'byung gnas te //
T02TD1401E:15b-22: 'jigs chen ha ha zhes bzhad pas //
T02TD1401E:15b-24: zhal brgyad pa la spyan gsum pa //
T02TD1401E:15b-25: bcu drug phyag gis brgyan pa ste //
T02TD1401E:15b-26: mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan //
T02TD1401E:15b-27: sna tshogs rdo rje mtshan pa yi //
T02TD1401E:15b-28: dbu la zla phyed ral pa 'dzin //
T02TD1401E:15b-29: phyag rgya drug gis rgyas btab sku //
T02TD1401E:15b-30: 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dag //
T02TD1401E:15b-31: g-yas brkyang ba yis yang dag mnan //
T02TD1401E:15b-32: rdo rje dril bus snyoms 'jug cing //
T02TD1401E:15b-33: phag mo'i nu ma 'dzin par byed //
T02TD1401E:15b-34: tshangs pa dral ba'i bags pa ni //
T02TD1401E:15b-35: rlon pa bzung ste sku la mnabs //
T02TD1401E:15b-36: rtse gsum mdung dang dgra sta dang //
T02TD1401E:15b-37: ral gri dad ni cang te'u ste //
T02TD1401E:15b-38: zangs kyi lcags kyu phyag g-yas na'o //
T02TD1401E:15b-39: g-yon pa de bzhin thod pa dang //
T02TD1401E:15b-40: kha dang mgo dang zhags pa dang //
T02TD1401E:15b-41: tho ba sdigs mdzub phyag gzhan na //
T02TD1401E:15b-42: sngo dkar dmar ser ljang gu dang //
T02TD1401E:15b-43: du ba rdul dang thal kha mdog / de lta bu yin la ldan pa //
T02TD1401E:15b-44: bcom ldan 'das kyi sku chen po //
T02TD1401E:15b-45: shes rab ye shes las rdzogs pa //
T02TD1401E:16a-2: / byin pa gnyis kyis yang dag 'khyud //
T02TD1401E:16a-3: spyan gsum skra ni grol ba ste //
T02TD1401E:16a-4: thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan //
T02TD1401E:16a-5: de yi zhal dang dbyibs 'dra ba //
T02TD1401E:16a-6: dum bus mtshan pa'i ska rags can //
T02TD1401E:16a-7: zhal gyi mche ba gtsigs pa'o //
T02TD1401E:16a-8: phyogs gos chags pa'i lta ba dang //
T02TD1401E:16a-9: ro smad cha ni rnam rgyas pa //
T02TD1401E:16a-10: tshangs pa'i pags pa yongs lha mo //
T02TD1401E:16a-11: skal bzangs ldan ma mda' gzhu 'dzin //
T02TD1401E:16a-12: yi ge aom gyi shar 'dab la //
T02TD1401E:16a-13: phyag mtshan mkha' 'gro ma dgod bya //
T02TD1401E:16a-14: ba yi byang gi 'dab ma la //
T02TD1401E:16a-15: rgod ma'i mkha' 'gro ma dgod bya //
T02TD1401E:16a-16: dzra yis nub 'dab snyan grags ma //
T02TD1401E:16a-17: drag shul mkha' 'gro ma dgod bya //
T02TD1401E:16a-18: he yis gser ldan ma zhes pa //
T02TD1401E:16a-19: mkha' 'gro chen mo lho phyogs dgod //
T02TD1401E:16a-20: ser po ljang gu sngon po dang //
T02TD1401E:16a-21: sngo bsangs dang ni dkar dang dmar //
T02TD1401E:16a-22: dkar dang ljang gu sngon po dang //
T02TD1401E:16a-23: de bzhin dmar dang sngo dang ljang //
T02TD1401E:16a-24: thams cad zhal gsum phyag drug pa //
T02TD1401E:16a-26: rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs shing //
T02TD1401E:16a-27: phyogs kyi gos can skra grol ba //
T02TD1401E:16a-28: g-yas brkyang ro yi steng gnas pa //
T02TD1401E:16a-30: drag po'i thod pa'i phreng pa can //
T02TD1401E:16a-31: padma dang ni nu rgyas ma ;
T02TD1401E:16a-32: / zur gyis lta zhing bzhad pa dang //
T02TD1401E:16a-33: snying rjes chags pa'i bde dam pa //
T02TD1401E:16a-34: mda' dang gzhu ni 'dzin mdzad cing //
T02TD1401E:16a-35: zhags pa lcags kyu phyag gzhan na //
T02TD1401E:16a-36: g-yon na kha tv'am thod pa ste //
T02TD1401E:16a-37: g-yas pas cang te'u brdung bar mdzad //
T02TD1401E:16a-38: mtshams bzhir bum par thod pa la //
T02TD1401E:16a-39: byang chub 'o mas yongs bkang ba'o //
T02TD1401E:16a-40: shar phyogs kyi rtsibs la ni yi ge hi yis rtse byed ma zhes bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma'o //
T02TD1401E:16a-41: byang gi rtsibs la ni yi ge ru yis gdu bum zhes bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma'o //
T02TD1401E:16a-42: nub tu ni yi ge ru yis dung phreng can zhes bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma'o //
T02TD1401E:16a-43: lho phyogs su ni kam kis keng rus can ma zhes bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma'o //
T02TD1401E:16a-44: me yi mtshams su h'um gis h'um byed ma'o //
T02TD1401E:16a-45: srin mo'i mtshams su phat mdzad ma'o //
T02TD1401E:16a-46: rlung gi mtshams su ni mdzes can ma'o //
T02TD1401E:16a-47: dbang ldan du ni k'i li k'i li zhes bya ba'i ma mo'o //
T02TD1401E:16a-48: ma mo brgyad po de rnams ni //
T02TD1401E:16b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal @16b mdog sku //
T02TD1401E:16b-1: zhal gcig phyag ni bzhi pa la //
T02TD1401E:16b-2: thod pa kha tv'am dril bu 'dzin //
T02TD1401E:16b-3: kun kyang cang te'u zangs gri can //
T02TD1401E:16b-4: phyogs kyi gos can g-yas brkyang gnas //
T02TD1401E:16b-5: de bzhin thod pa'i phreng ba can //
T02TD1401E:16b-6: phyag rgya lnga yis brgyan pa'o //
T02TD1401E:16b-7: ro yi steng gnas bsgom bya ste //
T02TD1401E:16b-8: drag cing rno la 'jigs rngams pa'o ;
T02TD1401E:16b-9: / dbang ldan mtshams su sngon byung ma //
T02TD1401E:16b-10: rlung mtshams su ni khyung mchog ma //
T02TD1401E:16b-11: srin mo'i mtshams su gsus 'phyang ma //
T02TD1401E:16b-12: me mtshams su ni ri khrod ma //
T02TD1401E:16b-13: ser po ljang gu sngon po dang //
T02TD1401E:16b-14: bzhi pa cung zad dmar po'o //
T02TD1401E:16b-15: zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa //
T02TD1401E:16b-16: thod pa dang ni kha tv'am 'dzin /
T02TD1401E:16b-17: zangs gri cang te'u phyag gzhan na //
T02TD1401E:16b-18: bzhi pa la ni rdo rje'i mdung //
T02TD1401E:16b-19: phyogs kyi dre gas pa'i bde dang ldan //
T02TD1401E:16b-20: gsus pa 'phyang zhing gtsigs pa ste //
T02TD1401E:16b-21: ska rags ring zhing rgyas pa'o //
T02TD1401E:16b-22: spyan gsum rnam 'gyur mi bzad pa //
T02TD1401E:16b-23: skra grol ba la 'jigs mdzad ma //
T02TD1401E:16b-24: thod pa'i phreng ba'i cod pan can //
T02TD1401E:16b-25: rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'o //
T02TD1401E:16b-27: bam gyis mi bzad drag shul can //
T02TD1401E:16b-30: yi ge ras rol rtsed drag can //
T02TD1401E:16b-33: sv'a yis rang 'od dra ba mchog / ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma'o //
T02TD1401E:16b-35: h'a yis rgyal ba'i do shal mchog / ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma'o //
T02TD1401E:16b-36: de rnams zhal gsum phyag drug ma'o //
T02TD1401E:16b-37: sngo dang dmar dang dkar po ste //
T02TD1401E:16b-38: thod pa kha tv'am ga dang ni //
T02TD1401E:16b-39: mgo dang sdigs mdzub phyag g-yon la //
T02TD1401E:16b-40: lcags kyu dang ni zangs gri dang //
T02TD1401E:16b-41: cang te'u g-yas pa'i phyag na'o //
T02TD1401E:16b-42: lho zhal dkar sngo ljang gu ste //
T02TD1401E:16b-43: thod pa kha tv'am zangs gri 'og / sdigs mdzub g-yon te zhags pa dang //
T02TD1401E:16b-44: lcags kyu cang te'u g-yas na'o //
T02TD1401E:16b-45: nub phyogs dmar sngo ljang gu ste //
T02TD1401E:16b-46: lcags sgrog cang te'u zangs gri dang //
T02TD1401E:16b-47: thod pa dang ni kha tv'am ga / mgo bo dang ni sdigs mdzub po //
T02TD1401E:16b-48: byang phyogs ljang dang dkar po dang //
T02TD1401E:16b-49: ser dang dmar 'dres dgyes pa'i zhal //
T02TD1401E:16b-50: 'bebs dang cang te'u gri sdigs mdzub //
T02TD1401E:16b-51: thod pa dang ni mgo bo 'dzin //
T02TD1401E:16b-52: kun kyang skra grol drag chen mo //
T02TD1401E:16b-53: spyan gsum rnam par 'gyur ba'i zhal //
T02TD1401E:17a-2: g-yas brkyang pa yis rnam par bzhugs //
T02TD1401E:17a-3: thod pa'i phreng brgyan dri ma med //
T02TD1401E:17a-4: phyogs kyi gos can dag dang ldan //
T02TD1401E:17a-5: ro dang padma nyi dbus gnas //
T02TD1401E:17a-6: mi bskyod pa yi dbu rgyan can //
T02TD1401E:17a-7: zur mig blta zhing g-yo ba dang //
T02TD1401E:17a-8: snying rjes chags pa'i bde ba can //
T02TD1401E:17a-9: byang phyogs sgo la phyogs par ni //
T02TD1401E:17a-10: snying po ye shes gnas dgod bya //
T02TD1401E:17a-11: aom shri badzra he he ru ru kam h'um h'um phat d'a ki ni dz'a la sam pa ram sv'a h'a /
T02TD1401E:17a-12: sku gsung thugs dang lhan cig tu //
T02TD1401E:17a-13: go cha drug gis brgyan pa ste //
T02TD1401E:17a-14: zhal ni rnam thar brgyad dag pa //
T02TD1401E:17a-15: phyag ni stong pa bcu drug go //
T02TD1401E:17a-16: de'i rjes la snying po nye ba'i snying po yi ge bdun pa'i bdag nyid kyi sngags chen po rdo rje mchog gi dkyil 'khor brjod par bya ste /
T02TD1401E:17a-17: h'um gi yi ge yongs rdzogs las //
T02TD1401E:17a-18: rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba che //
T02TD1401E:17a-19: a'a li k'a li dngos 'byung ba //
T02TD1401E:17a-20: gtso bo zhal gsum phyag drug pa //
T02TD1401E:17a-21: spyan gsum mtshan rnams kun gyis mtshan //
T02TD1401E:17a-22: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu ldan //
T02TD1401E:17a-23: phag mo dang ni gnyis med bde //
T02TD1401E:17a-24: stong nyid snying rje 'khrigs pa yis //
T02TD1401E:17a-25: rdo rje dril bu snyoms 'jug cing //
T02TD1401E:17a-26: phyag gzhan mi yi pags pa'i gos //
T02TD1401E:17a-27: thod pa kha tv'am ga dang ni //
T02TD1401E:17a-28: drug pa la ni mdung rtse gsum //
T02TD1401E:17a-29: thod pa'i phreng bas spras pa ste //
T02TD1401E:17a-30: rgyan rnams thams cad klubs pa yi //
T02TD1401E:17a-31: sna tshogs rdo rje zla phyed dag / ral pa 'dzin zhing g-yas brkyang ba //
T02TD1401E:17a-32: sna tshogs padma nyi dbus su //
T02TD1401E:17a-33: chung mar bcas pa'i 'jigs byed mnan //
T02TD1401E:17a-35: de'i phyi rol du 'khor lo rtsibs drug pa bris la //
T02TD1401E:17a-36: rnal 'byor ma drug der dgod par bya'o //
T02TD1401E:17a-37: rtsibs drug 'khor lo'i dbus su ni //
T02TD1401E:17a-38: myur du dngos grub sbyin byed ma //
T02TD1401E:17a-39: shar phyogs la sogs g-yon skor gyis dgod par bya ste /
T02TD1401E:17a-40: yi ge phat kyis ni dpal rol rtsed ma ste lha mo dang po'o //
T02TD1401E:17a-41: yi ge h'um gis ni rdo rje 'jigs byed ma ste gnyis pa'o //
T02TD1401E:17a-42: yi ge ha yis ni gtum drag ma ste gsum pa'o //
T02TD1401E:17a-43: yi ge ho yis ni rdo rje snang byed ma ste bzhi pa'o //
T02TD1401E:17a-44: yi ge hr'i: yis ni rdo rje drag mo ste lnga pa'o //
T02TD1401E:17a-45: yi ge aom gyis ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma ste drug pa'o //
T02TD1401E:17b-0: lha @17b mo de rnams zhal gcig pa //
T02TD1401E:17b-1: phyag bzhi drag chen spyan gsum ste //
T02TD1401E:17b-2: skra grol phyogs kyi gos dang ldan //
T02TD1401E:17b-3: thams cad yi dags nyi steng gnas //
T02TD1401E:17b-4: de rnams sngo dang ser ba dang //
T02TD1401E:17b-5: ljang gu dmar dang dud ka dkar //
T02TD1401E:17b-6: kun kyang cang te'u dril bsnams shing //
T02TD1401E:17b-7: mi yi pags pa gnyis kyis 'jon //
T02TD1401E:17b-8: thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can //
T02TD1401E:17b-9: g-yas brkyang pa yi gnas pas bzhugs //
T02TD1401E:17b-10: yi ge drug las yang dag byung //
T02TD1401E:17b-11: dngos grub nye bar byed pa mo //
T02TD1401E:17b-12: mgon po'i sku mdog ji lta bar //
T02TD1401E:17b-13: de bzhin du ni phag mo ste //
T02TD1401E:17b-14: dbyibs dang phyag rgya de dang mtshungs //
T02TD1401E:17b-15: mi yi pags pa spangs nas su //
T02TD1401E:17b-16: lha mo mda' gzhu bsnams par mdzad //
T02TD1401E:17b-17: yan lag kun dang rtsa zhal sngo //
T02TD1401E:17b-18: g-yas dang g-yon ni ser dang ljang //
T02TD1401E:17b-19: rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs shing //
T02TD1401E:17b-20: lha mo'i pus mo gnyis 'khyud pas //
T02TD1401E:17b-21: mchog tu dga' bas myos pa mo //
T02TD1401E:17b-22: snying gar ye shes gnas bsams shing //
T02TD1401E:17b-23: sku gsung thugs kyis byin brlabs pa //
T02TD1401E:17b-24: go cha gnyis kyis rnam par brgyan //
T02TD1401E:17b-25: spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1401E:17b-26: shin tu mnyam gzhag sngags bzlas bya //
T02TD1401E:17b-27: aom hri: ha ha hum h'um phat /
T02TD1401E:17b-28: yi ge drug po de rnams kyis //
T02TD1401E:17b-29: mkha' 'gro ma drug byang chub kyi //
T02TD1401E:17b-30: yan lag drug mchog bsgom bar bya //
T02TD1401E:17b-31: bdun pa dbus su gyur pa ni //
T02TD1401E:17b-32: yi ge h'um mdzad he ru ka / dran pa byang chub yan lag sogs //
T02TD1401E:17b-34: aom dhi dhi dhim h'um phat /
T02TD1401E:17b-35: yi ge pom dang yom dang ni //
T02TD1401E:17b-36: yi ge mom dang hrim nyid dang //
T02TD1401E:17b-37: h'um dang phat ces bshad pa ni //
T02TD1401E:17b-38: rnal 'byor ma ni drug tu grags //
T02TD1401E:17b-39: yi ge re re yang dag gnas //
T02TD1401E:17b-40: zhes bya ba de la 'di'i cho ga rim pa bzhin dgod par bya'o //
T02TD1401E:17b-41: padma 'dab ma lnga pa lte ba dang ge sar gyis 'khrigs pa bris la de'i dbus su ni yi ge bam las yang dag bar byung ba'i phag mo ni /
T02TD1401E:17b-43: zhal gsum phyag drug zhi ba ste //
T02TD1401E:17b-44: spyan gsum pa la skra grol ba //
T02TD1401E:17b-45: thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can //
T02TD1401E:17b-46: phyogs gos phyed krung bcas pa'i gar //
T02TD1401E:17b-47: phyag rgya drug gis btab pa'i sku //
T02TD1401E:17b-48: mgo bo'i me tog phreng ba can //
T02TD1401E:17b-49: dus mtshan 'og tu byas nas su //
T02TD1401E:18a-0: @18a * // rkang pas mnan par gyur pa na //
T02TD1401E:18a-1: sdang ba kun dang lha bdud dgra / me ltar 'bar ba dmar chen ma //
T02TD1401E:18a-2: g-yas dang g-yon ni sdo dang ljang //
T02TD1401E:18a-3: thod pa nyid dang kha tv'am ga / zhags pa lcags kyu de bzhin te //
T02TD1401E:18a-4: mgo dang zangs gri 'dzin pa ni //
T02TD1401E:18a-5: dngos grub thams cad sbyin byed pa'o //
T02TD1401E:18a-6: shar phyogs la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams ni g-yon skor gyis bsam par bya ste /
T02TD1401E:18a-9: hr'im gis yang dag skyod ma'o //
T02TD1401E:18a-11: phat kyis ni gtum mo ste /
T02TD1401E:18a-12: de rnams thams cad zhal gcig dang //
T02TD1401E:18a-13: phyag bzhi spyan gsum skra grol ba //
T02TD1401E:18a-14: phyogs kyi gos can gar gyi mchog / phyag rgya lnga yis brgyan byas shing //
T02TD1401E:18a-15: mgo yi phreng ba'i do shal byas //
T02TD1401E:18a-16: rang rig snang ba'i dbu rgyan can //
T02TD1401E:18a-17: snying rjes 'khrug pa'i bde dam pa //
T02TD1401E:18a-18: sngo dang dkar dang ser po dang //
T02TD1401E:18a-19: ljang dang du ba skya bo ste //
T02TD1401E:18a-20: thod pa dang ni kha tv'am 'dzin //
T02TD1401E:18a-21: dril bu dang ni cang te'u gri //
T02TD1401E:18a-23: gnyis med sbyor ba snyoms zhugs pas //
T02TD1401E:18a-24: rdo rje sems sogs thams cad ni //
T02TD1401E:18a-25: 'khyud la sogs pa'i rim pa bzhin //
T02TD1401E:18a-26: phyag dang mtshon cha mdog sngo gsung //
T02TD1401E:18a-27: lte ba snying ga mgrin pa mgo //
