T02TD1401E:35a-23: bram ze rnam snang bshad pa ste //
T02TD1401E:35a-24: rin chen tsand'a l'ir shes bya //
T02TD1401E:35a-25: gar mkhan dpag med mgon po ste //
T02TD1401E:35a-26: tshos mkhan don yod rdo rje can //
T02TD1401E:35a-27: mi bskyod pa yi dombi ste //
T02TD1401E:35a-28: drug pa rdo rje sems dpa' yi //
T02TD1401E:35a-29: rgyal rigs su ni shes par bya //
T02TD1401E:35a-30: bdun pa he ru ka yi ni //
T02TD1401E:35a-31: sna tshogs rigs 'byung dmangs rigs so //
T02TD1401E:35a-32: g-yon nas 'gro ba'i bud med gang //
T02TD1401E:35a-33: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla ste /
T02TD1401E:35a-34: sgrub pa po'i thabs rjes su mthun pa'i phyir des nan tan du shes par bya'o //
T02TD1401E:35a-35: dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel sgrub pa'i thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u bcu drug pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02TD1401E:35a-37: // / de nas rnyed dka' zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02TD1401E:35a-38: chags pa chen po'i rang bzhin nyid ni 'dod chags bral ba la sogs pas rnyed par dka' ba'o //
T02TD1401E:35b-0: bdud rtsi lnga zhes bya ba la lnga ni sa la sogs @35b pa'o ;
T02TD1401E:35b-1: / dngos bden pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni chos thams cad bsdus par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD1401E:35b-2: de nas lnga po rnams kyi bdud rtsi ni stong pa nyid kyi snying po ste /
T02TD1401E:35b-3: yang dag sbyor bas gcig bsdus pa //
T02TD1401E:35b-4: snying po gang yin de bde ba //
T02TD1401E:35b-5: rlung zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems //
T02TD1401E:35b-6: dbang po kun gyi gtso 'di yin //
T02TD1401E:35b-7: de yi dbus su yang dag bskyed //
T02TD1401E:35b-8: yi ge la sogs pa yi gzugs //
T02TD1401E:35b-9: gzugs can ma dang rnal 'byor ma //
T02TD1401E:35b-10: l'a m'a dang ni dum skyes te //
T02TD1401E:35b-11: zhal bzhir par ni rnam par bshad //
T02TD1401E:35b-12: sbyor ba bzhi dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD1401E:35b-13: lnga pa 'khor los sgyur ba ste //
T02TD1401E:35b-14: ge sar dang ni lte bar ldan //
T02TD1401E:35b-15: 'dab ma bzhi yis yang dag mtshan //
T02TD1401E:35b-16: de dbus dpa' bo chen po ste //
T02TD1401E:35b-17: phyag brgyad kyis ni rnam par brgyan //
T02TD1401E:35b-18: dang po'i sha yis yongs bkang ba //
T02TD1401E:35b-19: de bzhin gnyis pa'i khrag gis te //
T02TD1401E:35b-20: lhag ma'i phyag gnyis dbang bskur ba'i //
T02TD1401E:35b-21: dra ba'i phyag rgya 'dzin par mdzad //
T02TD1401E:35b-22: lnga pa drug pas lha mo 'khyud //
T02TD1401E:35b-23: gzhan gyis kha tv'am cang te'u //
T02TD1401E:35b-25: ston ka'i nam mkha' dri med bzhin //
T02TD1401E:35b-26: dkar po dmar po sngo dang ljang //
T02TD1401E:35b-28: gshin rje ma dang skrag byed ma //
T02TD1401E:35b-29: nags tshal ma dang 'jigs ma dang //
T02TD1401E:35b-30: kun spyod tshe za ba su ra //
T02TD1401E:35b-31: brgyad pa phag mor yang dag brjod //
T02TD1401E:35b-32: gru bzhi pa la sgo dang mtshams //
T02TD1401E:35b-33: brgyad du rnam par 'gyur zhing 'jigs pa nyid //
T02TD1401E:35b-34: sha dang khu ba gsol ba ste //
T02TD1401E:35b-35: dang po rgyas 'debs phyag rgya ste //
T02TD1401E:35b-36: gnyis pa snying dral ba yi rgya //
T02TD1401E:35b-37: gsum pa rmongs byed phyag rgya ste //
T02TD1401E:35b-38: de bzhin bzhi pa slong ba'i rgya //
T02TD1401E:35b-39: lnga pa gar gyi phyag rgya ste //
T02TD1401E:35b-40: de bzhin drug pa gsod pa'i rgya //
T02TD1401E:35b-41: bdun pa 'jog par byed ba ste //
T02TD1401E:35b-42: brgyad pa ldang pa'i phyag rgyar nges //
T02TD1401E:35b-43: phyag rgya brgyad du bshad pa'o //
T02TD1401E:35b-44: phyag gi mtshon char yang dag ldan //
T02TD1401E:35b-45: 'od zer phreng ba du ma las //
T02TD1401E:35b-46: sangs rgyas tshogs kyi sprin 'phro ba //
T02TD1401E:35b-47: thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni //
T02TD1401E:35b-48: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che //
T02TD1401E:35b-49: yang na sngon du bstan pa bzhin //
T02TD1401E:35b-50: 'khor lo gsum po 'od kyis nam mkha' rgyas pa ste //
T02TD1401E:36a-2: dbus su 'khor lo yang dag bri //
T02TD1401E:36a-3: ge sar dang ni lte bar ldan //
T02TD1401E:36a-4: 'dab ma bzhi dang ldan par bshad //
T02TD1401E:36a-5: kha dog sna tshogs yang dag 'bar //
T02TD1401E:36a-6: de dbus dpa' bo dgod pa'o //
T02TD1401E:36a-7: shel ltar dag pa dri ma med //
T02TD1401E:36a-8: dang po'i zhal ni rnam bzhad cing //
T02TD1401E:36a-9: chags pa'i lta bas rnam par gzigs //
T02TD1401E:36a-10: khro gnyer rab tu 'bar ba dang //
T02TD1401E:36a-11: mche ba gtsigs pas 'jigs par mdzad //
T02TD1401E:36a-12: g-yas kyi zhal ni gdengs pa ste //
T02TD1401E:36a-13: g-yon pa ngo mtshar che ba nyid //
T02TD1401E:36a-14: rgya ba zhal 'jigs pa che ba ste //
T02TD1401E:36a-16: dkar dang dmar dang de bzhin sngo //
T02TD1401E:36a-17: ljang gu rnams kyi gdong can no //
T02TD1401E:36a-18: phyag brgyad par ni yang dag bri //
T02TD1401E:36a-19: rgyan kun 'dzin pa dpal dang ldan //
T02TD1401E:36a-21: 'jig pa'i dus ltar drag shul che //
T02TD1401E:36a-22: dur khrod du ni 'jigs shing rngam //
T02TD1401E:36a-23: ha ha zhes bzhad cher bzhad cing //
T02TD1401E:36a-24: yi ge phem [?] gyi sgra sgrogs pa'o //
T02TD1401E:36a-25: zhal gcig pa dang phyag gnyis su //
T02TD1401E:36a-26: lha rnams bzhi po bshad pa ste //
T02TD1401E:36a-27: shar du rdo rje sems dpa' yin //
T02TD1401E:36a-28: lho ru rnam snang mdzad du brjod //
T02TD1401E:36a-29: nub tu don yod rgyal po ste //
T02TD1401E:36a-30: byang du padma gar dbang ngo ;
T02TD1401E:36a-31: / kha tv'am thod pa phyag bsnams nas //
T02TD1401E:36a-32: khrag dang khu ba dag gsol mdzad //
T02TD1401E:36a-33: 'khor lo'i dbus su he ru ka / sngon bstan mtshon cha bsnams nas bzhugs //
T02TD1401E:36a-34: gnyis pa 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad che //
T02TD1401E:36a-36: de la lugs 'byung lugs bzlog pas //
T02TD1401E:36a-37: dgod pa nyid du rab tu grags //
T02TD1401E:36a-38: gzugs can ma dang 'o byed ma //
T02TD1401E:36a-39: l'a ma yongs 'gyur byis bcas mo //
T02TD1401E:36a-40: mi ldog lha mo d'i pa mo //
T02TD1401E:36a-41: brgyad pa rdo rje'i gar dbang brjod //
T02TD1401E:36a-42: nang gi lha mo'i gzugs brgyad ni //
T02TD1401E:36a-43: sku mdog dkar la 'bar dang bcas //
T02TD1401E:36a-44: phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig pa //
T02TD1401E:36a-45: khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pa dang //
T02TD1401E:36a-46: kha tv'am ga ni phyag gis 'dzin //
T02TD1401E:36a-47: spyan gsum rgyan kun 'bar dang bcas //
T02TD1401E:36a-48: sgeg dang bcas pa'i lha yi lus //
T02TD1401E:36a-49: snying rje dga' ba'i mdzes dang ldan //
T02TD1401E:36a-50: de nas thugs gsung sku yi ni //
T02TD1401E:36b-0: 'khor lo lha @36b rnams dgod par bshad //
T02TD1401E:36b-1: shar phyogs pa la sogs pa ji lta ba bzhin lugs su 'byung ba dang lugs las bzlog pas /
T02TD1401E:36b-2: dung can ma dang lbos [?] mo dang //
T02TD1401E:36b-3: gsod byed ma dang ser mo dang //
T02TD1401E:36b-4: dral byed de bzhin gtum mo ste //
T02TD1401E:36b-5: ri khrod nyid dang sgrol ma'o //
T02TD1401E:36b-6: de dag ni thugs kyi 'khor lo'i'o //
T02TD1401E:36b-7: khro gnyer khams gsum rnam rgyal ma //
T02TD1401E:36b-8: so can de bzhin za byed ma //
T02TD1401E:36b-9: sna chen ma dang ba lang gdong //
T02TD1401E:36b-10: byi la can dang glang chen lce //
T02TD1401E:36b-11: de dag ni gsung gi 'khor lo'i'o //
T02TD1401E:36b-12: ba lang sna dang bzhin bzangs ma //
T02TD1401E:36b-13: dmar gtum ma dang so sngo bsangs //
T02TD1401E:36b-14: stobs chen nags tshal dri ldan ma //
T02TD1401E:36b-15: mdog khra mo dang bde na g-yon ma //
T02TD1401E:36b-17: de dag sgeg gdong sgeg dang bcas //
T02TD1401E:36b-18: snying rjes gdungs shing myos dang ldan //
T02TD1401E:36b-19: rang ming brjod pa'i sngags la ni //
T02TD1401E:36b-20: aom dang h'um h'um phat sbyor pas //
T02TD1401E:36b-21: thugs gsung sku yi dbye ba yis //
T02TD1401E:36b-22: lha mo rnams ni mdog sngo zhing //
T02TD1401E:36b-23: zangs gri dang ni thod pa can //
T02TD1401E:36b-24: gang yang sku mdog dmar lha mo //
T02TD1401E:36b-25: padma dang ni thod pa can //
T02TD1401E:36b-26: lha mo sku mdog dkar ba dang //
T02TD1401E:36b-27: mdung thung dang ni kha tv'am thogs //
T02TD1401E:36b-28: dka' bzlog nyid dang ts'a mund'i //
T02TD1401E:36b-29: tshangs pa dang ni khyab 'jug ma //
T02TD1401E:36b-30: sgo rnams skyong bar yang dag bshad //
T02TD1401E:36b-31: sgo bzhi rnams su sbyar bar bya //
T02TD1401E:36b-32: gang gis kha tv'am thod pa ste //
T02TD1401E:36b-33: khrag dang khu ba gsol mdzad pa'o //
T02TD1401E:36b-34: kun kyang rgyan kun yongs rdzogs shing //
T02TD1401E:36b-35: skra grol gcer bur gyur pa yi //
T02TD1401E:36b-36: snying rje dga' ba'i bde ba che //
T02TD1401E:36b-39: thams cad bza' bar gang rigs pa //
T02TD1401E:36b-40: dngos por rang bzhin mnyam bsres te //
T02TD1401E:36b-41: dag dang mdag ngor mi lta //
T02TD1401E:36b-42: rigs dang mi rigs min de bzhin //
T02TD1401E:36b-43: de nyid bcu ni rig pa yis //
T02TD1401E:36b-44: thams cad za zhing longs spyod bya ;
T02TD1401E:36b-45: / bud med mtshan nyid shes byas la //
T02TD1401E:36b-46: de nyid rig pas mchod par bya //
T02TD1401E:36b-47: mngon par zhen pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02TD1401E:36b-48: sgra ji bzhin pa ste gsal lo //
T02TD1401E:36b-50: gzugs can ri mo can du brjod //
T02TD1401E:36b-51: dung can 'o byed mar gsungs te //
T02TD1401E:36b-52: l'a ma nyid ni glang chen ma //
T02TD1401E:37a-2: mi ldog pa'i la bir shes bya /
T02TD1401E:37a-3: d'i pa mo dang phur bu ma //
T02TD1401E:37a-4: re re yang ni gnyis gnyis su //
T02TD1401E:37a-5: so so yi ni mtshan nyid 'gyur //
T02TD1401E:37a-6: padma can ni phad dri dang //
T02TD1401E:37a-7: glang chen myos pa'i stobs bzhin du //
T02TD1401E:37a-8: dbyangs snyan snyan par smra ba dang //
T02TD1401E:37a-9: mnyen bzhin lang tsho 'bar ba'i gzugs //
T02TD1401E:37a-10: yan lag rtsub la padma yi //
T02TD1401E:37a-12: sna dang so ni phrad de yang //
T02TD1401E:37a-13: sor mo thung zhing yan lag mnyen //
T02TD1401E:37a-14: sen mo 'jam zhing zangs kyi mdog / bzhin ni rab tu zhi ba ste //
T02TD1401E:37a-16: zhi ba'i las la sbyar bar bya //
T02TD1401E:37a-17: glang po can ma glang po'i dri //
T02TD1401E:37a-18: mchu 'phyang byin pa sbom ma dang //
T02TD1401E:37a-19: glang chen myos pa'i stabs su 'gro //
T02TD1401E:37a-20: sor mo ring zhing lus po ring //
T02TD1401E:37a-21: nu ma 'phyang zhing skra rtsub la //
T02TD1401E:37a-22: lte ba mtho zhing nu ma rtsub //
T02TD1401E:37a-23: mig ni phra zhing sbrang rtsi sred //
T02TD1401E:37a-24: snyan par smra zhing skad 'dzer ba //
T02TD1401E:37a-25: 'dod ldan ro smad mchu sbom zhing //
T02TD1401E:37a-26: rkang mthil mnyam par gnas pa ste //
T02TD1401E:37a-27: chang la dga' zhing dus rtag tu //
T02TD1401E:37a-28: nor 'dod glang po can ma ste //
T02TD1401E:37a-29: rgyas pa'i sbyor ba brtsam par bya //
T02TD1401E:37a-30: dung can ma ni dung mdog dang //
T02TD1401E:37a-31: zhib ma'i gdong can byin pa ring //
T02TD1401E:37a-32: bya rog skad dang bong bu dri //
T02TD1401E:37a-33: so sbom sor mo ring ba ste //
T02TD1401E:37a-34: skra rtsub yan lag 'jam pa dang //
T02TD1401E:37a-35: lus bong mtho zhing mig chung ma //
T02TD1401E:37a-36: mgrin pa phra zhing so thag ngan //
T02TD1401E:37a-37: sna mtho mchan khung sbu yod pa //
T02TD1401E:37a-38: mchu srab gdugs kyi rnam pa can //
T02TD1401E:37a-39: dung can ma ni khyim thab gsod //
T02TD1401E:37a-40: dbang gi las la sbyar bar bya //
T02TD1401E:37a-41: ri mo can ma rtag tu ni //
T02TD1401E:37a-42: ri mo la dga' sna tshogs mdog / sna tshogs gzugs can nu ma 'phyang //
T02TD1401E:37a-43: sen mo mnyan zhing skad chung la //
T02TD1401E:37a-44: lus bong chung zhing byad kyang chung //
T02TD1401E:37a-45: sgra ngan bya rog rang bzhin can //
T02TD1401E:37a-46: bya rog sgra skad sha la dga' //
T02TD1401E:37a-47: tshig rtsub 'dod pa'i nus dang ldan //
T02TD1401E:37a-48: nag po'i las la sbyar bar bya //
T02TD1401E:37a-49: padma can ni lha yi rigs //
T02TD1401E:37a-50: glang po can ma gnod sbyin rgyud //
T02TD1401E:37a-51: dung can ma ni mir shes bya //
T02TD1401E:37a-52: ri mo can ma yi dags rigs //
T02TD1401E:37a-53: ba ta pa ya lha yi rigs //
T02TD1401E:37a-54: gdugs kyi dpung pa mgrin pa ring //
T02TD1401E:37a-55: so snang ba la mchu snum zhing //
T02TD1401E:37a-56: mig ni padma ltar dmar ba'i //
T02TD1401E:37a-57: skye gnas yangs shing dbral ba yi //
T02TD1401E:37b-0: @37b dbyes che skra snum ser skya'o //
T02TD1401E:37b-1: lus po ran zhing ring ba yi //
T02TD1401E:37b-2: sna mtho sna ni rno ba ste //
T02TD1401E:37b-3: yan lag 'jam zhing lag pa'ang ring //
T02TD1401E:37b-4: ngang pa'i 'gros can ngang pa'i skad //
T02TD1401E:37b-5: dri dang me tog 'o ma sred //
T02TD1401E:37b-6: lhug par gtong zhing lha la gus //
T02TD1401E:37b-7: bud med dbang phyug rnams kyi gtso //
T02TD1401E:37b-8: nyung du za zhing nor dang ldan //
T02TD1401E:37b-9: rgyas pa'i las la sbyar bar bya //
T02TD1401E:37b-10: pi la pi ni nu rgyas ma //
T02TD1401E:37b-11: lus bong mtho zhing byin pa sbom //
T02TD1401E:37b-12: ngo chen mig ni phra ba ste //
T02TD1401E:37b-13: rna ba 'phyang zhing skra rtsub pa //
T02TD1401E:37b-14: bung ba'i skad la mchu 'phyang ma //
T02TD1401E:37b-15: lus rgyas lto ni mang du za //
T02TD1401E:37b-16: 'dod pa chung zhing rtag stobs ldan //
T02TD1401E:37b-17: tshogs pa la dga' dbung pa 'phyang //
T02TD1401E:37b-18: yan lag rtsub cing skra ring ba //
T02TD1401E:37b-19: so sna sen mo 'jam pa ste //
T02TD1401E:37b-20: rkang pa mnyam zhing sna ring la //
T02TD1401E:37b-21: lto ni bum pa ltar sbom zhing //
T02TD1401E:37b-22: bum pa'i 'phyang ba la mdzes pa'i bzhin //
T02TD1401E:37b-23: zhi dang rgyas la'ang sbyar bar bya //
T02TD1401E:37b-24: phur bu ma ni mig g-yo zhing //
T02TD1401E:37b-25: 'og mig can la gdong srab pa //
T02TD1401E:37b-26: so snang lus kyi sha srab cing //
T02TD1401E:37b-28: mgo skya bus pa ltar 'gro zhing //
T02TD1401E:37b-29: sbur zhing lus bong chung ba ste //
T02TD1401E:37b-30: lag pa thung zhing nu ma mtho //
T02TD1401E:37b-31: smin sbom dpral chung byin yang sbom //
T02TD1401E:37b-32: de yis reg na mi 'tsho ste //
T02TD1401E:37b-33: nye du rnams ni brlag par byed //
T02TD1401E:37b-34: nag po'i las la sbyar bar bya //
T02TD1401E:37b-35: brgyad pa ri dags ma skal bzang //
T02TD1401E:37b-36: lto ba chung zhing rkang pa chung //
T02TD1401E:37b-37: ri dags mgrin pa ri dags mig / skra ni phra zhing snum pa ste //
T02TD1401E:37b-38: so yang sral mchu snum pa //
T02TD1401E:37b-39: gzugs mdzes thig le lta bu'i byang //
T02TD1401E:37b-40: reg 'jam sred pa mang du smra //
T02TD1401E:37b-41: sgra ni bya rog skad lta bu //
T02TD1401E:37b-42: rtag tu gcer bu dbul ba yin //
T02TD1401E:37b-43: sems rtsub pa la sdig la dga' //
T02TD1401E:37b-44: skur 'debs ma de yi dags rigs //
T02TD1401E:37b-45: dbang gi las la sbyar bar bya //
T02TD1401E:37b-46: 'di brgyad du ni rab tu grags //
T02TD1401E:37b-47: thod pa dang dgra sta la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brgyad ni /
T02TD1401E:37b-48: ji ltar bstan pa'i rigs kyi go rims bzhin du gzugs can ma la sogs pa'i phyag dang po'i mtshan ma'o //
T02TD1401E:37b-49: gzhan gyi kha tv'am ga dang thod pa nas khrag dang khu ba gsol ba'o //
T02TD1401E:38a-0: dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel sgrub pa'i thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u bcu bdun pa'i rnam par bshad @38a * //
T02TD1401E:38a-2: // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba //
T02TD1401E:38a-3: mkha' 'gro ma yi go 'phang mchog / ces bya ba la mchog ni mang po'i rigs te /
T02TD1401E:38a-4: mang por 'gyur ba'i rigs rnams so //
T02TD1401E:38a-6: dam pa'i rigs ni rnam pa brgya //
T02TD1401E:38a-8: rab tu gnas bas na go 'phang ste //
T02TD1401E:38a-9: gang gi mtshan nyid gsung ba de nyid kyis yongs su dag pa'o //
T02TD1401E:38a-10: dam tshig ces bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi rjes su 'jug pa ste /
T02TD1401E:38a-12: dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel sgrub pa'i thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u bco brgyad pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02TD1401E:38a-14: // / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba //
T02TD1401E:38a-15: zhes bya ba ni mdog dang mtshan ma'i rjes su'o //
T02TD1401E:38a-16: l'a ma zhes bya ba ni yid du 'ong ba reg pa la sogs pa'i yon tan gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa ste /
T02TD1401E:38a-17: yan lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
T02TD1401E:38a-18: gang gi bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02TD1401E:38a-19: srin mo zhes bya ba ni sbyor ba gcig pa'o //
T02TD1401E:38a-20: padma'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1401E:38a-21: lag pa gnyis padma skor bar sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD1401E:38a-22: yang na padma'i phyag rgya ni padma'i phyag rgya ste /
T02TD1401E:38a-24: langs pa'am ni stan dag la //
T02TD1401E:38a-25: mdun du skal bzang bzhag nas ni //
T02TD1401E:38a-26: padma rab tu rgyas par bya //
T02TD1401E:38a-27: myur du gnyis gnyis sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1401E:38a-28: mkhas pas rdo rjes rgyas gdab bya //
T02TD1401E:38a-29: rus sbal gyi phyag rgya ni lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar ba'o //
T02TD1401E:38a-30: rus sbal phyag rgya bha gar ni //
T02TD1401E:38a-31: thal mo brdeg dang ldan reg bya //
T02TD1401E:38a-32: phyag rgya sngags kyi sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1401E:38a-33: sa yis ma mchu btsir bar byed //
T02TD1401E:38a-34: mi thub ri dags lpags pa'o //
T02TD1401E:38a-35: yang na 'jam zhing mtshan nyid bzang //
T02TD1401E:38a-36: mi thub stan du shes par bya //
T02TD1401E:38a-37: spyi blugs thod pa zhes brjod de //
T02TD1401E:38a-38: yang na spyi blugs lus su brjod //
T02TD1401E:38a-39: lag gnyis mgrin par dam 'khyud nas //
T02TD1401E:38a-40: ji ltar skyil krung bcas nas 'khyud //
T02TD1401E:38a-41: ji ltar phyag rgya rtogs 'gyur ba //
T02TD1401E:38a-42: phyag rgya'i lan du brjod pa yin //
T02TD1401E:38a-43: tshes bcu bzhi zhes bya ba la sogs pa go sla'o //
T02TD1401E:38a-44: yang na tshes bcu bzhi'i gnas skabs ji ltar rnyed /
T02TD1401E:38a-45: padma rnam par rgyas shing 'bar dang ldan //
T02TD1401E:38b-0: @38b dpal ldan gang gi sems ni gang mnyam pa //
T02TD1401E:38b-1: de ni padma can gyi mtshan nyid yin //
T02TD1401E:38b-2: mchu gnyis glo zhing zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02TD1401E:38b-3: mdung zhes bya ba ni ser mo gcig bstan pa'i phyag rgya sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD1401E:38b-4: de nas rdo rje skyil krung gis //
T02TD1401E:38b-5: rang gi rdo rje der gnas pa'o //
T02TD1401E:38b-6: gar nyid kyang ni bstan par bya //
T02TD1401E:38b-9: byed pas bsdams pa'i phyag rgya rnams //
T02TD1401E:38b-10: rab tu bskor ba byas nas ni //
T02TD1401E:38b-11: glang chen ma dang bde sgrub ma'o //
T02TD1401E:38b-12: bcu bzhi zhes bya ba ni go sla'o //
T02TD1401E:38b-13: ci nus pas mchod par bya'o zhes bya ba'o //
T02TD1401E:38b-14: dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel sgrub pa'i thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u bcu dgu pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02TD1401E:38b-16: // / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
T02TD1401E:38b-17: lag pa g-yon gyi brda rnams te //
T02TD1401E:38b-18: zhes bya ba la brda rnams kyi gnyis ka'i rang bzhin gcig tu gyur nas ming po dang sring mo ltar shin tu gdung ba'i dpang du gyur nas bsgom pa thams cad byed do zhes bya ba'o //
T02TD1401E:38b-19: dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel sgrub pa'i thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u nyi shu pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02TD1401E:38b-21: // / de nas gsang ba chen po ni //
T02TD1401E:38b-22: mtshan nyid nga yis bshad par bya //
T02TD1401E:38b-23: zhes bya ba la nga yis zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'chang bas te /
T02TD1401E:38b-24: snying rje chen po'i dbang gis rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi thabs gang gis sgrub po 'grub par 'gyur ba de nyid ni gsang ba chen po'i mtshan nyid de //
T02TD1401E:38b-25: nyan thos la sogs pa'i spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro ;
T02TD1401E:38b-26: / bud gang spyi gtsug reg byed pa //
T02TD1401E:38b-27: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sgra ji bzhin pa ste go sla'o //
T02TD1401E:38b-28: dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel sgrub pa'i thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02TD1401E:38b-30: // / de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa //
T02TD1401E:38b-31: yan lag phyag rgya'i khyad par ni //
T02TD1401E:38b-32: zhes bya ba ni 'dir gsang ba chen po'i mtshan nyid do //
T02TD1401E:38b-33: gzhan zhes bya ba ni dam pa ste /
T02TD1401E:38b-34: gang gis rnal 'byor ma rnams mnyes par 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD1401E:38b-35: khyad par zhes bya ba la lag pa'i spyi las khyad par ni sor mo rnams so //
T02TD1401E:39a-1: pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
T02TD1401E:39a-2: dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel sgrub pa'i thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02TD1401E:39a-4: // / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02TD1401E:39a-5: sgra ji bzhin pa ste go sla'o //
T02TD1401E:39a-6: gzhir ni sa gzhi byas nas su //
T02TD1401E:39a-7: zhes bya ba ni stan las ldang ba'o //
T02TD1401E:39a-8: mchod ces bya ba ni dam por 'khyud dang 'o bya ba'o //
T02TD1401E:39a-9: smin ma g-yo zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1401E:39a-10: cung zad ngo tsha ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD1401E:39a-11: rnal 'gyur bskor ba zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1401E:39a-12: phul du byung ba'i bde ba sgrub pa'i don gyis bskor ba ni byang chub kyi sems la yongs su bskor ba ste /
T02TD1401E:39a-13: srog dang rtsol ba sdom pa'i 'khrul 'khor gyis yang dag par phul du byung ba'i bde ba chen po'i lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du 'bar bas stong pa dbus su chud pa'i sngags pas 'jig rten gsum po dang lhan cig tu 'dre ba ste /
T02TD1401E:39a-14: sa dang chu dang rlung nyid dang //
T02TD1401E:39a-15: me dang nam mkha' nyid dang ni //
T02TD1401E:39a-16: bdag dang gzhan du rtag tshor dang //
T02TD1401E:39a-17: skad cig de la kun mi dmigs //
T02TD1401E:39a-19: bdag gis bde ba nyams su myong //
T02TD1401E:39a-21: khyim du zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02TD1401E:39a-23: bha ga'i dbus chung rdo rje ni //
T02TD1401E:39a-24: shin tu stong par bsgoms pa ni //
T02TD1401E:39a-25: thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'o //
T02TD1401E:39a-26: ma rig la sogs glo bung ba //
T02TD1401E:39a-27: rtog pa'i nyes pa rtog las byung //
T02TD1401E:39a-28: rang bzhin 'od gsal rnam dag pa //
T02TD1401E:39a-29: sems ni me long bzhin du blta //
T02TD1401E:39a-30: chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste //
T02TD1401E:39a-31: gsal zhing dag pa nam mkha' mtshungs //
T02TD1401E:39a-32: ral gri nyon mongs gcod byed pa //
T02TD1401E:39a-33: sems can don byed rno ba'o //
T02TD1401E:39a-34: bsod nams kyis 'degs rgyal mtshan bzhin //
T02TD1401E:39a-35: mdung thung nyon mongs 'bigs byed pas //
T02TD1401E:39a-36: sems ni rtse gcig pa nyid do //
T02TD1401E:39a-37: de nyid me rtse rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD1401E:39a-38: kha sbyar bde ba thob pa'o //
T02TD1401E:39a-39: mtshan ma'i cha byad gsal zhes bya //
T02TD1401E:39a-40: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang rin po che dang padma dang ral gri dang sna tshogs rdo rje rnams ni rgyal mtshan dang /
T02TD1401E:39a-41: mdung thung rnams ji lta ba ste /
T02TD1401E:39b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rigs kyi dbye bas rdo rje dang rgyal mtshan dang @39b ral gri dang mdung thung ni nas kyi 'bru tshad tsam mo //
T02TD1401E:39b-1: 'khor lo dang rin po che dang padma dang sna tshogs rdo rje rnams ni sran tsa na ka'i tshad tsam ste /
T02TD1401E:39b-2: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i rim pas ji lta ba bzhin rang rang gi mtshan ma kha dog lnga po'i nang du dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo chud pa la /
T02TD1401E:39b-3: sems brtan pa phra mo'i rnal 'byor sgom pa las /
T02TD1401E:39b-4: rnal 'byor pas phyag rgya'i dngos grub yid kyi rang bzhin bzang po 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1401E:39b-5: dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel sgrub pa'i thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02TD1401E:39b-7: // / de nas gzhan yang brda yi skad //
T02TD1401E:39b-8: ces bya ba la yul sna tshogs kyi khyad par gyi skad ni brda zhes bya ba kla klo ste /
T02TD1401E:39b-9: rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD1401E:39b-10: pro tam gi zhes bya ba ni gsang por smra ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02TD1401E:39b-11: sgra ji bzhin pa nyid kyis na go sla ba ste /
T02TD1401E:39b-12: gang zhig brda yi skad rnams shes pa ni //
T02TD1401E:39b-13: 'dir rnal 'byor pa nyid du the tshom med do //
T02TD1401E:39b-14: dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel sgrub pa'i thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02TD1401E:39b-16: // / de nas don kun 'dod pa yi //
T02TD1401E:39b-17: sba bya brgyad mtha' sbyar byas te //
T02TD1401E:39b-18: zhes bya ba la brgyad kyi mtha' ni yi ge ha ste /
T02TD1401E:39b-19: yi ge au dang thig ler bcas pa'o //
T02TD1401E:39b-20: aom na mo bha ga wa ti b'i re sh'a ya /
T02TD1401E:39b-21: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02TD1401E:39b-22: dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel sgrub pa'i thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02TD1401E:39b-24: // / de nas gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni dpal he ru ka'i bdag nyid chen po'o //
T02TD1401E:39b-25: lugs 'byung lugs las bzlog pa yis //
T02TD1401E:39b-26: zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor gyi bslab pa'i rim pa las ma 'das pa'o //
T02TD1401E:39b-27: 'og dang steng gi dngos grub ste //
T02TD1401E:39b-28: zhes bya ba la 'og ni sa 'og la sogs pa gang ci yod pa'o //
T02TD1401E:39b-29: steng gis zhes bya ba ni steng gi dngos grub ste phyag rgya chen po'o //
T02TD1401E:39b-30: pho nya dang 'dra bar gyur pas na pho nya ste byang chub pa'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad du nges shing thams cad du gnyis su med pa'i dga' ba'i rang bzhin gyis legs par gnas pa'i pho nya'o //
T02TD1401E:40a-1: nya ma zhes bya ba ni spyod pa'i mchog lhan cig tu spyod pa'o //
T02TD1401E:40a-2: kun 'gro zhes bya ba ni skal ba ldan pa'i sems can rnams kyi don bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir 'o bya ba dang rab tu 'khyud pa la sogs pa thams cad ster bas so //
T02TD1401E:40a-3: rnal 'byor gnas kyi khyad par nyid //
T02TD1401E:40a-5: gnas ni sa ru rab tu bshad //
T02TD1401E:40a-7: gnyis med dga' ba'i rang bzhin rgyal //
T02TD1401E:40a-8: bde chen gang du gnas bas na //
T02TD1401E:40a-9: de phyir mchog gi padma gnas //
T02TD1401E:40a-10: khu khrag 'dres shing gang ba ni //
T02TD1401E:40a-11: khyad par du ni 'o byas nas //
T02TD1401E:40a-12: lce yis yang dag dril nas blangs //
T02TD1401E:40a-13: chang 'thung rab tu dga' ba yis //
T02TD1401E:40a-14: rdo rje padma mnyam dgar sbyar //
T02TD1401E:40a-15: ji snyed rnal 'byor tshogs rnams ni //
T02TD1401E:40a-16: zhes bya ba la dga' ba'i bstan bcos las bshad pa'i byed lugs de snyed rnams rdo rje sems dpas gsungs te /
T02TD1401E:40a-17: byang chub tu grub pas tha mal pa'i mtshan nyid kyi dbye ba shes par bya'o //
T02TD1401E:40a-19: bden can kun la sbyin bya yi //
T02TD1401E:40a-20: gzhan du nam yang ma yin no //
T02TD1401E:40a-22: ma dang sring mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnams ni sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
T02TD1401E:40a-23: gang zhig rtag tu sngags sbyin pa //
T02TD1401E:40a-24: zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya de nyid dang sbyor bas shes rab ye shes so zhes bya'o //
T02TD1401E:40a-25: rnyed dka'i dam tshig nga yis bshad //
T02TD1401E:40a-26: ces bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02TD1401E:40a-27: he ru ka las sbyor gzhan med //
T02TD1401E:40a-28: ces bya ba ni gang zhig bstan pa de thams cad he ru ka'i sbyor bas bya'i gzhan gyis ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don no //
T02TD1401E:40a-30: slob dpon rnal 'byor ma nyid kyi //
T02TD1401E:40a-32: rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi ma ni rnal 'byor ma'o //
T02TD1401E:40a-33: de'i phyir brnyas mi bya zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1401E:40a-34: rnal 'byor gzhan dang kun sbyor pas //
T02TD1401E:40a-36: snying rje chen por rab dga' ba'i //
T02TD1401E:40a-37: rnal 'byor mchog gi thabs spangs nas //
T02TD1401E:40a-38: 'dod lha'i dngos grub bsgrub don du //
T02TD1401E:40a-39: rnal 'byor gzhan la brten byas pas //
T02TD1401E:40a-40: gang zhig dngos grub 'dod gyur pa //
T02TD1401E:40a-41: dmus long bzhin du rnam par rmong pa //
T02TD1401E:40a-42: rgyal srid las nyams rgyal po bzhin //
T02TD1401E:40b-0: nges par sdug bsngal gyis rmongs @40b 'gyur //
T02TD1401E:40b-1: dam tshig spyod pa'i spyod pa bya //
T02TD1401E:40b-2: zhes bya ba la sogs pa sna tshogs pa gsungs pa ste /
T02TD1401E:40b-3: rnam par mi rtog sems kyis ni //
T02TD1401E:40b-4: rigs rnams thams cad mnyam par sbyar //
T02TD1401E:40b-5: dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor bas //
T02TD1401E:40b-6: nyan pa la sogs dbang po kun //
T02TD1401E:40b-7: bsre zhing bde bar bsdu bar bya //
T02TD1401E:40b-8: gtso bo gang du spyod pa yi //
T02TD1401E:40b-9: tshangs spyod stong pa nyid du 'gyur //
T02TD1401E:40b-10: brjed med dran pa'i spyod pa yis //
T02TD1401E:40b-11: bde ba rtogs par byed pa'i gzhi //
T02TD1401E:40b-12: rdzogs pa'i byang chub lam dag pa'i //
T02TD1401E:40b-13: de nyid bla na med pa ni //
T02TD1401E:40b-14: dam tshig spyod pa rab tu gsungs //
T02TD1401E:40b-15: byang chub bsgrub la gnas pa yi //
T02TD1401E:40b-16: sgrub pa po yis rtag zhes bya //
T02TD1401E:40b-17: rgyud kun gyi ni thun mong du //
T02TD1401E:40b-18: zhes bya ba ni bya ba dang spyod pa dang rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor ma rnams dang /
T02TD1401E:40b-19: rnal 'byor bla ma'i rgyud chen po'i rang bzhin du bya ba'i sbyor ba dang mtshungs pa ma yin no //
T02TD1401E:40b-20: mi gzhom zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1401E:40b-21: mnyam pa'i bdag nyid du blta bar mi bya ste /
T02TD1401E:40b-22: rgyud dang de rnams ni rgyu ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1401E:40b-23: dam tshig mi spyod shin tu sbas //
T02TD1401E:40b-24: gang la mi sbyin mi bya ste //
T02TD1401E:40b-25: skal ldan sems can rnams la bshad //
T02TD1401E:40b-26: kha la sogs pa brgya po 'di //
T02TD1401E:40b-27: mos dang dad pas 'phel byed pas //
T02TD1401E:40b-28: zhes bya ba la 'dod pa'i don phun sum tshogs pa nges shing /
T02TD1401E:40b-29: byang chub kyi lam la thams cad la khyab pas legs par gnas pa'o //
T02TD1401E:40b-30: dad pa'i nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1401E:40b-31: chos rnams dad pas gzung bya ste //
T02TD1401E:40b-32: shes rab ldan pa'i de nyid rig / ces pa'o //
T02TD1401E:40b-33: de nyid kyis na brtag pa'i rgyal po gnyis pa las gsungs pa /
T02TD1401E:40b-34: lag pas ma yin dung por min //
T02TD1401E:40b-35: mkhas pas lce yi blang bya ste //
T02TD1401E:40b-36: tshe dang nad med 'phel byed pas //
T02TD1401E:40b-37: yang dag ye shes 'byung ba'i rgyu //
T02TD1401E:40b-38: mthe'u chung zhes bya ba mthe'u chung ni tshigs dang ldan pa ste /
T02TD1401E:40b-39: lo bcu gcig pa'i bdag nyid bzung nas /
T02TD1401E:40b-40: lce yis blangs te ra sa ya na'i dngos grub brtsam pa ni bde ba chen po 'byung ba'i rgyu'o //
T02TD1401E:40b-41: sgrub pa po ni gsum du gnas /
T02TD1401E:40b-42: zhes bya ba ni chung du dang 'bring dang chen po'i bye brag gis so //
T02TD1401E:41a-0: dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel sgrub pa'i @41a * //
T02TD1401E:41a-1: thabs kyi gling gzhi las le'u nyi shu rtsa drug pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02TD1401E:41a-3: // / de nas dpa' bo spyod brtul zhugs //
T02TD1401E:41a-4: zhes bya ba la kun la spyod pas na spyod pa'o //
T02TD1401E:41a-5: brtul zhugs ni nus ba'i rgyan la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1401E:41a-6: dpa' bo zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa'o //
T02TD1401E:41a-9: rnal 'byor ma rnams rab bsgrub pa //
T02TD1401E:41a-11: mtshan nyid dbye ba shes byas nas //
T02TD1401E:41a-13: phung po khams sogs mdor bsdus nas //
T02TD1401E:41a-14: sgyu ma lta bur shes par bya //
T02TD1401E:41a-15: 'jig rten chos brgyad yongs shes shing //
T02TD1401E:41a-16: dpal ldan slob dpon rdo rje can //
T02TD1401E:41a-17: kun gyi mgon la phyag 'tshal nas //
T02TD1401E:41a-18: bya ba byas pa'i slob dpon gyis //
T02TD1401E:41a-19: gsang ba'i spyod pa bsten par bya //
T02TD1401E:41a-20: 'khar gsil lhung bzed chos gos dang //
T02TD1401E:41a-21: chu tshogs sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyis //
T02TD1401E:41a-22: yan lag lung bzhin mi spang ste //
T02TD1401E:41a-23: lung ma rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa //
T02TD1401E:41a-24: sangs rgyas mu stegs can du 'gyur //
T02TD1401E:41a-25: shes rab pha rol phyin dmigs pa //
T02TD1401E:41a-26: lhag pa yi ni lha gcig nyid //
T02TD1401E:41a-27: stong pa'i ye shes yang dag 'byung //
T02TD1401E:41a-28: gdug pa thams cad 'jigs byed pa //
T02TD1401E:41a-29: sngon bzhin drag shul rnam 'gyur dpal //
T02TD1401E:41a-31: mche pa rab tu gtsigs pa po //
T02TD1401E:41a-32: gtsug na zla ba phyed pa la //
T02TD1401E:41a-33: sna tshogs rdo rje'i ral pas brgyan //
T02TD1401E:41a-34: thong pa'i phreng bas rnam par klubs //
T02TD1401E:41a-35: rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs shing //
T02TD1401E:41a-36: stag gi pags pas rnam dkris pa //
T02TD1401E:41a-37: phyed krung bcas pas shin tu gnas //
T02TD1401E:41a-38: sdang ba thams cad 'dul mdzad pa //
T02TD1401E:41a-39: sred dang rmongs pa phrag dog 'gyur //
T02TD1401E:41a-40: k'a la r'a ti 'og tu mnan //
T02TD1401E:41a-41: spyan gsum zhal bzhi mgrin pa bzhi //
T02TD1401E:41a-42: mkha' ltar sngo skya ser dang dmar //
T02TD1401E:41a-43: steng gi zhal ni ljang gu ste //
T02TD1401E:41a-44: rdo rje dril bus snyoms 'jug cing //
T02TD1401E:41a-45: phag mo dang ni gnyis med dga' //
T02TD1401E:41a-46: chos kyi 'khor lo khar gsil snod //
T02TD1401E:41a-47: mdung dang zhags pa lcags kyu'i phyag / de bzhin mgo dang rde'u chung ste //
T02TD1401E:41a-48: phyag gnyis na ni chos gos so //
T02TD1401E:41a-49: mi lpags snam bu gnyis kyis 'phyar //
T02TD1401E:41a-50: phag mo mdog dmar gcer bu la //
T02TD1401E:41a-51: spyan gsum skra ni grol ba ste //
T02TD1401E:41b-0: rgyan rnams thams @41b cad rab 'bar ba //
T02TD1401E:41b-1: g-yon pa ro yi lhung bzed de //
T02TD1401E:41b-2: g-yas pa rde'u chung chos dbyangs sgrogs //
T02TD1401E:41b-3: byin pa gnyis ni mnyam 'khyud cing //
T02TD1401E:41b-4: snying rje dga' ba'i bde ba che //
T02TD1401E:41b-5: shar la sogs pa'i 'dab ma la //
T02TD1401E:41b-6: rngon pa mo dang gdol pa ni //
T02TD1401E:41b-7: btso blag mkhan dang pukka s'i //
T02TD1401E:41b-8: shan pa ma dang ri khrod ma //
T02TD1401E:41b-9: de bzhin nya ba sha wa ri //
T02TD1401E:41b-10: ser dang sngo dmar dud kha dang //
T02TD1401E:41b-11: skya bo dang ni dmar dang ljang //
T02TD1401E:41b-12: de bzhin brgyad pa dkar po ste //
T02TD1401E:41b-13: lugs su 'byung dang lugs las bzlog / bzhad dang zhi dang snying rje dang //
T02TD1401E:41b-14: sgeg dang rngam dang mi sdug pa //
T02TD1401E:41b-15: drag shul khro bo'i nyams dang ldan //
T02TD1401E:41b-16: khar gsil dang ni lhung bzed dang //
T02TD1401E:41b-17: rde'u chung dang zangs gri phyag / sgo bzhir khro mo dgod par bya //
T02TD1401E:41b-18: he ru ka yi rang snang ba //
T02TD1401E:41b-19: rdo rje gtum mo rdo rje'o //
T02TD1401E:41b-20: srin mo rdo rje 'jigs byed ma //
T02TD1401E:41b-21: drag shul gdul dka' kun gsol ma //
T02TD1401E:41b-22: thal ba'i mdog dang ljang gu dang //
T02TD1401E:41b-23: dmar dang sngo ba drag shul 'jigs //
T02TD1401E:41b-24: lhung bzed dang ni khar gsil g-yon //
T02TD1401E:41b-25: chos kyi 'khor lo rde'u chung g-yas //
T02TD1401E:41b-26: phrag pa'i steng na chos gos 'phyar //
T02TD1401E:41b-27: kun kyang zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa //
T02TD1401E:41b-28: rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par klubs //
T02TD1401E:41b-29: ro steng phyed krung gar gyis ni //
T02TD1401E:41b-30: bzhugs shing skra grol gcer bu'o //
T02TD1401E:41b-31: bsod snyoms pa dang chos gos gsum //
T02TD1401E:41b-32: phyis mi len dang cog pu pa //
T02TD1401E:41b-33: stan gcig pa dang bla gab med //
T02TD1401E:41b-34: shing drung pa dang dgon pa ba //
T02TD1401E:41b-35: dur khrod pa dang phyag dar khrod //
T02TD1401E:41b-36: phying pa can dang gzhi ji bzhin //
T02TD1401E:41b-37: sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis po //
T02TD1401E:41b-38: de rnams rnam dag rnal 'byor pa //
T02TD1401E:41b-39: gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis pa'i //
T02TD1401E:41b-40: chos kyi 'dul ba'i tshul khrims kyis //
T02TD1401E:41b-41: rab tu mgu zhing snying rje che //
T02TD1401E:41b-42: dga' ba'i rab tu mdzes pa'o //
T02TD1401E:41b-43: de rnams dang lhan cig spyod cing rjes su 'dug pa rnams dang bcas pa des yid dga' zhing /
T02TD1401E:41b-44: rdo rje byin gyis brlab pa byas nas /
T02TD1401E:41b-45: phyag rgya chen po'i bde bas bzlas pa bya ste /
T02TD1401E:41b-46: aom shr'i ma h'a su kha badzra he he ru ru kam hum h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1401E:41b-47: dam tshig gi kha zas la longs spyod cing /
T02TD1401E:42a-0: @42a * // sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa dang /
T02TD1401E:42a-1: brtul zhugs bhu su ku'i spyod pa'i rim pa 'dis spyad bar bya'o //
T02TD1401E:42a-2: de la rim pa ni 'di yin te bhu zhes bya ba ni za ba ste /
T02TD1401E:42a-3: de tsam 'ba' zhig rjes su dran zhing 'du 'dzi thams cad yongs su spangs nas /
T02TD1401E:42a-4: dka' thub dang bsnyen gnas la sogs pa cung zad tsam yang bsam par mi bya'o //
T02TD1401E:42a-5: su zhig ces bya ba ni gnyid log pa ma rig pas nye bar mtshon pa 'di dag rnam par shes pa tsam du mngon du byas la dge ba'i rnam par bsnyen pa'o //
T02TD1401E:42a-6: de ci zhe na slar yang 'jug par bya ste /
T02TD1401E:42a-7: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba nyid du mngon du byas te /
T02TD1401E:42a-8: rang bzhin gyis dri ma med pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1401E:42a-9: kun zhes bya ba ni bshad bar 'gro ba ste /
T02TD1401E:42a-10: bshad gci tsam zhig 'dor bar byed pa'o //
T02TD1401E:42a-11: des de tsam zhig rjes su bsams nas 'du 'dzi yongs su spangs nas /
T02TD1401E:42a-12: lus dang tshor ba dang yul dang dbang po'i rang bzhin rnam par bsam par mi bya'o //
T02TD1401E:42a-13: yul dang yul du zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ngal na phyi rol song nas pho nya'i mtshan nyid nye bar dpyad nas sangs rgyas kyi brtul zhugs la 'jug par bya'o //
T02TD1401E:42a-14: pho nya mo rnams legs 'dres pas //
T02TD1401E:42a-15: phyag rgya chen po'i go 'phang gis ;
T02TD1401E:42a-16: / bla med mchog gi byang chub ni //
T02TD1401E:42a-18: myur ba nyid du zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1401E:42a-20: rtag tu rnal 'byor pa mtshan bya //
T02TD1401E:42a-22: sems kyi rin chen rtag 'gyur na //
T02TD1401E:42a-23: byin gyis rlob par byed 'gyur te //
T02TD1401E:42a-24: sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu gnas //
T02TD1401E:42a-25: lo grangs bcu drug gzung bya ste //
T02TD1401E:42a-26: rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par klubs //
T02TD1401E:42a-27: bzhin bzangs ma ni mig yangs ma //
T02TD1401E:42a-28: rnyed nas rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyad //
T02TD1401E:42a-29: brtul zhugs chen pos dus bzhir ni //
T02TD1401E:42a-30: gsang ba'i mchod pa rtag tu bya //
T02TD1401E:42a-31: zla ba drug gis de dag kun //
T02TD1401E:42a-33: zas la rtag tu spyad par bya //
T02TD1401E:42a-35: phyag rgya che la zhugs pa ni //
T02TD1401E:42a-36: de ni bza' ba kun 'dus yin //
T02TD1401E:42a-37: rigs kun la ni kun spyod yin //
T02TD1401E:42b-0: rigs @42b gcig nyid du brtag par bya //
T02TD1401E:42b-1: ji ltar me yis gser bsregs bzhin //
T02TD1401E:42b-2: de bzhin sngags kyis kha zas bsgrub //
T02TD1401E:42b-3: aom sarba badzra k'a mi ni sarba bhaksha sho dha ya gu hya badzri ni h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1401E:42b-4: mi 'chi bcu phyed mar dang ni //
T02TD1401E:42b-5: sprang rtsir lhan cig ldan byas la //
T02TD1401E:42b-6: 'thungs na sman gyi dam pa ste ;
T02TD1401E:42b-7: / rga dang 'chi ba ring du spong //
T02TD1401E:42b-8: gzhon zhing nad med dpal dang ldan //
T02TD1401E:42b-9: gzugs bzangs 'dod lha 'gro ba'i bdag / de nyid dbyer med de yis ni //
T02TD1401E:42b-10: pho nya mo gnyis bsgrub pa la //
T02TD1401E:42b-11: zhes bya ba ni dbang bskur ba'i don du rgyan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyag rgya gnyis phun sum tshogs par bya ste /
T02TD1401E:42b-12: gcig ni gsang ba sbyin pa'i don du'o //
T02TD1401E:42b-13: gnyis pa ni shes rab ye shes kyi don du ste /
T02TD1401E:42b-14: 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbugs dbyung ba dang /
T02TD1401E:42b-15: gnyis pa rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'i dbugs dbyung ba'i rjes su gnang ba byin la /
T02TD1401E:42b-16: de'i rjes su po nya gcig pu sbyin pa ste /
T02TD1401E:42b-17: slob dpon bdag nyid chen po nyid kyis brtul zhugs gzugs kyi phyag rgya chen po'i don bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD1401E:42b-18: 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang chen dam pa yang dag par sbyin pa gsang ba'i gnas las byung ba'i bla ma'i man ngag gi rim pas dbang bskur ba thob pa gsar ba 'di ston pa ni rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis yang dag par gsungs pa'i ye shes yang dag rdzogs lus skyes zhes bya ba ji snyed pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis phyag bya bar 'os pa'o zhes bya'o //
T02TD1401E:42b-19: nang par sngar langs zhes bya ba ni 'od gsal bar gyur pa las so //
T02TD1401E:42b-20: nyid lag gis ni bstan bcos rnams //
T02TD1401E:42b-21: lus la gnas pa kun tu spyad //
T02TD1401E:42b-22: ces bya ba la yan lag shin tu dman pas na nying lag ste /
T02TD1401E:42b-23: byang chub kyi sems la sogs pa'i bdud rtsi lnga'o //
T02TD1401E:42b-24: bgegs thams cad bsal bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD1401E:42b-25: kun tu spyod pa dang bsod nams dang ye shes 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD1401E:42b-26: bstan bcos rnams ni rnal 'byor gyi bstan bcos kyi mtshan nyid yin la kun tu spyod pa rnams ni kun spyod do //
T02TD1401E:42b-27: dag byed byas pa lus dang ni //
T02TD1401E:42b-28: zhes bya ba ni lha'i rnal 'byor bsgom pas so //
T02TD1401E:43a-1: rim pa 'dis bdag nyid bsam par bya ste /
T02TD1401E:43a-5: rnam par shes pa nyid ni /
T02TD1401E:43a-6: bhr'um aam hr'i: ho: h'um zhes bya bas rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02TD1401E:43a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid du gyur pa ni dpal he ru ka ste hi yis so //
T02TD1401E:43a-18: aom h'um tr'am a'am kham ham gis gti mug dang /
T02TD1401E:43a-24: dza: h'um bam ho: kham ram /
T02TD1401E:43a-25: gis ni gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1401E:43a-26: l'am m'am p'am t'am kham gis ni sa dang /
T02TD1401E:43a-30: nam mkha' rnams spyan ma dang /
T02TD1401E:43a-34: rdo rje phag mo rnams so //
T02TD1401E:43a-35: aom a'a: h'um h'um gis sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ye shes sems dpa' rnams so //
T02TD1401E:43a-36: chos kyi 'khor lo padma 'dab ma brgyad pa la bhr'um aam hram kham h'um a'a a'i a'u ae'o //
T02TD1401E:43a-37: longs spyod padma 'dab ma bcu drug pa la /
T02TD1401E:43a-38: aom a'a a'i a'u ae ste dbyangs yig lnga'o //
T02TD1401E:43a-39: bde ba chen po padma 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis pa la ham ngo //
T02TD1401E:43a-40: sprul pa'i 'khor lo 'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi pa la ni aa ka tsa ta ta pa ya sha ste sde tshan brgyad kyis brgyan pa'o //
T02TD1401E:43a-42: yi ge ka la sogs pa dbus su sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD1401E:43a-43: pu dza ao aa go r'a de ma k'a ao tri ko ka la ka hi /
T02TD1401E:43a-44: bre gri soo su na si ma ku dang kham pram mam tsam kam pram bim mam sum bim /
T02TD1401E:43a-45: aam kham bam lam bam drum aam aem bam mam mam bam bam /
T02TD1401E:43a-48: bim kham mam tsam ram kham ham /
T02TD1401E:43a-49: sam aam tsam shrim sum pam mam /
T02TD1401E:43a-58: dpung pa'i rtsa ba gnyis dang /
T02TD1401E:43b-4: sen mo dang so ni rab tu gtum ma'o //
T02TD1401E:43b-5: sgra dang spu ni gtum pa'i mig go //
T02TD1401E:43b-6: pags pa dang dri ma la ni 'od ldan ma'o //
T02TD1401E:43b-7: sha la ni sna chen ma'o //
T02TD1401E:43b-8: rgyus pa la ni dpa' bo'i blo ma'o //
T02TD1401E:43b-9: rus pa la ni mi'u thung ma'o //
T02TD1401E:43b-10: mchin pa la ni lang ka'i dbang phyug ma'o //
T02TD1401E:43b-12: mig gnyis la ni sa srung ma'o //
T02TD1401E:43b-13: mkhris pa la ni 'jigs byed chen mo'o //
T02TD1401E:43b-14: glo ba la ni klung gi shugs ma'o //
T02TD1401E:43b-15: rgyu ma la ni chang 'thung ma'o //
T02TD1401E:43b-16: gnye ma la ni lha mo sngo bsangs ma'o //
T02TD1401E:43b-17: lto ba la ni shin tu bzang me'o ;
T02TD1401E:43b-18: / chu so la ni rta rna ma'o //
T02TD1401E:43b-19: mo dams [*mod mas?] bar la ni bya'i gdong pa can no //
T02TD1401E:43b-20: bad kan la ni 'khor lo'i shugs can ma'o //
T02TD1401E:43b-21: rnag la ni dum skyes ma'o //
T02TD1401E:43b-22: khrag la ni glad sna ma'o //
T02TD1401E:43b-23: rdul la ni 'khor lo'i go cha ma'o //
T02TD1401E:43b-24: tshil la ni rab tu dpa' mo'o //
T02TD1401E:43b-25: mchi ma la ni stobs chen ma'o //
T02TD1401E:43b-26: mchil mal ni 'khor los sgyur ba'o //
T02TD1401E:43b-27: snabs la ni brtson 'grus chen mo ste /
T02TD1401E:43b-28: de ltar mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi rang bzhin chos kyi dbyings su rab tu grags pa'o //
T02TD1401E:43b-29: bstan bcos ci gsungs dor mi bya //
T02TD1401E:43b-31: bdud rtsi rnams ni sman gyi mchog / mi bskyod bsten pas rnal 'byor pa //
T02TD1401E:43b-33: rtag pa yi ni gzi che zhing //
T02TD1401E:43b-34: 'od dpag med pas stobs che la //
T02TD1401E:43b-35: rdo rje nyi mas rgas pa med //
T02TD1401E:43b-36: gang phyir don yod rgyal po che //
T02TD1401E:43b-37: sems can kun lus las byung ba //
T02TD1401E:43b-38: don kun bsgrub pa dpal dang ldan //
T02TD1401E:43b-39: sbyor ba de yis mnyam nyid 'gyur //
T02TD1401E:43b-42: rtag pas khri phrag rab tu gsungs //
T02TD1401E:43b-43: bye bar don yod rdo rje can //
T02TD1401E:43b-44: 'od dpag med kyis tshe mtha' med //
T02TD1401E:43b-45: rdo rje nyi mas rgas pa med //
T02TD1401E:43b-46: 'khor ba bsgrub pa'i rtsa ba gnyis //
T02TD1401E:43b-48: kun du bzang po dang mnyam 'gyur //
T02TD1401E:43b-49: dag par byas pa'i lus kyis ni //
T02TD1401E:43b-50: rtag tu sngags ni brjod par bya //
T02TD1401E:43b-52: aom a'a n'a n'a sa ma ya shuddha: sarba dharm'a n'a n'a sa ma ya shuddho& ham /
T02TD1401E:43b-53: aom sva bh'a ba shuddha: sarba dharm'a: sva bh'a ba shuddho& ham /
T02TD1401E:44a-1: t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD1401E:44a-3: rnal 'byor gnas rnams nges bstan zhing //
T02TD1401E:44a-4: zhes bya ba ni rang gis dbang bskur ba'i rdo rje can la'o //
T02TD1401E:44a-5: mtshon cha rnams ni bsgom mi bya //
T02TD1401E:44a-6: zhes bya ba ni dam tshig yongs su bskyang pa ste /
T02TD1401E:44a-7: de nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa chen po'o //
T02TD1401E:44a-8: dam tshig can gyis khro mi bya //
T02TD1401E:44a-9: zhes bya ba ni dag pa'i lam la legs par gnas pa rnams la'o //
T02TD1401E:44a-10: mngon par brtson las 'da' mi bya //
T02TD1401E:44a-11: zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo sdom par dbang bskur ba'i bla ma dang slob ma gnyis la brnyas pa mi bya ba ste /
T02TD1401E:44a-12: gang gi phyir pho nya mo'i bka' thob pa'i phyir //
T02TD1401E:44a-13: byang chub tu sems bskyed nas bsod nams kyi tshogs bskal ba du mar bsags pa yang de'i mod la 'joms par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1401E:44a-14: de'i don zhes bya ba ni bdud rtsi lnga'i don du'o //
T02TD1401E:44a-15: mtshan mo zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya'i mchod pa bya ba'o //
T02TD1401E:44a-16: gnag dang zhes bya ba ni he ru ka'i gzugs su'o //
T02TD1401E:44a-17: dmar zhes bya ba ni rdo rje phag mor ro //
T02TD1401E:44a-18: 'gul to zhes bya ba ni gsal lo //
T02TD1401E:44a-19: bde ba 'dod pas bde spyod bya //
T02TD1401E:44a-20: zhes bya ba ni ji ltar thos par bde ba ste /
T02TD1401E:44a-21: bde ba de nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis phyogs bcur gsal bar byed pa ni /
T02TD1401E:44a-22: 'di lta bu'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid kyi mar me snang pa shin tu chags pa'i dga' ba dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas lhan cig skyes pa'i snying rje chen po la spyad par bya'o //
T02TD1401E:44a-23: rigs dang rigs min zhes bya ba la dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i cho ga dang bslab pa ni dang po'i las can sems can la //
T02TD1401E:44a-24: snying rje'i rgyu yis gzung bar bya //
T02TD1401E:44a-25: bsgom pa yis ni bar chad can //
T02TD1401E:44a-26: srid pa'i 'ching dang ldan pa bzhin //
T02TD1401E:44a-27: rmongs pa'i mchog tu gyur pa nyid //
T02TD1401E:44a-28: de bas 'ching ba spangs gyur na //
T02TD1401E:44a-31: ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du bya //
T02TD1401E:44a-34: zhal bzhir gsungs pa gang yin pa //
T02TD1401E:44a-35: dga' ba bzhi yi rang bzhin gsungs //
T02TD1401E:44a-36: dga' kun rdzogs pa'i byang chub gcig / stong pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir //
T02TD1401E:44a-37: zhal gcig tu ni rab tu grags //
T02TD1401E:44b-0: spyan gsum srid pa gsum du @44b shar ;
T02TD1401E:44b-1: / thog mtha' med pa'i chos rnams ni //
T02TD1401E:44b-2: bems po'i rang bzhin las bzlog pa //
T02TD1401E:44b-3: ral pa'i don du rab tu gsungs //
T02TD1401E:44b-4: sna tshogs sems can don mdzad pas //
T02TD1401E:44b-5: sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa yin //
T02TD1401E:44b-6: zla ba byang chub sems 'gyur ba //
T02TD1401E:44b-7: bde chen rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'o //
T02TD1401E:44b-8: srid pa'i yan lag bcu gnyis phyir //
T02TD1401E:44b-9: bcu gnyis phyag dang mngon du ldan //
T02TD1401E:44b-10: yul rnams dang ni dbang po rnams //
T02TD1401E:44b-11: gnyis med rnam pa'i spyod yul gyis //
T02TD1401E:44b-12: phyag rnams mtshan mas mtshan pa yin //
T02TD1401E:44b-13: byang chub sems ni rdo rjer 'gyur //
T02TD1401E:44b-14: shes rab dril bu rab tu brjod //
T02TD1401E:44b-15: sku gsum dag phyir mdud rtsi gsum //
T02TD1401E:44b-16: glang po gti mug dral pa ste //
T02TD1401E:44b-17: dgra sta zhe sdang gcod byed pa //
T02TD1401E:44b-18: lus ngag sems las yang dag byung //
T02TD1401E:44b-19: zhags pas nyes pa 'ching ba ste //
T02TD1401E:44b-20: lus can ma lus mi mthun phyogs //
T02TD1401E:44b-21: sems can don byed rtsom pas na //
T02TD1401E:44b-22: zangs gri shin tu rno ba'o //
T02TD1401E:44b-23: mgo po tshangs pa'i rang bzhin gyis //
T02TD1401E:44b-24: kha tv'am stong pa'i rnam pa ste //
T02TD1401E:44b-25: cang te'u thabs rnams dag pa'o //
T02TD1401E:44b-26: rtag tu dga' ba'i rang bzhin gyis //
T02TD1401E:44b-27: chos kyi dbyangs sgra h'um mdzad pa'o //
T02TD1401E:44b-28: thod pa nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor te //
T02TD1401E:44b-29: snying rje ro yis yongs bkang ba'o //
T02TD1401E:44b-30: gsol ba dngos grub rgyu yin no //
T02TD1401E:44b-31: mche ba bzhi ni mngon gyur pa //
T02TD1401E:44b-34: rtag tu tshes kyi phreng ba gnyis //
T02TD1401E:44b-35: snying rje ro yis yongs bkang bas //
T02TD1401E:44b-36: ha har bzhad pas gsal mdzad zhal //
T02TD1401E:44b-37: nyon mongs bdud bzhi bdag nyid pas //
T02TD1401E:44b-38: mgo bo'i do shal gyis brgyan byas //
T02TD1401E:44b-39: stong nyid dag pa'i sdigs mdzub po //
T02TD1401E:44b-40: pho nya gtsang spra dang po yin //
T02TD1401E:44b-41: zhes bya ba ni rgyal ba thams cad bde ba'i rin chen gyi 'byung gnas kyi phyir ro //
T02TD1401E:44b-42: zhi ba ni bdud rtsi dang chang ngo //
T02TD1401E:44b-43: zas gcig pu ni za ba nyid //
T02TD1401E:44b-44: ces bya ba ni gang gi phyir rigs du ma nyid rigs gcig pas na dbye ba mi skye ba de ltar bya'o //
T02TD1401E:44b-45: gtsang sbra 'di ni yang dag spyad //
T02TD1401E:44b-46: ces bya ba ni go sla'o //
T02TD1401E:44b-47: rnam dag bdag nyid ye shes kyis //
T02TD1401E:44b-48: sa rnams kyang ni thob par 'gyur //
T02TD1401E:45a-0: zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub @45a * //
T02TD1401E:45a-2: ; gang yang kha cig brtson 'grus go 'phang dman pas thob par ma gyur na yang /
T02TD1401E:45a-3: sbrul bzhin du lus 'di yongs su btang nas gtsang ma'i gnas la sogs par de bzhin gshegs pa lta bur 'ching ba las grol bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1401E:45a-4: yang na mi'i 'jig rten du skyes nas ni /
T02TD1401E:45a-5: chos ldan rgyal por 'gyur zhes pa ste /
T02TD1401E:45a-6: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rang bzhin las byung bas byang chub kyi sems rdo rje dang 'dra bar sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho zhing sems can skyob pa'i sems kyis smon lam btab pas skye ba dang skye bar bde par gshegs pa'i rigs su skye ste /
T02TD1401E:45a-7: dpal dang ldan pa'i sh'akya'i mgon pos /
T02TD1401E:45a-8: ji ltar gsungs pa bzhin du 'gyur ro //
T02TD1401E:45a-10: bca' ba btung ba la sogs ldan //
T02TD1401E:45a-11: bdag nyid sangs rgyas kun sogs mchod //
T02TD1401E:45a-13: rang 'dod pa yi las rnams la //
T02TD1401E:45a-14: dad pas gtor ma sbyin bar bya //
T02TD1401E:45a-15: zhes bya ba ni zhi ba dang rgyas pa la sogs pa rnams la'o //
T02TD1401E:45a-16: mang ngo zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
T02TD1401E:45a-17: mdzub mo mdud byas gung mo nges par sbyar //
T02TD1401E:45a-18: mthe bong rdo rje brtan par yang dag bsdams //
T02TD1401E:45a-19: 'di ni dpral ba'i dbus su rab bzhag nas ;
T02TD1401E:45a-20: / bskor zhing bskor bas kun du bskor bar bya //
T02TD1401E:45a-24: badzra d'a ki n'i sa ma ya stvom dri shya ho: de ltar lan gsum bzhir brjod do //
T02TD1401E:45a-25: gcer bu spyi gtsug grol 'gyur bas //
T02TD1401E:45a-26: sgrub pos gnas ni mthon po ru //
T02TD1401E:45a-27: lho phyogs kha bltas bzhag nas ni //
T02TD1401E:45a-28: mtshan mo phyed na gtor ma byin //
T02TD1401E:45a-29: mthon po'i gnas zhes bya ba ni ri'i rgyal po lhun po'i steng du lha'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i sbyor bas 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma sbyin pa ste /
T02TD1401E:45a-30: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02TD1401E:45a-31: rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan //
T02TD1401E:45a-32: rim pa lnga yi dbus su ni //
T02TD1401E:45a-33: sna tshogs padma nyi dkyil la //
T02TD1401E:45a-34: rdo rje sems dpa' yongs gyur las //
T02TD1401E:45a-35: bdag nyid he ru kar bsgom bya //
T02TD1401E:45a-36: rtag dang chad pa'i rnam rtog gis //
T02TD1401E:45a-38: g-yas brkyang zhabs kyi sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1401E:45b-0: @45b bdud rnams thams cad rab 'joms pa //
T02TD1401E:45b-1: sku mdog sngo zhing drag chen po //
T02TD1401E:45b-2: 'jig dus me ltar drag shul che //
T02TD1401E:45b-3: spyan gsum 'jigs shing rngam pa ste //
T02TD1401E:45b-4: thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can //
T02TD1401E:45b-5: sangs rgyas lnga yis byin gyis brlabs //
T02TD1401E:45b-6: sna tshogs rdo rjes ral pa bcings //
T02TD1401E:45b-7: byang chub zla bas nye bar mdzes //
T02TD1401E:45b-8: phyag rgya drug gis sku brgyan byas //
T02TD1401E:45b-9: mtshan rnams kun gyis mtshan pa ste //
T02TD1401E:45b-10: zhal drug pa la bcu drug phyag / dpa' ba mi sdug sgeg pa dang //
T02TD1401E:45b-11: bzhad dang drag shul ljags 'dri la zhing //
T02TD1401E:45b-12: sdo dang ser dang de bzhin dmar //
T02TD1401E:45b-13: ljang gu dang ni dkar po nyid //
T02TD1401E:45b-14: steng gi zhal ni cher drag cing //
T02TD1401E:45b-15: nam mkha'i cha la longs spyod pa //
T02TD1401E:45b-16: ha har bzhad dang h'um h'um mdzad //
T02TD1401E:45b-17: hi hi zhes pas 'jigs mdzad pa //
T02TD1401E:45b-18: h'um h'um mdzad bcas phat mdzad pa //
T02TD1401E:45b-19: yi ge aom aom zhes brjod cing //
T02TD1401E:45b-20: rdo rje dril bus snyoms 'jug pa //
T02TD1401E:45b-21: lha mo'i nu ma 'tshir mdzad pa //
T02TD1401E:45b-22: dus mtha'i drag po 'jigs pa yi //
T02TD1401E:45b-23: pags pa na bza' bsnams shing 'dzin //
T02TD1401E:45b-24: thod pa kha tv'am mdung rtse gsum //
T02TD1401E:45b-25: zangs gri dang ni dgra sta dang //
T02TD1401E:45b-26: lcags kyu zhags pa mgo dang ni //
T02TD1401E:45b-27: cang te'u de bzhin mdud thung ni //
T02TD1401E:45b-28: gnyis kyis dra ba'i phyag rgya ni //
T02TD1401E:45b-29: dpral pa'i steng du legs gnas pa'i //
T02TD1401E:45b-30: phag mo'i mdog dang phyag la sogs pa yang de dang 'dra ba ste /
T02TD1401E:45b-31: 'on kyang pags pa'i gos spangs shing //
T02TD1401E:45b-32: mda' gzhu 'dzin pa'i lha mo phyag / lha mo'i skra grol gcer bu la //
T02TD1401E:45b-33: dum bus mtshan pa'i ske rags can //
T02TD1401E:45b-34: byin pa gnyis ni mnyam 'khyud nas //
T02TD1401E:45b-35: snying rjes chags pa'i bde ba can //
T02TD1401E:45b-36: 'gro drug srid pa yang dag sbyong //
T02TD1401E:45b-37: sems can don la brtson par mdzad //
T02TD1401E:45b-38: 'dab mar pho nya bzhi po ni //
T02TD1401E:45b-39: sa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin can //
T02TD1401E:45b-40: mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa ste //
T02TD1401E:45b-41: sdo dang ser dang dmar dang ljang //
T02TD1401E:45b-42: zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa //
T02TD1401E:45b-43: spyan gsum gcer bu skra grol ba //
T02TD1401E:45b-44: brang gi nu ma rab rgyas shing //
T02TD1401E:45b-45: sgeg bcas rnam par bzhad pa'i zhal //
T02TD1401E:45b-46: phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan //
T02TD1401E:45b-47: g-yon pas lcags kyu zhags pa dang //
T02TD1401E:45b-48: lcags sgrog dang 'bebs pa yi phyag / dgug pa dang ni gzhug pa dang //
T02TD1401E:46a-0: @46a * // bcing dang mchog tu mnyes byed pa'o //
T02TD1401E:46a-1: gzhan gyis gri dang thod pa dang //
T02TD1401E:46a-2: kha tv'am ga dang cang te'u 'dzin //
T02TD1401E:46a-3: g-yas brkyang zhabs kyis legs par bzhugs //
T02TD1401E:46a-4: snying rjes chags pa'i myos ldan yang //
T02TD1401E:46a-5: 'khrul ba thams cad rnam par spangs //
T02TD1401E:46a-6: mtshams su bum pa dang thod pa //
T02TD1401E:46a-7: bza' ba kun gyis yongs bkang ba //
T02TD1401E:46a-8: steng du thod pa byang chub kyi //
T02TD1401E:46a-10: lus ngag yid gsum byin brlabs shing //
T02TD1401E:46a-11: ye shes sems dpa'i go cha gnyis //
T02TD1401E:46a-12: pu la sogs pa yang dag spyar //
T02TD1401E:46a-13: dbang bskur nas ni mchod bya ste ;
T02TD1401E:46a-14: / bka' bzhin du ni bstod byas la //
T02TD1401E:46a-15: shing gcig dang ni dur khrod la sogs pa'i gnas su ni /
T02TD1401E:46a-16: ji ltar gsungs pa'i sngags kyi rjes su 'brangs nas /
T02TD1401E:46a-18: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba'i zhing skyong la sogs pa dgod par bya ste /
T02TD1401E:46a-19: de la rim pa 'di yin te //
T02TD1401E:46a-20: phag mo dang ni dge ma gnyis //
T02TD1401E:46a-21: gzhon nu ma dang ts'a mund'i //
T02TD1401E:46a-22: tshangs pa dang ni tshogs bdag ma //
T02TD1401E:46a-23: khyab 'jug dbang po rgyas par bshad //
T02TD1401E:46a-25: rim pa gsum pa la ni /
T02TD1401E:46a-26: dbang po gshin rje chu lha dang ;
T02TD1401E:46a-27: / gnod sbyin yi dags gtso mo dang //
T02TD1401E:46a-28: sreg byed srin po rlung gi lha //
T02TD1401E:46a-29: rim pa bzhi pa la ni /
T02TD1401E:46a-30: nyi ma zla ba mig dmar dang //
T02TD1401E:46a-31: gza' lhag dang ni phur bu dang //
T02TD1401E:46a-32: pa ba sangs dang spen pa dang //
T02TD1401E:46a-33: sgra gcan 'dzin dang rgyal mtshan no //
T02TD1401E:46a-34: rim pa lnga pa la ni /
T02TD1401E:46a-35: tshangs pa khyab 'jug de bzhin drag / skem byed nyid ni sgo bzhir ro //
T02TD1401E:46a-36: rim pa gnyis pa'i shar phyogs su //
T02TD1401E:46a-37: hr'i: yig las byung lha mo ni //
T02TD1401E:46a-38: phag mo zhes bya phyag bzhi pa //
T02TD1401E:46a-39: mda' dang gzhu dang de bzhin du //
T02TD1401E:46a-40: rgyal mtshan dang ni thod pa nyid //
T02TD1401E:46a-41: mdog sngon drag mo chen mo ste //
T02TD1401E:46a-42: phag gi gdong can 'jigs byed ma //
T02TD1401E:46a-43: byang du phem gyis dge ma ni //
T02TD1401E:46a-44: mdog dmar drag mo chen mo ste //
T02TD1401E:46a-45: thod pa nyid dang lcags kyu dang //
T02TD1401E:46a-46: kha tv'am cang te'u de bzhin no //
T02TD1401E:46a-47: nub tu hi yis gzhon nu ma //
T02TD1401E:46a-48: mdog ser pa la phyag bzhin //
T02TD1401E:46a-49: mdung rtse gsum dang ba dan gsum //
T02TD1401E:46b-0: gzhu dang @46b mda' ni de bzhin no //
T02TD1401E:46b-1: lho ru hi yis ts'a mund'i //
T02TD1401E:46b-2: mdog sngo ba la phyag bzhi na //
T02TD1401E:46b-3: kha tv'am nyid dang thod pa dang //
T02TD1401E:46b-4: de bzhin ral gri cang te'u'o //
T02TD1401E:46b-5: me mtshams bam gyis tshangs pa ni //
T02TD1401E:46b-6: sku mdog dkar mo phyag bzhin //
T02TD1401E:46b-7: tshangs pa'i sku dang thong ba nyid //
T02TD1401E:46b-8: gzhu dang mda' ni de bzhin no //
T02TD1401E:46b-9: srin por gam gis tshogs bdag ma //
T02TD1401E:46b-10: mdog ljang ma'o phyag bzhi na //
T02TD1401E:46b-11: mdung rtse gsum dang thod pa'i phyag / bgrang phreng dang ni la du'o //
T02TD1401E:46b-12: rlung du bam gyis khyab 'jug ma //
T02TD1401E:46b-13: mdog sngon ma la phyag bzhin //
T02TD1401E:46b-14: chang dang chu yi thod pa dang //
T02TD1401E:46b-15: zhags pa kha tv'am de bzhin gzhan //
T02TD1401E:46b-16: dbang ldan ai yig las byung ma //
T02TD1401E:46b-17: dbang mo mdog ser phyag bzhi na //
T02TD1401E:46b-18: rdo rje mdung thung thod pa dang //
T02TD1401E:46b-19: sdigs mdzub dang ni zhags pa nyid //
T02TD1401E:46b-20: lha mo thams cad gyen skra 'bar //
T02TD1401E:46b-21: sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par bklubs //
T02TD1401E:46b-22: mi ro'i stan bzhugs spyan gsum ma //
T02TD1401E:46b-23: stag gi lpags pas rked pa dkris //
T02TD1401E:46b-25: dbang ldan yam gis gnod sbyin ni //
T02TD1401E:46b-26: khyu mchog stan la bzhugs pa ste //
T02TD1401E:46b-27: mdog dkar ba la phyag bzhi na //
T02TD1401E:46b-28: thod pa dang ni mdud rtse gsum //
T02TD1401E:46b-29: thal mo sbyar la gzhol ba'o //
T02TD1401E:46b-30: shar du ai skyes brgya byin ni //
T02TD1401E:46b-31: glang po'i stan la bzhugs pa ste //
T02TD1401E:46b-32: mdog ser phyag ni bzhi pa la //
T02TD1401E:46b-33: rdo rje dang ni thod pa'i phyag / phyag gi thal mo sbyar bar mdzad //
T02TD1401E:46b-34: me mtshams bam gyis drang srong ni //
T02TD1401E:46b-35: mdog dmar phyag bzhi ra skyes zhon //
T02TD1401E:46b-36: me thab dang ni thod pa dang //
T02TD1401E:46b-37: skrag pas thal mo sbyor la brtson //
T02TD1401E:46b-38: lho ru yam gis nyi ma'i bu //
T02TD1401E:46b-39: mdog sngo phyag bzhi ma he zhon //
T02TD1401E:46b-40: dbyug pa thod pa bsnams pa dang //
T02TD1401E:46b-41: skrag pas thal mo sbyar la gzhol //
T02TD1401E:46b-42: bden bral ram gyis srin po ni //
T02TD1401E:46b-43: mdog ljang phyag bzhi mi ro zhon //
T02TD1401E:46b-44: ral gri dang ni thong ba thogs //
T02TD1401E:46b-45: skrag pas thal mo sbyor la brtson //
T02TD1401E:46b-46: nub tu bam gyis chu yi bdag / mdog dkar phyag bzhi chu srin stan //
T02TD1401E:46b-47: zhags pa dang ni thod pa thogs //
T02TD1401E:46b-48: skrag pas thal mo sbyor la gzhol //
T02TD1401E:46b-49: rlung mtshams yam gis rlung gi bdag / dud kha phyag bzhi ri dags zhon //
T02TD1401E:46b-50: ba dan dang ni thod pa nyid //
T02TD1401E:46b-51: de bzhin thal mo sbyor la brtson //
T02TD1401E:46b-52: byang du kum gis ku be ra //
T02TD1401E:47a-2: rin po che dang thod pa 'dzin //
T02TD1401E:47a-3: thal mo sbyar la gzhol bar mdzad //
T02TD1401E:47a-4: rim pa bzhi pa la ni /
T02TD1401E:47a-5: shar du nyi ma mdog dmar ba //
T02TD1401E:47a-7: thal mo sbyor la brtson par mdzad //
T02TD1401E:47a-8: rta bdun ldan pa'i shing rta zhon //
T02TD1401E:47a-9: me mtshams sam gis pa bsangs //
T02TD1401E:47a-10: kha dog dkar po 'bar ba ste //
T02TD1401E:47a-11: g-yon pa pad stengs me nor bu //
T02TD1401E:47a-12: g-yas pa de bzhin thod pa ste //
T02TD1401E:47a-13: thal sbyar ba la ra skyes zhon //
T02TD1401E:47a-14: lho ru aam gis mig dmar ni //
T02TD1401E:47a-15: mdog dmar ro yi gdan la gnas //
T02TD1401E:47a-16: ral gri dang ni zhags pa 'dzin //
T02TD1401E:47a-17: thal mo sbyor la gzhol bar byed //
T02TD1401E:47a-18: srin por ram gyis sgra gcan 'dzin //
T02TD1401E:47a-19: g-yas pa nyi ma g-yon zla ba //
T02TD1401E:47a-20: dud kha thal mo sbyar byas la //
T02TD1401E:47a-21: lus phyed rang gi stan la gnas //
T02TD1401E:47a-22: nub tu sam gis spen pa sngo //
T02TD1401E:47a-23: phyag gnyis thod pa thogs pa dang //
T02TD1401E:47a-24: thal mo sbyar ba byas pa'i phyag / me yi thab kyi steng du ni ;
T02TD1401E:47a-26: rlung du sham gis zla ba dkar //
T02TD1401E:47a-27: g-yon du padma zla nor bu //
T02TD1401E:47a-28: g-yas pa padma'i steng du zla //
T02TD1401E:47a-29: thal mo sbyar byas ngang pa zhon //
T02TD1401E:47a-30: byang du bam gis phur bu ser //
T02TD1401E:47a-31: g-yon du ril ba spyi blugs te //
T02TD1401E:47a-32: g-yas su de bzhin thod pa'o //
T02TD1401E:47a-33: thal sbyar rin chen stan la gnas //
T02TD1401E:47a-34: dbang ldan bum gyis gza' lag dkar //
T02TD1401E:47a-35: g-yas pa na ni rin chen mda' //
T02TD1401E:47a-36: g-yon pa na ni thod pa'o //
T02TD1401E:47a-37: thal sbyar bum pa'i stan la gnas //
T02TD1401E:47a-38: kam gis rgyal mtshan sprul gzugs dmar //
T02TD1401E:47a-39: phyag gnyis ral gri thal sbyar ba //
T02TD1401E:47a-40: de bzhin rgyu skar rnams bud med kyi gzugs can te //
T02TD1401E:47a-43: smin drug ni sngo bsangs so //
T02TD1401E:47a-57: lha mtshams ni sngo bsangs so //
T02TD1401E:47b-0: byi bzhin ni sngo bsangs @47b so ;
T02TD1401E:47b-6: thams cad ni gser gyi stod g-yogs can la thal mo sbyar bar bsam mo //
T02TD1401E:47b-8: shar sgor bam las tshangs pa ni //
T02TD1401E:47b-9: mdog dkar zhal bzhi phyag bzhi pa'o //
T02TD1401E:47b-10: thod pa dang ni bgrang phreng dang //
T02TD1401E:47b-11: spyi blugs dang ni padma nyid //
T02TD1401E:47b-12: byang sgor bim las skyes pa yi //
T02TD1401E:47b-13: khyab 'jug ces bya phyag bzhi pa //
T02TD1401E:47b-14: mdung dang de bzhin 'khor lo dang //
T02TD1401E:47b-15: thod pa nyid dang dbyug pa'o //
T02TD1401E:47b-16: nub tu sam las drag po ni //
T02TD1401E:47b-17: dud pa'i mdog la phyag bzhi pa //
T02TD1401E:47b-18: mdung rtse gsum dang thod pa nyid //
T02TD1401E:47b-19: de bzhin zhags pa bgrang phreng 'dzin //
T02TD1401E:47b-20: lho ru kam las skem byed ni //
T02TD1401E:47b-21: mdog ser phyag ni bzhi pa la //
T02TD1401E:47b-22: mdung thung dbyug pa thod pa dang //
T02TD1401E:47b-24: de dag kun kyang bu dang bu mo la sogs pa'i 'khor dang bcas shing /
T02TD1401E:47b-25: sgeg pa la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD1401E:47b-26: yang dkyil 'khor chen po'i de nyid kyi sa'i dbus su /
T02TD1401E:47b-27: shar du ru dra nag po ste //
T02TD1401E:47b-28: byang du ru dra chen po'o //
T02TD1401E:47b-29: nub tu lha sbyin zhes bya ba //
T02TD1401E:47b-30: lho ru de bzhin nag po'o //
T02TD1401E:47b-31: dbang ldan du ni gtsigs pa ste //
T02TD1401E:47b-32: me mtshams su ni mi sdug pa'o ;
T02TD1401E:47b-33: / bden bral dga' las 'das pa ste //
T02TD1401E:47b-34: rlung mtshams su ni log 'dren no //
T02TD1401E:47b-35: de kun zhal gcig spyan gsum pa //
T02TD1401E:47b-36: phyag bzhi gri dang thod pa dang //
T02TD1401E:47b-37: kha tv'am mdung rtse gsum pa'i phyag / gnag dang ser dang dmar dang ljang //
T02TD1401E:47b-38: mtshams na gnas pa rnams ni yid 'phrog pa gzugs gnyis pa'o //
T02TD1401E:47b-39: ru dra nag po'i mdun du ni ts'a mund'i'o //
T02TD1401E:47b-42: g-yas su dka' bzlog lha mo'o //
T02TD1401E:47b-43: de dag ni mkha' 'gro ma'i gdong can phyag gnyis mchod pa lngas gang ba'i thod pa bsnams pa'o //
T02TD1401E:47b-44: ru dra chen po'i mdun du ni //
T02TD1401E:47b-48: gzhan gyis mi thub ma rnams te /
T02TD1401E:47b-49: bca' ba dang btung ba 'dzin pa /
T02TD1401E:47b-51: nub tu lha sbyin gyi btsun mo /
T02TD1401E:48a-1: mdog can phyag na mchod pa lngas bkang ba'o //
T02TD1401E:48a-2: lho ru nag po'i btsun mo dbang po dang /
T02TD1401E:48a-3: zla ba mo dang drag mo dang ldan ma rnams te /
T02TD1401E:48a-4: gzugs can ma'i mdog can phyag na bza' btung thogs pa'o //
T02TD1401E:48a-5: dbang ldan du ni gtsigs pa'i btsun mo 'phyang ma dang /
T02TD1401E:48a-9: ts'a mund'i'i mdog can phyag na bza' btung thogs pa'o //
T02TD1401E:48a-10: me mtshams su ni mi sdug pa'i gzugs dang /
T02TD1401E:48a-11: grong khyer du gnas pa'i rnal 'byor ma dang /
T02TD1401E:48a-12: drag po'i gzugs can ma dang /
T02TD1401E:48a-14: dbang mo'i mdog can sngon du bstan ba bzhin du phyag na ston mo thogs pa /
T02TD1401E:48a-15: bden bral du dga' ba las 'das pa'i chung ma mche ba'i gzugs dang /
T02TD1401E:48a-16: gtsigs ma dang thod pa'i phreng ba can ma gshin rje'i kha tv'am ga 'phyar ba'o //
T02TD1401E:48a-17: nag mo bzang ba'i mdog can bza' ba dang btung ba lag na thogs pa'o //
T02TD1401E:48a-18: rlung du log 'dren gyi chung ma lag na ral gri dang dgra sta ma dang /
T02TD1401E:48a-19: lag na rdo rje ma dang /
T02TD1401E:48a-20: lag na padma can ma rnams te /
T02TD1401E:48a-21: rgyal ma la sogs pa'i mdog can lag na bza' ba dang btung ba la sogs pa thogs pa'o //
T02TD1401E:48a-22: yang shar phyogs kyi rta babs kyi mdun gyi dur khrod du 'jigs byed thod phreng can dang srin po dang tshogs kyi dbang phyug dang dril rna ste /
T02TD1401E:48a-23: bzhi po de dag chung ma dang bcas shing mkha' 'gro ma'i mdog can no //
T02TD1401E:48a-24: byang gi dur khrod du ni gtum pa'i dbang phyug dang /
T02TD1401E:48a-25: dza yig rngam dang rked pa'i ru dra dang /
T02TD1401E:48a-26: sbom pa'i dbang phyug chung ma dang bcas pa l'a ma'i mdog can no //
T02TD1401E:48a-27: nub phyogs kyi dur khrod du da ma ra dang 'dam ka dang pheg dang 'jigs su rung ba rnams chung ma dang bcas pa khanda ro h'a'i mdog can no //
T02TD1401E:48a-28: lho phyogs kyi dur khrod du ni sku'i dbang phyug dang /
T02TD1401E:48a-29: sgra chen dang mche ba gtsigs pa dang mda' 'dzin zhes bya ba rnams chung ma dang bcas pa gzugs can ma'i mdog go //
T02TD1401E:48a-30: de dag thams cad kyang zhal gcig pa phyag bzhi pa kha tv'am ga dang thod pa dang /
T02TD1401E:48a-31: mdung rtse gsum pa dang lha mo la 'khyud pa ste /
T02TD1401E:48a-32: sdar bstan pa'i shing brgyad la yang gnas par blta bar bya'o //
T02TD1401E:48b-0: de dag thams cad 'jig rten gsum na grub pa @48b dang rig pa 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD1401E:48b-1: lha'i bu mo dang mi la sogs pa rnams kyis phyogs bzhin kun du mdun du bdar ba /
T02TD1401E:48b-2: yi dags sha za la sogs pa 'du ba /
T02TD1401E:48b-3: ki li ki li'i sgra sgrogs par yid kyis blta bar bya zhing //
T02TD1401E:48b-4: sgrub pa po la yang mchog ster bas mngon par phyogs pa /
T02TD1401E:48b-5: rang gi ming gi yi ge snying gar dgod cing lus ngag yid gsum /
T02TD1401E:48b-6: aom a'a: h'um dang bcas pas rigs gsum las byung ba'o //
T02TD1401E:48b-7: de nas cho ga bzhin du bsang gtor dang zhabs bsil byin la dam tshig dang mnyam pa'i sbyor bas /
T02TD1401E:48b-8: rang gi 'khor lo la kha zas dbul bar bya ste /
T02TD1401E:48b-9: phyag 'tshal dbus su aa dang ldan //
T02TD1401E:48b-10: yi ge h'um byas sbar ba yis //
T02TD1401E:48b-11: yi ge hr'i: las me 'bar ba //
T02TD1401E:48b-12: ji srid bya ba rdzogs bar du //
T02TD1401E:48b-13: rdo rje thal mo gyen kha dbye //
T02TD1401E:48b-14: gsang sngags 'di ni brjod par bya //
T02TD1401E:48b-15: kha kha kh'a hi la sogs pa'i sngags kyis me tog dang bdug pa dang byug pa la sogs pas mchod do //
T02TD1401E:48b-16: de nas sems yang dag par mnyes nas mchog ster bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1401E:48b-17: gtso bor bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gsung thugs la rnam par gnas par bsam mo //
T02TD1401E:48b-18: dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel sgrub pa'i thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02TD1401E:48b-21: // / de nas mchod pa rnam dag bdag / ces bya ba la /
T02TD1401E:48b-22: rnam dag ces bya ba ni dngos po thams cad las so so ma yin pa nyid de /
T02TD1401E:48b-23: gnyis su med pa'i bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'o //
T02TD1401E:48b-24: de nyid sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi sku'o //
T02TD1401E:48b-25: de las nges par byung ba ni dpa' bo'o zhes bya ba la srid pa dang zhi ba dag la mi gnas pa'i phyir te longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
T02TD1401E:48b-26: de yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rjes su spyod pa ste /
T02TD1401E:48b-27: tshogs ma lus pa bsags pa las nges par 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD1401E:48b-28: sangs rgyas kyi tshogs spros nas sems can gyi don byed pa'i mtshan nyid ni sprul pa'i sku zhes bya ba ste /
T02TD1401E:48b-29: de'i ngo bo nyid kyi bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid mchod par bya ba ni rang gi lha'i sbyor ba yis ji ltar sbyor bas so //
T02TD1401E:48b-30: spun dang sdug pa'ang mchod par bya ste zhes bya ba ni lhan cig tu mnyam pa dang bsam pa dag pa dang nges par sbyor ba dang gcig tu byas pa'o //
T02TD1401E:49a-0: @49a * // 'ang gi sgras ni rnal 'byor ma nges par bzung ste /
T02TD1401E:49a-1: gang gi phyir de rnams ma gtogs par de'i phun sum tshogs par mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD1401E:49a-2: de nyid kyis na nges par gnas //
T02TD1401E:49a-4: lha mo dang 'dus ba'i sbyor bas so //
T02TD1401E:49a-5: zhi ba zhes bya ba ni chang ngo //
T02TD1401E:49a-6: yang na zhi ba'i bde ba'o //
T02TD1401E:49a-7: rtag tu shar ba 'od gsal ba //
T02TD1401E:49a-8: snying ga'i padmar nges brten nas //
T02TD1401E:49a-10: sems nyid bsgom par mi bya'o //
T02TD1401E:49a-12: spun dang bu dang lhan cig tu //
T02TD1401E:49a-13: zhes bya ba la brtse gdung gi byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ma gtogs par bya ste /
T02TD1401E:49a-14: sngags dang phyag rgya mchod cing dkyil 'khor dang tshogs kyi 'khor lo bstan pa dang rdo rje'i glu yang thos pas dam tshig la skur zhing slob dpon la smod pa dang /
T02TD1401E:49a-15: sems can thams cad sun 'byin par byed pa de'i phyir na rdo rje slob dpon gyi bu dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur zhing /
T02TD1401E:49a-16: de'i 'dus pa'i sems can gzhan yang byang chub kyi sems dri ma can du 'gyur ro //
T02TD1401E:49a-17: de rnams yongs su gzung ba'i phyir zas la spyad par bya ba zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02TD1401E:49a-19: khyad par du ji lta bu zhe na /
T02TD1401E:49a-20: gang gi phyir snying rje'i dbang gis byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ji lta ba de ltar de rnams la yang bstan par mi bya ste /
T02TD1401E:49a-21: dad pa'i dbang gis de rnams kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed pa gzhan nyid du 'gyur ro //
T02TD1401E:49a-22: gsang sngags su la'ang sbyin mi bya //
T02TD1401E:49a-23: zhes bya ba ni sems can yongs su ma smin pa rnams la'o //
T02TD1401E:49a-24: sbyin par bya zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1401E:49a-26: pho nya zhes bya ba la sogs pa la lam dang 'dra bas lam ste /
T02TD1401E:49a-28: de yang mtha' yas pa'i nyon mongs pa dang skye ba spyong ba ste /
T02TD1401E:49a-29: nyon mongs pa glo bur ba nyid kyi phyir nam mkha' la sprin dang khug rna dang du ba dang 'khrul pa tsam zhig bsal bas tshe 'di nyid la rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1401E:49a-30: de bas na de spangs nas rnal 'byor gzhan la brten par ni /
T02TD1401E:49a-31: nyan thos kyi spyod pa dang /
T02TD1401E:49b-0: kri ya dang spyod pa'i rgyud la sogs pa rnams su ji skad bshad pa'i dngos grub thams cad 'dod pa de dag rmongs pas dngos grub med cing bde ba med par 'gyur @49b ro ;
T02TD1401E:49b-1: / rgyal srid shor ba'i skyes bu bzhin //
T02TD1401E:49b-2: dad pa'i nor dang phral phyir ro //
T02TD1401E:49b-3: zhes pa ni zhen pa'i lta bas blta ba'o //
T02TD1401E:49b-4: thar pa ni grol ba ste /
T02TD1401E:49b-5: pho nya la zhen pa des grol ba'o //
T02TD1401E:49b-7: bde ba yis kyang longs spyod bya //
T02TD1401E:49b-9: bde ba thams cad ni bha ga las byung ba'i bdud rtsi nyid du nges pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1401E:49b-10: bsnyen bkur kho na bya ba min //
T02TD1401E:49b-12: bsnyen bkur gyi ni don can min //
T02TD1401E:49b-13: chags pas 'dus pa dga' ba ste //
T02TD1401E:49b-14: de phyir 'khyud par rab tu bya //
T02TD1401E:49b-15: rjes su chags dang ldan pas thob //
T02TD1401E:49b-16: gzhan du bde bar mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD1401E:49b-17: skye gnas dman pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rdo rje'i rigs la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1401E:49b-18: 'ang gi sgras ni bram ze mchog la sogs pa bsdu ba'o //
T02TD1401E:49b-19: de rnams kyang ma dang srid mo la sogs pa ltar shin tu gdung ba'i dbang gis so //
T02TD1401E:49b-20: dka' thub bdag nyid chen po yis //
T02TD1401E:49b-21: gang zhig rtag tu mchod byed pa //
T02TD1401E:49b-22: bshung zhing dman pa'i sems kyis ni //
T02TD1401E:49b-23: dka' thub nges par zad par 'gyur //
T02TD1401E:49b-24: 'khor lo de bzhin grub pa yis //
T02TD1401E:49b-25: zhes bya ba ni gang gi dam tshig dang sdom pa nyams pa rnams kyi yang phyis blang ba la ni rnal 'byor 'di sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD1401E:49b-27: dam tshig sdom pa bla na med //
T02TD1401E:49b-28: nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas par //
T02TD1401E:49b-29: dam tshig dkyil 'khor bla na med //
T02TD1401E:49b-30: de yi dbus su 'khor lo che //
T02TD1401E:49b-31: dkyil 'khor lnga yis brgyan pa ni //
T02TD1401E:49b-32: dbus su nyi stan yi dags la //
T02TD1401E:49b-33: a'i li k'a lir yang dag ldan //
T02TD1401E:49b-34: sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshon 'chang zhing //
T02TD1401E:49b-35: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan //
T02TD1401E:49b-36: byin gyis brlabs pa'i tshig byas nas //
T02TD1401E:49b-37: yi ge hi las yang dag byung //
T02TD1401E:49b-39: spyan gsum mche ba gtsigs pa'o //
T02TD1401E:49b-40: ljags 'dril khro dang bcas bzhad zhal //
T02TD1401E:49b-41: lha chen thams cad gsol mdzad pa //
T02TD1401E:49b-42: bskal pa'i me ltar yang dag 'khrug / ral pa'i cod pan gyis brgyan zhing //
T02TD1401E:49b-43: 'jigs byed pags pas rked pa dkris //
T02TD1401E:49b-44: g-yas brkyang zhabs kyis legs bzhugs pas //
T02TD1401E:49b-45: 'jigs byed dus mtshan kun du mnan //
T02TD1401E:49b-46: dpral bar rdo rje phreng ba dang //
T02TD1401E:50a-0: @50a * // sna tshogs rdo rje zla phyed brgyan //
T02TD1401E:50a-1: sku la rgyan drug rgyan du byas //
T02TD1401E:50a-2: phyag drug zhal na lnga pa ste //
T02TD1401E:50a-3: sna tshogs nyams dang ro mchog ldan //
T02TD1401E:50a-4: sngo dang ser dang de bzhin dmar //
T02TD1401E:50a-5: ljang dang steng dkar zhi ba'o //
T02TD1401E:50a-6: shi ba'ang gso bar byed pa'i mchog / sdang ba thams cad nges gnas pa'i //
T02TD1401E:50a-7: rdo rje dril bu snyoms zhugs shing //
T02TD1401E:50a-8: phag mo'i sku la yang dag 'khyud //
T02TD1401E:50a-9: sa srungs pags pa na bza' 'dzin //
T02TD1401E:50a-10: steng du gdugs dkar gzung ba ste //
T02TD1401E:50a-11: thod pa dang ni kha tv'am 'dzin //
T02TD1401E:50a-12: drug pa na ni cang te'u'o //
T02TD1401E:50a-13: de dang 'dra ba'i phag mo yi //
T02TD1401E:50a-14: dbu skra grol zhing gcer bu la //
T02TD1401E:50a-15: mi rus rgyan gyis rnam par bklubs //
T02TD1401E:50a-16: 'on kyang pags pa'i gos kyi gnas su gri dang tshangs pa'i mgo dgod par bya'o //
T02TD1401E:50a-17: de shar sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ste //
T02TD1401E:50a-18: de bzhin byang du las mkha' 'gro //
T02TD1401E:50a-19: nub tu chos kyi mkha' 'gro ste //
T02TD1401E:50a-20: lho ru rin chen mkha' 'gro nyid //
T02TD1401E:50a-21: dkar dang sngo dang dmar po dang //
T02TD1401E:50a-22: ljang gu dang steng dmar ser po //
T02TD1401E:50a-23: 'khor lo dang dril bus snyoms par 'jug cing phyag gnyis kyis tshangs pa'i pags pa'i gos bsnams pa dang gzhan gyis thod pa dang kha tv'am ga dang cang te'u'o //
T02TD1401E:50a-24: g-yas brkyang pas tshangs pa khyo shug mnan pa'o //
T02TD1401E:50a-25: yang ljang gu dang ser po dang dmar po dang sngon po dang /
T02TD1401E:50a-26: de bzhin du lnga pa steng ma dkar po ste /
T02TD1401E:50a-27: sna tshogs rdo rje dang dril bus snyoms par 'jug pa /
T02TD1401E:50a-28: tshogs kyi bdag po'i pags pa bsnams pa dang /
T02TD1401E:50a-30: kha tv'am ga dang cang te'u bsnams pa'o //
T02TD1401E:50a-31: g-yas brkyang gi gnas pas tshogs kyi bdag po khyo shug mnan pas 'jigs shing myos pa'o //
T02TD1401E:50a-32: yang dmar po dang sngon po dang ser po dang ljang gu dang steng ma dkar po ste /
T02TD1401E:50a-33: padma dang dril bus snyoms par 'jug cing 'dod pa'i lha'i pags pa dral ba bsnams pa dang /
T02TD1401E:50a-37: g-yas brkyang pa'i gnas pas 'dod pa'i dbang phyug bus khyo shug mnan pa'o //
T02TD1401E:50a-38: yang ser po dang sngon po dang dmar po dang ljang gu dang de bzhin du steng ma dkar po ste /
T02TD1401E:50b-0: rin po che dang dril bus snyoms @50b par 'jug cing dbang po dral ba'i pags pa bsnams pa dang thod pa dang kha tv'am ga dang cang te'u'o //
T02TD1401E:50b-1: g-yas brkyang ba'i gnas pas dbang po khyo shug mnan pa ste /
T02TD1401E:50b-2: kun kyang spyan gsum pa phyag drug pa ral pa'i cod pan dar gyis bcings pa /
T02TD1401E:50b-3: me mtshams dang bden bral dang ;
T02TD1401E:50b-4: rlung mtshams dang dbang ldan gyi mtshams rnams su ni sangs rgyas kyi mkha' 'gro ma dang /
T02TD1401E:50b-7: las kyi mkha' 'gro ma rnams te /
T02TD1401E:50b-8: dkar po dang sngon po dang dmar po'o //
T02TD1401E:50b-9: yang sngon po dang dkar po dang ser po'o //
T02TD1401E:50b-10: yang dmar po dang sngon po dang ser po'o //
T02TD1401E:50b-11: yang ljang gu dang sngon po dang ser po ste /
T02TD1401E:50b-12: kun kyang zhal gsum phyag drug pa //
T02TD1401E:50b-13: spyan gsum gcer bu ska grol la //
T02TD1401E:50b-14: phyag rgya lnga yis brgyan pa'o //
T02TD1401E:50b-15: nga rgyal bcas shing gar mdzad pa //
T02TD1401E:50b-16: snying rje chags pa'i dga' dang ldan //
T02TD1401E:50b-17: 'khor lo'i mda' dang rdo rje'i mda' //
T02TD1401E:50b-18: padma'i mda' dang rin chen mda' //
T02TD1401E:50b-19: rang gi mtshan mas mtshan ma'i mda' //
T02TD1401E:50b-20: g-yon pa thams cad na gzhu'o //
T02TD1401E:50b-21: thod pa kha tv'am ga dang da ma du'o //
T02TD1401E:50b-22: gzhan gyis zhags pa dang lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD1401E:50b-23: shin tu zlum zhing re mig dgu //
T02TD1401E:50b-24: phyi rol gru bzhi sgo bzhir ldan //
T02TD1401E:50b-25: de la shar sgor ni gzugs mang ngo //
T02TD1401E:50b-26: byang du ni gzugs bzang ngo //
T02TD1401E:50b-27: nub tu ni rdo rje dbyig pa can no //
T02TD1401E:50b-28: lhor ni rdo rje snang ba'o //
T02TD1401E:50b-29: kun kyang zhal gsum phyag drug pa //
T02TD1401E:50b-30: rgyan rnams kun gyis bklubs pa ste //
T02TD1401E:50b-31: sngon bstan sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro sogs //
T02TD1401E:50b-32: rim bzhin mtshan ma thogs pa'o //
T02TD1401E:50b-33: de yi phyi rol yul du yang //
T02TD1401E:50b-34: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02TD1401E:50b-35: rta babs bzhi yis brgyan pa dang /
T02TD1401E:50b-36: dang dang me tog gi phreng ba 'phyang ba ste /
T02TD1401E:50b-37: de la lha'i snam bu gru bzhi pa'i me'i mtshams la sogs pa'i g-yon skor gyis dgod par bya ba ni rdo rje'i kha dang drag po'i kha dang /
T02TD1401E:50b-38: rdo rje phag sna ma dang /
T02TD1401E:50b-40: rdo rje pho nya mo dang /
T02TD1401E:50b-42: rdo rje gzhon nu ma dang /
T02TD1401E:50b-43: rdo rje dung can ma dang /
T02TD1401E:51a-4: sna tshogs kyi gzugs ma dang /
T02TD1401E:51a-5: rdo rje lus can ma dang /
T02TD1401E:51a-10: de ltar lha mo nyi shu'o //
T02TD1401E:51a-11: shar phyogs kyi sgor ni rdo rje 'bar ba ma dang ;
T02TD1401E:51a-12: byang du ni rdo rje 'khyil ma'o //
T02TD1401E:51a-13: nub tu ni rdo rje 'jigs byed ma'o //
T02TD1401E:51a-14: lhor ni rdo rje grub ma'o //
T02TD1401E:51a-15: de dag ni mkha' 'gro ma'i dkyil 'khor grub pa'o //
T02TD1401E:51a-16: sgo srung ba thams cad kyang spyan gsum pa /
T02TD1401E:51a-17: zhal rnam par 'gyur ba gsus pa 'phyang ba'o //
