T02TD1401E:51a-18: gzhan dag ni sna tshogs kyi gzugs can rol ba mo thams cad phyag rgya lnga 'dzin pa thod pa'i phreng bas brgyan pa zhal gsum pa dpa' ba dang sgeg pa dang snying rje'i ros gang ba nu ma rgyas shing skal ba dang ldan ma gcer bu skra grol ba snying rje chen pos chags pa'i dga' ba'i dam pa ro'i gdan la bzhugs pas gar byed pa'i mchog ste /
T02TD1401E:51a-19: thod pa dang kha tv'am ga dang rde'u chung gi bdag nyid can /
T02TD1401E:51a-20: zhags pa dang lcags kyu can rdo rje gsor zhing dril bu dkrol ba'o //
T02TD1401E:51a-21: de nas sku dang gsung dang thugs byin gyis brlabs la go cha gnyis kyis brgyan nas ye shes kyi 'khor lo de la dgug pa ste /
T02TD1401E:51a-22: dbang bskur ba la yang dag par mchod nas /
T02TD1401E:51a-23: bstod pa byas la sngags bzlas par bya ste /
T02TD1401E:51a-24: aom shr'i badzra d'a ka aa ham h'um d'a ki ni dz'a la samba ra hum h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1401E:51a-25: gus pa'i bsam pas rtag tu bzlas par bya ste /
T02TD1401E:51a-26: rdo rje mi smra ba'i brtul zhugs chen po spro ba dang bsdu bar bya'o //
T02TD1401E:51a-27: aom shr'i buddha d'a ka aa bhr'um h'um d'a ki ni dz'a la samba nga hum h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1401E:51a-28: aom shr'i karma d'a ka aa kham h'um d'a ki ni dz'a la samba ra hum h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1401E:51a-29: aom shr'i padma d'a ka aa dhri h'um d'a ki ni dz'a la samba ra hum h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1401E:51a-30: aom shr'i ratna d'a ka aa aam h'um d'a ki ni dz'a la samba ra hum h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1401E:51a-31: aom shr'i badzra w'a r'a h'i bam hum h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1401E:51a-32: de ltar mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi bzlas pa'i sngags rab tu bshad pa'o //
T02TD1401E:51a-33: sngom pa 'di rnam par nges par bzung na rdo rje dang mnyam pa'i dngos grub bzang po gdon mi za'o //
T02TD1401E:51b-0: mchog dang tha ma zhes bya ba la @51b sogs pa ni gang yang gzhan dag sngon du grub pa dam tshig can byin gyis brlab pa'i go 'phang dran par bya ste /
T02TD1401E:51b-1: mchog tu zhes bya ba ni lhan cig skyes ma'o //
T02TD1401E:51b-2: dbus ma ni zhing las skyes ma'o //
T02TD1401E:51b-3: tha ma ni sngags skyes ma'o //
T02TD1401E:51b-4: des lhan cig skyes pa de'i rdzas ni rnam bar nges pa yin zhes bya ba ste /
T02TD1401E:51b-5: rtsar chud pa'i dbang po thams cad las byung ba'i rdzas gang de rnams kyi rkyen gyis rtag tu bskyed pa'i bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa gnas pa'i thod pa la khrag dang chang du ldan pas dkyil 'khor gru gsum byas la /
T02TD1401E:51b-6: steng dang dbus dang 'og rnams su //
T02TD1401E:51b-7: phyogs dang phyogs mtshams ji ltar gsungs //
T02TD1401E:51b-8: de nas kha zas bza' bya ste //
T02TD1401E:51b-9: de nyid gsum ni mngon bsngags la //
T02TD1401E:51b-10: dam tshig mchog ni btung zhing sbyin //
T02TD1401E:51b-11: bla ma rdo rje 'dzin gtso dang //
T02TD1401E:51b-12: rnal 'byor ma tshogs bdag la gson //
T02TD1401E:51b-13: sngom pa ma lus bzung byas nas //
T02TD1401E:51b-14: rtag tu bdag gis bskyang bar bgyi //
T02TD1401E:51b-16: 'jig rten la rtag g-yon nas sbyong //
T02TD1401E:51b-17: ces bya ba la g-yon pa'i kun du spyod pa rnams ni bde ba'i 'byung gnas yin pas grub pa'i don du rnam par spyod do //
T02TD1401E:51b-18: rnal 'byor chen po 'di nyid bde ba can dang nam mkha'i pho brang dang /
T02TD1401E:51b-19: 'jig rten gsum gyi 'gro ba'i bdag po'o //
T02TD1401E:51b-20: gang g-yon pas g-yon pa las skyes pa rnams pa rgyan na mchog gi don thams cad ster bar nus shing rgyas par byed la bde ba ster bas na g-yon gyis bkur sti bya ste /
T02TD1401E:51b-21: rnal 'byor pa thabs thams cad la mkhas pas so //
T02TD1401E:51b-22: gang gi phyir bde mchog gtso bo'i nges pa thams cad g-yon ba las byung ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD1401E:51b-23: phyag rgya chen pos mchod med par //
T02TD1401E:51b-24: gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa mchod //
T02TD1401E:51b-25: de yis ngal ba don med de //
T02TD1401E:51b-27: brtul zhugs ma nyams zhes bya ba la brtul zhugs ni dus kyi nges pa dang /
T02TD1401E:51b-28: sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis la sogs pas bskal pa du mas brgya lam na sangs rgyas pa de dag thams cad zil gyis gnon cing brtul zhugs spong pa ste /
T02TD1401E:51b-29: tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas thob par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1401E:52a-1: pa po bya ba la brtson pa ni 'jig rten pa'i spyod pa las rnam par grol ba ste brtul zhugs rdzogs pa'o //
T02TD1401E:52a-2: dam tshig ces bya ba la sogs pa la 'dis grangs su bgrangs pas ni rigs te drug dang lnga la sogs par gsungs pa'o /
T02TD1401E:52a-3: lhan cig ces pa ni sngon du bstan pa bzhin no //
T02TD1401E:52a-4: rigs lnga las ni kun spyod pa //
T02TD1401E:52a-5: zhes bya ba la rin po che'i rigs mi bskyod pa nang du 'dus pas rigs bzhi ru rab tu gtogs so //
T02TD1401E:52a-6: mthar thug pa yang sems kyi bdag po'i rigs su gcig pa'o //
T02TD1401E:52a-7: dkyil 'khor pa rnams der mnyam pa'o //
T02TD1401E:52a-8: rnam par mi rtog kun spyod bya //
T02TD1401E:52a-10: longs spyod min pa'i zas rnams dang //
T02TD1401E:52a-11: 'dod pa'i yon tan rnam pa lnga //
T02TD1401E:52a-12: kha na ma tho med bsten bya //
T02TD1401E:52a-13: me la ji ltar bzang ba mnyam spyod yul //
T02TD1401E:52a-14: ji ltar nyi ma'i snang bas mnyam par ston //
T02TD1401E:52a-15: rlung gis ji ltar dri ma mnyam par bsdus //
T02TD1401E:52a-16: rnam rtog rmongs pa'i rgya mtsho rigs spangs la //
T02TD1401E:52a-17: dam tshig ma lus kun tu spyod par bya //
T02TD1401E:52a-18: dkyil 'khor gru gsum zhes bya ba la //
T02TD1401E:52a-19: sa phyogs rtsub cing snying po ma yin pa /
T02TD1401E:52a-20: gas shing mdog gnag pa la /
T02TD1401E:52a-22: zabs su sor bcu pa'i thab khung byang du mgo bstan pa byas la las kyi rdo rje dang /
T02TD1401E:52a-23: de bzhin du mdung rtse gsum pa dang /
T02TD1401E:52a-24: rdo rje tho ba'i mtshan ma rnams rtse mo steng du bltas pas gsad pa'i las la mdung gi rtse mo steng du blta bar bya ste /
T02TD1401E:52a-25: phyag mtshan 'dir sor bzhi pa'i tshad du bri bar bya'o //
T02TD1401E:52a-26: de'i steng du sor gsum bor nas zheng dang dpangs sor gsum pa'i kha khyer gyis thab khung bskor bar bya'o //
T02TD1401E:52a-27: de nas sa nag po nyid dang bong bu dang rnga mo'i rtug pa dang /
T02TD1401E:52a-28: mi rus dang 'bras kyi phub ma dang /
T02TD1401E:52a-29: sol ba byugs la dri mi zhim pa'i me tog dang bdug pas mchod la /
T02TD1401E:52a-30: shing dri mi zhim zhing rtsub pa tsher ma can gyi shing ngam /
T02TD1401E:52a-32: bong bu dang rnga mo'i rtug pa skam pos bya zhing nim pa dang seng ldeng dang tsher ma can nam /
T02TD1401E:52b-0: ba lu te ka tsher ma can la sogs pa'i shing rnams kyi yam shing sor bcu pa'i tshad tsam rtsa ba'i cha @52b las byas pa'am /
T02TD1401E:52b-1: ro bsregs pa'i rtsub shing gshags pa las byung ba 'ang rung ste /
T02TD1401E:52b-2: dug dang khrag dang mar khu la bdug pa bsreg par bya'o //
T02TD1401E:52b-3: yang yungs kar tsha ba'i mar khu dang khrag dang lan tshva dang ske tshe dang ni ma pa'i 'dab ma'i thal ba dang /
T02TD1401E:52b-4: rkang rjes kyi sa dang bong bu dang rnga mo la sogs pa'i rtug pa dang skra dang zhag dang bya rog dang 'ug pa'i sgro dang bshang ba dang gci ba dang mi rus kyi phye ma dang spu dang sha la sogs pa re re zhing ji skad rnyed pa'i rdzas dug dang khrag dang smyo byed kyi 'dab ma'i khu bas sbangs la /
T02TD1401E:52b-5: thal ba dang sol ba dang 'bras kyi phub ma la sogs pas dgra bo'i gzugs brnyan byas la mtshon rnon pos mgo bo nas brtsams te /
T02TD1401E:52b-6: lus dum bu dum bur gtubs la /
T02TD1401E:52b-7: mngon spyod kyi las la sbyin sreg dbul te /
T02TD1401E:52b-8: lcags kyi snod du khrag dang chu dang mi dang bong bu'i gcin la yi ge phat kyi mtha' dang ldan pa'i mngon spyod yi ge bdun pa lan bdun bzlas la /
T02TD1401E:52b-9: bsreg rdzas la bsang gtor byas la /
T02TD1401E:52b-10: dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa rnams dang /
T02TD1401E:52b-11: dam tshig las 'da' bar byed pa rnams spyar bar bya'o //
T02TD1401E:52b-12: de nas gos nag pos brgyan zhing lcags kyi rgyan dang ldan pas khro bo'i sems kyis gshin rje'i phyogs su kha bltas la sngags pas khro bo'i skyil krung gis stan mkhrang po la gnas shing mtshan phyed dang nyin phyed na bsgrub bya rnam par bsams te /
T02TD1401E:52b-13: rang gis bskyed pa'i dkyil 'khor du /
T02TD1401E:52b-14: yi ge h'um phat mtha' na yod pa'i 'brug sgra ltar sngags brjod la /
T02TD1401E:52b-15: des rab dang 'bring dang tha ma'i sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD1401E:52b-16: 'dir mngon spyod kyi me ni dur khrod kyi me'am rus pa las byung ba 'am rdo las skyes pa 'am gdol pa'i khyim nas byung bas gong ma thab khung du ji ltar bstan pa'i bud shing la rlung g-yab kyis ba ba ka sbar te /
T02TD1401E:52b-17: h'um dzva la dzva la h'um zhes brjod cing chog bzhin du me sbar ro //
T02TD1401E:52b-18: de nas lag pa g-yon pa ku sha dang bcas pa'i mthe bong srin lag gi rtsa bar btsugs la me lha spyan drang bar bya ste /
T02TD1401E:53a-0: aom ae hye ma h'a bh'u ta de ba ri shi dvi dza satva ma gri hi tva a'a hu ti a'a ha ram aa smin sanni hi to bha ba zhes bya bas @53a * //
T02TD1401E:53a-1: me'i phyogs nas spyan drangs te /
T02TD1401E:53a-2: byon nas 'bar ba'i snying bo'i dbus su khro bo mi bzad ces bya ba'i klog ltar phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa ba spu kham pa de bzhin du du ba'i mdog can mig g-yo ba steng du gzigs shing sbra che ba /
T02TD1401E:53a-3: mche ba bzhi pa stobs che zhang rlung gi dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa 'jigs pa'i yi ge h'um gis h'um zhes mdzad pas spyan gsum pa la phyag bzhi pa rdo rje 'od zer gyi gzi brjid che zhing rig pa'i gnas la legs par bzhugs pa /
T02TD1401E:53a-4: zhal bdun pa rnam par gtsigs shing ma he'i gdan la bcibs pa'i du ba'i phreng bas 'khrug cing 'jigs su rung ba lcags kyi rgyan bzang po dang ldan zhing lcags kyi lugs ma'i zhal can 'bar ba'i phreng ba dang bcas shing spyan dmar ser mnyam pa med pas 'jigs par gzigs pa gos sngon po mnabs shing 'jig pa'i me ltar drag po'i 'od kyis 'jig rten gsum po gsal ba /
T02TD1401E:53a-5: phyag gnyis kyis mdung dang rdo rje 'dzin pa /
T02TD1401E:53a-6: yang gzhan gyis ral gri dang zangs gri 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD1401E:53a-7: de'i g-yas logs su ni nag po kham ser zhes bya ba g-yas gnyis na rdo rje dang gri gug 'dzin pa yan lag nag po'i du ba'i spyan can tshams kyis ma mchu bzung nas 'tshir ba'o //
T02TD1401E:53a-8: g-yon gnyis khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa dang ral gri 'dzin pas gnas pa 'od zer dmar po mnyam du 'bar ba'o //
T02TD1401E:53a-9: g-yon du ni gshin rje mthar byed drag cing char sprin gyi 'od dang mnyam pa zhal drug phyag drug mnga' zhing /
T02TD1401E:53a-10: zhal drug la spyan gsum pa rnam par 'gyur zhing /
T02TD1401E:53a-11: zhal mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa lcags kyi rgyan 'bar ba can dur khrod kyi me ltar dpangs mtho ba ma he la zhon pa 'jam dpal gyis nying po las byung bar bya'o //
T02TD1401E:53a-12: me thab kyi ngos gnyis la ni mthar byed dang nag po gnyis ji lta ba'i rang bzhin can du bsam par bya ste /
T02TD1401E:53a-13: ltogs shing za 'dod pa phyag bzhi pa dang drug pa can no //
T02TD1401E:53a-14: yi dags kyi rgyal po ji lta ba de bzhin du drag cing bya ba byed pa'i byin za drag po'i las 'ba' zhig sems pa'o //
T02TD1401E:53a-15: de ltar thams cad ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs las byung ste /
T02TD1401E:53b-0: don thams cad @53b bsgrub pa'i sgrub pa pos las dang rjes su mthun pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'i sbyor bas yang dag par ldan par byas la /
T02TD1401E:53b-1: sku dang gsung dang thugs byin gyis brlabs par byas nas cho ga bzhin du mchod yon la sogs pas mchod pa bya ste /
T02TD1401E:53b-3: rkang pa gnyis la ni zhabs bkru'o //
T02TD1401E:53b-4: aom aargham pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a /
T02TD1401E:53b-5: lag pa g-yas pa'i mdzub mo dang /
T02TD1401E:53b-6: mthe bong bkab pa lta bur byas pas chu blangs te lag pa bskyod pas dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD1401E:53b-7: aom p'a tyam pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a /
T02TD1401E:53b-8: de nas zhal bsil dang bsang gtor byin la mchod pa bya ste /
T02TD1401E:53b-13: lha bshos kyang de bzhin du mdun du dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD1401E:53b-14: de ltar yang dag par mchod pa dang khyad par du yang yid kyis nan tan du bsams la /
T02TD1401E:53b-17: de la dgong gzar ni yu ba sor bcu drug pa la dkyus sor bzhi pa zabs su sor gnyis pa /
T02TD1401E:53b-18: de'i dbus su yang gru gsum pa ste /
T02TD1401E:53b-19: rdo rje rtse gsum pa'i phreng bas yongs su bskor ba 'di'i dbus su yang mtshan ma bya ste /
T02TD1401E:53b-20: stag dang sbrul dang seng ge rnams kyi gdong pa gang 'dod pas mtshan mar bya zhing mar 'dzag pa'i bu ga sor gcig pa'o //
T02TD1401E:53b-21: mchu ni rdo rje gdeng pa 'dar bas byin gyis brlabs pa'i sor tshad tsam mo //
T02TD1401E:53b-22: de bzhin du blugs gzar gyi yu ba ni sor bcu bzhi pa dkyus sor gsum pa /
T02TD1401E:53b-23: zabs sor gcig pa gru gsum pa de bzhin du mtshan mas byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
T02TD1401E:53b-24: yu ba'i mthar ni rdo rje rtse gsum gdengs pas byin gyis rlabs pa'i mngon spyod kyi gzar bu dgang bar bya ste /
T02TD1401E:53b-25: thog gis brgyab pa'i shing ngam lcags sam /
T02TD1401E:53b-26: tsher ma rno ba can gyi shing rnams las bya'o //
T02TD1401E:53b-27: 'dis ni sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'jig zhes bya pa'i don no //
T02TD1401E:53b-28: de ltar phyi rol gyi spyin sreg bshad nas /
T02TD1401E:53b-29: yang nang gi bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1401E:53b-30: sngags dang phyag rgya yang dag ldan //
T02TD1401E:53b-31: dpa' bo rnams kyi zas de bzhin //
T02TD1401E:53b-33: sngon du bstan pa'i rdzas rnams kyis //
T02TD1401E:54a-0: rang gi lhag ba'i lha'i sbyor @54a * //
T02TD1401E:54a-2: nyon mongs thams cad zhi don dang //
T02TD1401E:54a-3: ting nge 'dzin ni rgyas bya'i phyir //
T02TD1401E:54a-4: srid gsum snying po'i thab khung du //
T02TD1401E:54a-5: las rnams thams cad rab bsgrub bya //
T02TD1401E:54a-6: rang bzhin gyis byung lte ba ru //
T02TD1401E:54a-7: gtum mo'i me ni bzang pos brgyan //
T02TD1401E:54a-8: rtsa ba'i rang bzhin he ru ka / rnal 'byor pa kun dgang bar bya //
T02TD1401E:54a-9: rang bzhin med pa'i sems kyis ni //
T02TD1401E:54a-10: 'byung ba kun gyi sreg blugs bya //
T02TD1401E:54a-11: 'di ni bla med sbyin sreg tu //
T02TD1401E:54a-12: sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu gsungs //
T02TD1401E:54a-13: rang gis bdag nyid rang bzhin du //
T02TD1401E:54a-14: phyi yi dngos po shes bar bya //
T02TD1401E:54a-16: 'od zer phreng bas 'khrigs shing drag /'od kyi dkyil 'khor rab 'bar ba //
T02TD1401E:54a-17: lte ba'i thab khung kun du gsungs //
T02TD1401E:54a-18: lte ba me yi thab khung nyid //
T02TD1401E:54a-19: bud shing thams cad ye shes mes //
T02TD1401E:54a-20: 'byin dang sdud par byed pa yin //
T02TD1401E:54a-21: las kyi rlung gis rab bskyod pas //
T02TD1401E:54a-22: lte ba'i dkyil du rab tu 'bar //
T02TD1401E:54a-23: dbang po kun las byung ba'i sems //
T02TD1401E:54a-24: bde ba bud shing du ni 'gyur //
T02TD1401E:54a-25: las dang skye ba las byung ba //
T02TD1401E:54a-26: nyon mongs zhi phyir sbyin sreg bya //
T02TD1401E:54a-27: rdzogs pa'i byang chub rim gyis ni //
T02TD1401E:54a-29: bskal pa'i me dang rtogs mtshungs shing ;
T02TD1401E:54a-30: /'od kyi snang bas legs gnas pa //
T02TD1401E:54a-31: rtsa brgyad rnams kyi 'bras bu ni //
T02TD1401E:54a-32: snying ga'i gnas su yang dga' bar //
T02TD1401E:54a-33: drug cu rtsa bzhi'i 'dab ldan pa'i //
T02TD1401E:54a-34: padma nyid kyi dbus su me //
T02TD1401E:54a-35: de yi dbus su me yi lha //
T02TD1401E:54a-36: mthe bo'i tshigs tshad tsam du blta //
T02TD1401E:54a-37: phyag gnyis me yi mdog can ma //
T02TD1401E:54a-38: lhan cig skyes dga' rab 'bar ba'i //
T02TD1401E:54a-39: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mnan nas ni //
T02TD1401E:54a-41: dbyings kun la ni 'bar byed pa //
T02TD1401E:54a-42: thams cad rtsa ru song bar blta //
T02TD1401E:54a-43: blta ba kun gyi bud shing ni //
T02TD1401E:54a-44: 'dab ma'i mthar ni yang dag gsungs //
T02TD1401E:54a-45: yid kyis me tog mchod bya zhing //
T02TD1401E:54a-46: yid kyis bdug pas bdug par bya //
T02TD1401E:54a-47: yid kyi dri ni bde dang ldan //
T02TD1401E:54a-48: yid kyi mar me rab 'bar ba //
T02TD1401E:54a-49: gtor ma 'dus byas gang ba yi //
T02TD1401E:54a-50: yid nyid kyis ni mchod par bya //
T02TD1401E:54a-51: rkyang ma dgang gzar yang dag gsungs //
T02TD1401E:54b-0: ro bcud @54b blugs gzar blugs gzar kha //
T02TD1401E:54b-2: sor gnyis tshad du rab rgyas pa'o //
T02TD1401E:54b-3: dbyug pa rdo rje rin chen mtha' //
T02TD1401E:54b-4: ji srid rang gi rdo rje 'bar //
T02TD1401E:54b-5: thod pa sreg rdzas snod yin te //
T02TD1401E:54b-6: thams cad rdzas ni sreg blugs byas //
T02TD1401E:54b-7: de ltar rim pa rab tu brjod //
T02TD1401E:54b-8: rtsa lnga la ni yang dag brten //
T02TD1401E:54b-9: lnga po yang dag sbyar bar bya //
T02TD1401E:54b-10: sa dang chu dang de bzhin me //
T02TD1401E:54b-11: rlung dang nam mkha' mnyam pa'o //
T02TD1401E:54b-12: chu shing me tog lta bu ni //
T02TD1401E:54b-13: lte ba'i dbus su yang dag gnas //
T02TD1401E:54b-14: rtag tu khyab byed gnas pa ste //
T02TD1401E:54b-15: mkhas pas kun tu bskor bar bya //
T02TD1401E:54b-16: 'dab brgyad rtag tu steng du blta //
T02TD1401E:54b-17: ge sar dang ni ldan par gsungs //
T02TD1401E:54b-18: de yi dbus su rab brtan pa //
T02TD1401E:54b-19: rnam shes lhan cig skyes pa'i lha //
T02TD1401E:54b-20: rlung gi nam mkhar rab tu 'bar //
T02TD1401E:54b-21: de'i rdul phran rnam pa ru //
T02TD1401E:54b-22: mtshan nyid rab tu shes par bya //
T02TD1401E:54b-23: skra rtse brgya yi cha yis ni //
T02TD1401E:54b-26: thig le ri mo yi ge med //
T02TD1401E:54b-27: sngon bzhin mtshan nyid yang dag ldan //
T02TD1401E:54b-28: sor mo lnga dang mnyam ldan pas //
T02TD1401E:54b-29: gang ba'i sbyin sreg rab tu gsungs //
T02TD1401E:54b-30: sreg blugs sbyin sreg sor mo gsum //
T02TD1401E:54b-31: sbyin sreg rim pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1401E:54b-32: bdud rtsi'i yi ge yang dag ldan //
T02TD1401E:54b-33: bdud rtsi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni //
T02TD1401E:54b-34: mchog gi de nyid yi ge gsum //
T02TD1401E:54b-35: bde chen bdud rtsi dgug pa yis //
T02TD1401E:54b-36: dmigs pa thams cad dga' bar gsungs //
T02TD1401E:54b-37: sbyin sreg gi ni rim pa yis //
T02TD1401E:54b-39: nyin dang mtshan du khu ba'i rgyun //
T02TD1401E:54b-40: de bzhin gshegs pa kun bsdus nas //
T02TD1401E:54b-41: der ni sku mchog rab bzhugs pa //
T02TD1401E:54b-42: zhi ba'i sbyin sreg de brjod do //
T02TD1401E:54b-43: rgyas la byang chub sems dpa' dgug / gzugs su lhag par mos par bya //
T02TD1401E:54b-44: shin tu nyon mongs zad pa'i phyir //
T02TD1401E:54b-45: khyad par du ni khro po'i gzugs //
T02TD1401E:54b-46: rnam pa sna tshogs rjes chags pas //
T02TD1401E:54b-47: bud med gzugs ni rnam bsam bya //
T02TD1401E:54b-48: sku gsung thugs la 'de bas pa'i phyir //
T02TD1401E:54b-49: bud med phyag rgya rab tu gsungs //
T02TD1401E:54b-50: gru gsum me yi dkyil 'khor du //
T02TD1401E:54b-51: rang byung gi ni lhag pa'i lha //
T02TD1401E:55a-2: sngags pas las rnams thams cad pa /
T02TD1401E:55a-3: dpa' bo gnyis med snyoms 'jug ba //
T02TD1401E:55a-5: yi ge gnyis kyi sngags lus can //
T02TD1401E:55a-6: ha ha sid byas yang dag zlos //
T02TD1401E:55a-8: lhan cig skyes dga' rab tu 'bar //
T02TD1401E:55a-10: 'jig dus me dang stobs mnyam la //
T02TD1401E:55a-11: ma lus pa kun sbyin sreg las //
T02TD1401E:55a-12: lnga phung phyi nas ma 'khor te //
T02TD1401E:55a-13: de yi thal ba'ang lus mi 'gyur //
T02TD1401E:55a-14: chos kyi rang bzhin 'gag med pa'i //
T02TD1401E:55a-15: chos nyid dang ni snying rje ches //
T02TD1401E:55a-16: smon lam gyis ni bskyed pa yis //
T02TD1401E:55a-17: sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par 'gyur //
T02TD1401E:55a-18: bde ba'i byang chub dkyil 'khor ni //
T02TD1401E:55a-20: nyon mongs shin tu zhi don dang //
T02TD1401E:55a-21: shin tu stong pa rten med pas //
T02TD1401E:55a-22: sprin med nam mkha' ji bzhin du //
T02TD1401E:55a-23: shes rab pha rol phyin gang dang //
T02TD1401E:55a-24: phyag rgya chen po dbang du 'gyur //
T02TD1401E:55a-25: shr'i he ru ka'i sprul pa zhes bya ni /
T02TD1401E:55a-26: khams gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD1401E:55a-27: nyer spyod ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas ji lta ba de bzhin du sems can thams cad de dag gnyis su med pa'i rnam par mtshon pa'o //
T02TD1401E:55a-28: bstan bcos thams cad brjod ces bya ba ni /
T02TD1401E:55a-29: sangs rgyas kyi de nyid bsdus pa ste /
T02TD1401E:55a-30: dpa' bo'i phyag rgya sbyor ba dang //
T02TD1401E:55a-31: de ltar kha zas nyer bsten pa'i //
T02TD1401E:55a-32: dam tshig bzang po 'di yis ni //
T02TD1401E:55a-33: dngos grub phul du byed pa'o //
T02TD1401E:55a-34: bdag gi med cing yongs gzung med //
T02TD1401E:55a-35: kha na ma tho med lhun grub //
T02TD1401E:55a-36: sna tshogs las byung 'o mar bcas //
T02TD1401E:55a-37: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod //
T02TD1401E:55a-38: gnyis med ye shes sems kyis ni //
T02TD1401E:55a-39: rgyun du zhes bya ba ni bar chad med pa'o //
T02TD1401E:55a-40: de nyid kyis na sbyor bas rtag tu mchod ces so //
T02TD1401E:55a-41: bgegs med ces pa ni dam tshig spyod pas so //
T02TD1401E:55a-42: de ni phyag rgya chen pa'i dngos grub ji lta ba bzhin 'grub pas na /
T02TD1401E:55a-43: de ni gzhan du 'gyur ma yin //
T02TD1401E:55a-44: zhes bya ba nyan thos kyi byang chub la sogs par mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD1401E:55a-45: de yi pho nya gzhan bzang po //
T02TD1401E:55a-48: brtson par lhan cig ldan pa yin //
T02TD1401E:55b-0: zhes bya ba ni lhan cig de dang bcas @55b par 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD1401E:55b-1: gang gi phyir brtson par ldan zhes bya ba ni dngos grub pa la rjes su chags pa ste /
T02TD1401E:55b-2: ye shes dang ldan zhing nyams dga' ba rnam par 'byed pa de snyed nas /
T02TD1401E:55b-3: dpal he ru ka mnyam par sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor pas shin tu chags pa'i dga' ba'i longs spyod bya'o //
T02TD1401E:55b-5: zhes bya ba la rdzas ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bdud rtsi ste bcud kyis len no //
T02TD1401E:55b-6: dper na lha'i shing gis 'dod pa'i don gyi 'bras bu ster ba de bzhin du 'dir yang byang chub kyi sems kyi shing gis sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu ster ba'o //
T02TD1401E:55b-7: rnam 'byed bye brag gnyis su gsungs //
T02TD1401E:55b-8: spyod dang grol ba'i 'bras rab stsol //
T02TD1401E:55b-9: bla ma'i man ngag thob nas su //
T02TD1401E:55b-10: yang dag bsgom pa mngon par spro //
T02TD1401E:55b-11: rtag tu nus dang ldan pa yis //
T02TD1401E:55b-12: byang chub mchog ni bsgrub byas nas //
T02TD1401E:55b-13: tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas ni //
T02TD1401E:55b-15: de'i don zhes bya ba ni gang gi tshe brtsan 'grus dman par gyur pa rnams kyis /
T02TD1401E:55b-16: bla na med pa'i ye shes ma thob pa de'i tshe 'dod pa'i don gyi longs spyod thob cing sbyin bdag dang mnyam par 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
T02TD1401E:55b-17: dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel sgrub pa'i thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02TD1401E:55b-19: // / de nas zhes bya ba ni gsungs ma thag pa'i rjes la'o //
T02TD1401E:55b-20: gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni khyad par gyi mtshan nyid do //
T02TD1401E:55b-21: bstan pa zhes bya ba ni sngon du'o //
T02TD1401E:55b-22: de nas gzhan yang shes par bya //
T02TD1401E:55b-24: gang gis zhes bya ba ni mtshan nyid kyis so //
T02TD1401E:55b-25: shes 'gyur zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor can gyis so //
T02TD1401E:55b-26: dam tshig la gnas mkha' 'gro ma //
T02TD1401E:55b-27: zhes bya ba ni dam tshig las mi 'da' ba ste /
T02TD1401E:55b-28: sgrub pa po rnams la phan pa'i phyir /
T02TD1401E:55b-29: ma dang pha zhes bya ba la ma dang pha gang rnyed nas so //
T02TD1401E:55b-30: dang gi sgra ni lhan cig spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'o //
T02TD1401E:55b-31: bdag po nyid du zhes bya ba ni ye shes thob par ro //
T02TD1401E:55b-32: skad cig mthong zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid de /
T02TD1401E:55b-33: de dag gis de yongs su rdzogs pa ni so sor rang gis rig pa zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
T02TD1401E:55b-35: pha las thob pa'i bde ba gang //
T02TD1401E:56a-3: de yi bde ba bsam gtan brjod //
T02TD1401E:56a-5: lce sbom zhes bya ba la /
T02TD1401E:56a-6: bzhin 'phel che zhing nu rgyas ma //
T02TD1401E:56a-7: bzhin yang thung zhing skra yang thung //
T02TD1401E:56a-8: glang chen dri bro dregs pa ma //
T02TD1401E:56a-9: mdor bsdus nas ni rab tu bshad //
T02TD1401E:56a-10: lus po ring zhing bzhin yang ring //
T02TD1401E:56a-11: de bzhin lag pa rkang pa ring //
T02TD1401E:56a-12: nya yi dri bro khu ba 'bab //
T02TD1401E:56a-13: skye gnas ring zhing zla ba 'dra //
T02TD1401E:56a-14: mnyam zhing sngo bsangs nu ma mkhrang //
T02TD1401E:56a-15: yan lag chung zhing skra yang srab //
T02TD1401E:56a-16: skye gnas chung zhing skra yang rtsub //
T02TD1401E:56a-17: dal bar smra zhing sna mtho ma //
T02TD1401E:56a-18: mgrin pa ha cang ring ba min //
T02TD1401E:56a-20: lus las rtag tu rdul 'byung ba //
T02TD1401E:56a-21: shin tu dri zhim yid 'phrog ma //
T02TD1401E:56a-22: mig dang lta stongs ri dags 'dra //
T02TD1401E:56a-23: ri dags mgrin pa ri dags lto //
T02TD1401E:56a-24: ri dags rgyal po'i rked pa can //
T02TD1401E:56a-25: skal bzang padma'i dri dang ldan //
T02TD1401E:56a-26: de yi mig ni dmar ser la /
T02TD1401E:56a-27: zhes bya ba la dmar ser ni cung zad dmar ba ste /
T02TD1401E:56a-28: de bzhin lag pa rkang pa 'ang dmar //
T02TD1401E:56a-29: m'a li ka yi dri 'byung zhing //
T02TD1401E:56a-30: bde gshegs 'dus la dga' ba yi //
T02TD1401E:56a-31: bud med dngos grub ster bar byed //
T02TD1401E:56a-32: lus rgyas nu ma yang rgyas shing //
T02TD1401E:56a-33: skra ni 'khyil bar gyur pa dang //
T02TD1401E:56a-34: ngang pa'i 'gros can dal bar smra //
T02TD1401E:56a-35: shin tu ring min bzhin yang zlum //
T02TD1401E:56a-36: lte ba'i dbus su gnyer gsum ste //
T02TD1401E:56a-37: dbus nas 'phyang ba der shes bya //
T02TD1401E:56a-38: rtsub cing yan lag rtsub pa dang //
T02TD1401E:56a-39: lha sbyin lta bus gzhan la smod //
T02TD1401E:56a-40: skra ni 'khyil zhing kham par gnas //
T02TD1401E:56a-41: mdog ngan yan lag rtsub pa dang //
T02TD1401E:56a-42: skyes pa lta bur nu ma spangs //
T02TD1401E:56a-43: s'a la lta bu'i dri yang bro //
T02TD1401E:56a-45: rtag tu chang la dga' ba ste //
T02TD1401E:56a-46: dam tshig spyod pa phun sum tshogs //
T02TD1401E:56a-47: bsam pa rtogs la nan tan byed //
T02TD1401E:56a-48: khyad par can gyi dri zhi ma pa //
T02TD1401E:56a-49: chang gi rjes su 'gro ba ste //
T02TD1401E:56a-50: chang gi khyad par dag dang ni //
T02TD1401E:56a-51: chang gis shin tu myos pa dang //
T02TD1401E:56a-52: de bzhin khu ba mang po'o //
T02TD1401E:56a-53: dngos grub kun gyis thun mong du //
T02TD1401E:56a-54: zhes bya ba ni dge ba'i ba shes gnyen gyis khyad par rnyed nas thar pa'i don du thams cad rjes su 'gro ba'o //
T02TD1401E:56b-0: dran zhes bya ba ne 'di'i mtshan nyid rnams @56b so ;
T02TD1401E:56b-1: / yang dag ldan zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor ma'o //
T02TD1401E:56b-2: pho nya la sogs go 'phang bcas //
T02TD1401E:56b-3: zhes bya ba la go 'phang ni rab tu gnas zhes pa ste /
T02TD1401E:56b-4: yon tan gyi gnas zhes bya ba yin la de dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD1401E:56b-6: mkha' 'gro ma mchog nyi shu bzhi //
T02TD1401E:56b-7: zhes bya ba ste de rnams kyis ma lus pa rnams bsdus pa'o //
T02TD1401E:56b-8: gang gi phyir de rnams kyis 'jig rten gsum du khyab pa zhes bya ba ste /
T02TD1401E:56b-9: de dag rnyed nas mchod pa byas pas ni sgrub pa po la longs spyod dang grol ba'i 'bras bu rab tu stsol bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1401E:56b-10: rtsa ba'i sngags ni rtag tu zlos //
T02TD1401E:56b-11: zhes bya ba la lam ngan pa thams cad las yid skyob pas na sngags te //
T02TD1401E:56b-12: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes yin la /
T02TD1401E:56b-13: de rnam par dag pa'i sngags zlos pa'o //
T02TD1401E:56b-14: 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed pa //
T02TD1401E:56b-15: zhes bya ba la 'dod par bya bas 'dod pa ste /
T02TD1401E:56b-16: sems can thams cad kyi don byed pa rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i gzugs so //
T02TD1401E:56b-17: de'i sgrub pa po ste tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas nyid thob pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1401E:56b-18: de nyid kyis na sngags 'di las byung ba yin te zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1401E:56b-19: shin tu goms pa rnyed par 'gyur ba'o zhes bya ba'i don no //
T02TD1401E:56b-21: rgyu dang mi rgyu 'jig rten gsum //
T02TD1401E:56b-23: 'jig rten gsum ni yongs su dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ngo //
T02TD1401E:56b-24: rgyu ba ni sems can gyi 'jig rten no //
T02TD1401E:56b-25: mi rgyu ba ni snod kyi 'jig rten no //
T02TD1401E:56b-26: de'i tshe de dag lhan cig rdo rje 'dzin pa'i ror ro gcig ces bya'o //
T02TD1401E:56b-27: yang na 'jig rten gsum ni sku rdo rje la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1401E:56b-28: de rnams kyi rgyu pa zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems rdo rje ste /
T02TD1401E:56b-29: bde ba 'dod pas skyed pa'i phyir rgyu'o //
T02TD1401E:56b-30: mi rgyu ba ni de thob pa ste de dag lhan cig 'jug pa zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02TD1401E:56b-31: de su'i zhe na sgrub pa po ni zhes bya ba ste /
T02TD1401E:56b-32: gang gi phyir 'di sngags dang phyag rgya yang dag par ldan zhing dngos grub la brtson pa nyid do ;
T02TD1401E:56b-34: phyag rgya dang bral byin mi rlob //
T02TD1401E:56b-36: sku gsung thugs la 'debs pa ste //
T02TD1401E:56b-37: shes rab phyag rgyar rab tu brjod //
T02TD1401E:56b-38: de dang bral ba ni nyan thos ltar dad pa'i nor med pa'i phyir lus can de la sngags kyis byin gyis rlob par mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD1401E:57a-2: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes te /
T02TD1401E:57a-3: rdo rje 'dzin pa thob ces bya ba'i don no //
T02TD1401E:57a-5: shin tu sbyar bas rtogs par bya //
T02TD1401E:57a-7: yid gzhan du ma yengs pa ste shin tu brtson pas so //
T02TD1401E:57a-8: ji srid dro ba'i bya ba dag / ces bya ba la /
T02TD1401E:57a-9: dang po shes rab dro ba ste //
T02TD1401E:57a-10: gnyis pa du ba ldan par 'gyur //
T02TD1401E:57a-12: bzhi pa mar me ltar 'bar ba //
T02TD1401E:57a-13: lnga pa rtag tu snang ba ni //
T02TD1401E:57a-14: sprin med pa yin ma mkha' bzhin //
T02TD1401E:57a-15: don 'di nyid gsal bar gsungs pa //
T02TD1401E:57a-16: snang ba cung zad gsal ba ni //
T02TD1401E:57a-17: dro bar gyur ba zhes bya'o //
T02TD1401E:57a-18: ye shes kyi snang ba de nyid 'bring por gsal ba ni rtse mor gyur pa zhes bya'o //
T02TD1401E:57a-19: gang gi tshe phyi rol gyi don gsal nas ye shes kyi snang ba mched nas rnam pa rig pa tsam gyi gnas skabs su rtog pa'i tshogs las grol ba'i rgyun mi chad par 'od gsal ba ni bzod pa zhes bya'o //
T02TD1401E:57a-20: de nyid sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams mchog tu gyur pa ni chos kyi mchog ces bya ba'i don no //
T02TD1401E:57a-21: gang zhig sdang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rmongs shing sdig pa'i grogs po dang 'dus pas sun 'byin 'og tu phyogs pas mnar med par 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1401E:57a-22: rnal 'byor che mchog ces bya ba la /
T02TD1401E:57a-23: sogs pa la yul de yongs su brtags pa ste /
T02TD1401E:57a-24: zhes bya ba ni ci nas kyang de'i rtsa lag rnams kyang mchod par bya'o zhes bya ba'o //
T02TD1401E:57a-25: de rung ni zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa'i snying la gnas pa'o zhes bya ba'i don no //
T02TD1401E:57a-26: dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel sgrub pa'i thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02TD1401E:57a-28: // / de nas gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1401E:57a-29: he ru ka las gzhan pa ste //
T02TD1401E:57a-30: khro bo'i rgyal po gnod mdzes zhes bya ba'i don no //
T02TD1401E:57a-32: dgor pa ni dbyangs dang yi ge rnams go rims ji lta ba bzhin rgyas par byas pa'o //
T02TD1401E:57a-33: sa'i cha ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma byin pa'o //
T02TD1401E:57a-34: kun du 'gyur ba'i sa bon ni //
T02TD1401E:57a-35: yi ge h'um gi cha gzugs can //
T02TD1401E:57a-36: mi 'gyur ba ni bde ba ste //
T02TD1401E:57a-37: nam mkha' dang mnyam gnas med pa //
T02TD1401E:57a-38: de nas go cha bcings byas nas //
T02TD1401E:57b-0: thams @57b cad stong pa rten med pa //
T02TD1401E:57b-1: rdza rnga zhes bya'i yi ge gsum //
T02TD1401E:57b-2: sku gsung thugs kyi dbye bas sku gsum mo //
T02TD1401E:57b-3: rlung gis shin tu bskor ba yi //
T02TD1401E:57b-4: ri mo brgyad la yang dag brten //
T02TD1401E:57b-5: ri mo dgu pa dbus gnas pa //
T02TD1401E:57b-6: stong pa'i rnam pa dri med dgod //
T02TD1401E:57b-7: a'a li k'a li mnyam rgyas bya //
T02TD1401E:57b-8: dga' ba bzhi yi rang bzhin can //
T02TD1401E:57b-9: chos kyi rnga chen mi shigs pa //
T02TD1401E:57b-10: gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis pa //
T02TD1401E:57b-11: chos kyi yi ge yongs rdzogs pa //
T02TD1401E:57b-12: de nas grangs kyi nang song bas //
T02TD1401E:57b-13: chos bdag med pa yang dag bsten //
T02TD1401E:57b-14: zhal bzhi par ni rnam par grags //
T02TD1401E:57b-16: rlung la zhon nas spro byed cing //
T02TD1401E:57b-17: khams gsum pa ni yang dag sdud //
T02TD1401E:57b-18: rlung gi de nyid shin tu rig / rim bzhin 'byung dang ri ma min pa'i //
T02TD1401E:57b-19: a'a li k'a li las byung ba //
T02TD1401E:57b-20: rjod dang brjod bya'i yi ge ste //
T02TD1401E:57b-21: sgra brnyan lta bu'i rnam par rtog / re mig sum cu gnyis pa blang //
T02TD1401E:57b-22: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni ji lta ba bzhin te go sla'o //
T02TD1401E:57b-23: aom su mbha ni sumbha hum h'um phat /
T02TD1401E:57b-24: aom gri hna grihna hum h'um phat /
T02TD1401E:57b-25: aom grihn'a pa ya grihn'a pa ya hum h'um phat /
T02TD1401E:57b-26: aom a'a na ya ho bha ga b'an badzra r'a dza hum h'um phat /
T02TD1401E:57b-27: 'di ni khams gsum rnam rgyal zhes bya ba'o //
T02TD1401E:57b-28: sngags tshig bzhi yis rnam par brgyan //
T02TD1401E:57b-29: dkyil 'khor bsrung ba'i don du ni //
T02TD1401E:57b-30: gdug pa thams cad nges gnon pas //
T02TD1401E:57b-31: khro bo bzhi dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD1401E:57b-32: skad cig gi se ni sku brgyad 'gyur //
T02TD1401E:57b-33: zhes bya ba la sngags re re zhing sku gnyis gnyis spro bar bya ste /
T02TD1401E:57b-34: shin tu drag cing bgegs thams cad sel bar byed ba'i 'khor lo chen po'i khor yug gi mthar thug par khva'i gdong pa la sogs pa brgyad /
T02TD1401E:57b-35: zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis pa la zangs gri dang kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa 'od zer dmar po 'bar ba'i spyan gsum pa drag cing 'jigs par byed pa lang tsho la bab pa /
T02TD1401E:57b-36: gzhon zhing rnam par 'gyur ba'i zhal can stag gi pags pas rked pa dkris pa smad kyi cha phur bu'i rnam par rno zhing 'bar la bskal pa 'jig pa'i me dang 'dra bar 'od zer 'bar ba la gnas pa'o //
T02TD1401E:58a-0: de nas phyogs mtshams brgyad du bgegs kyi tshogs rnams dong gi nang du chud par byas la lugs su 'byung ba dang @58a * //
T02TD1401E:58a-1: lugs las bzlog bas khro bo'i phur bu rnams sngags 'dis dgod par bya ste /
T02TD1401E:58a-2: aom gha gha gh'a ta ya gh'a ta ya sarba dusht'am h'um phat /
T02TD1401E:58a-3: k'i la ya k'i la ya sarba p'a pam h'um phat /
T02TD1401E:58a-4: h'um h'um h'um badzra k'i la ya badzra dhar a'a dzny'a pa ya ti k'a ya b'aka tsitta badzra k'i la ya h'um phat khro bo'i lta bas nges par bltas la /
T02TD1401E:58a-5: rdo rje'i tho bas ba rdung bar bya'o //
T02TD1401E:58a-6: aom badzra mungga ra badzra k'i la ya /
T02TD1401E:58a-7: a'a lo ta ya h'um phat /
T02TD1401E:58a-8: yi ge bhr'um gyis bskyed pa'i 'khor lo la rdo rje gtum po dang /
T02TD1401E:58a-14: rdo rje stobs po che dang /
T02TD1401E:58a-16: de bzhin du gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba dang /
T02TD1401E:58a-17: 'og tu gnod mdzes rab tu grags /
T02TD1401E:58a-18: sdug bsngal ba dang kun 'byung ba dang 'gog ba dang lam dang zad pa dang /
T02TD1401E:58a-23: sgra ji bzhin pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa la khro bo bcu spro bar bya'o //
T02TD1401E:58a-24: dbus su ni rdo rje sems dpa' yongs su gyur pa las bdag nyid rdo rje h'um mdzad du bskyed par bya ste /
T02TD1401E:58a-25: mdog sngo zhing drag shul che ba /
T02TD1401E:58a-26: gzi brjid che zhing mche ba gtsigs pa dang bcas shing 'jigs par byed pa zhal g-yas dang g-yon pa ser po dang ljang gu dpa' bo dang mi sdug pa ljags 'dril ba'i zhal dang smin ma bsnyer ba'i khro gnyer gyis gtsigs pa ste /
T02TD1401E:58a-27: spyan ni dmar zhing zlum pa ste //
T02TD1401E:58a-28: khro bo 'bar ba'i phreng 'khyug drag / rdo rje h'um yig h'um mdzad pa //
T02TD1401E:58a-29: mi rus rgyan gyis rnam par bklubs //
T02TD1401E:58a-30: mgo yi me tog phreng ba can //
T02TD1401E:58a-31: sangs rgyas lnga ni spro ba'i bdag / phyag gnyis rdo rje dril bu dang //
T02TD1401E:58a-32: 'jig rten gsum rgyal phyag rgya bcings //
T02TD1401E:58a-33: shes rab dang ni snyoms 'jug pa //
T02TD1401E:58a-34: lhag ma'i phyag gis lcags kyu zhags //
T02TD1401E:58a-35: ral gri thod pa kha tv'am 'dzin //
T02TD1401E:58a-36: g-yas brkyang pa yis gdan la bzhugs //
T02TD1401E:58a-37: 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dag / zhabs kyi padma'i 'og tu byas //
T02TD1401E:58a-38: de'i shar gyi rtsibs la rdo rje gtum po ste /
T02TD1401E:58a-39: mdog sngo zhing g-yas pa dang /
T02TD1401E:58a-40: g-yon pa'i zhal ser po dang ljang gu /
T02TD1401E:58a-41: phyag g-yas na rdo rje dang tho ba dang sdigs mdzub po //
T02TD1401E:58b-0: g-yon na thod @58b dang kha tv'am ga phyag gnyis kyis rang dang 'dra ba'i shes rab la 'khyud pa'o //
T02TD1401E:58b-1: byang phyogs su ni nyi ma ste /
T02TD1401E:58b-2: mdog ser zhing zhal g-yas pa dang g-yon pa dag sngon po dang ljang gu rang dang 'dra ba'i shes rab la 'khyud cing /
T02TD1401E:58b-3: rdo rje dang dbyug pa dang thod pa dang kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD1401E:58b-4: nub phyogs su rdo rje gtsug tor te mdog dmar zhing g-yas pa dang g-yon pa dag dkar po dang ljang gu rang dang 'dra ba'i shes rab la 'khyud cing padma dmar po dang thod pa dang kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD1401E:58b-5: rdo rje 'khyil pa ni lho phyogs su ste /
T02TD1401E:58b-6: mdog ljang gu rang dang 'dra pa'i shes rab la 'khyud cing g-yas pa dang g-yon pa dag ser po dang dkar po /
T02TD1401E:58b-7: sna tshogs rdo rje thod pa dang kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD1401E:58b-8: me'i mtshams su rdo rje gnod spyin du ba'i mdog can g-yas pa dang g-yon pa dag ser po dang ljang gu mdzes shing rang gi shes rab ma la 'khyud pa dang /
T02TD1401E:58b-10: thod pa dang kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD1401E:58b-11: bden bral du ni rdo rje nag po mdog dmar zhing g-yas pa dang g-yon pa dag ser po dang ljang gu rang gi shes rab dang snyoms par zhugs pa dang /
T02TD1401E:58b-12: dgra sta dang thod pa dang kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD1401E:58b-13: rlung mtshams su ni rdo rje stobs po che mdog sngo zhing g-yas pa dang g-yon pa ser po dang ljang gu ste rang gi shes rab la snyoms par zhugs pa dang /
T02TD1401E:58b-14: mdung rtse gsum pa dang thod pa dang kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD1401E:58b-15: dbang ldan du ni rdo rje 'jigs byed mdog sngo zhing g-yas pa dang g-yon pa dag ser po dang ljang gu'i mdog rang gi shes rab ma la 'khyud cing ral gri dang thod pa dang kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD1401E:58b-16: steng du gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba ste /
T02TD1401E:58b-17: mdog dkar zhing g-yas pa dang g-yon pa dag sngon po dang ljang gu rang gi shes rab la 'khyud cing 'khor lo dang thod pa dang kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD1401E:58b-18: 'og tu ni gnod mdzes rdo rje ste /
T02TD1401E:58b-19: sngo zhing g-yas pa dang g-yon pa dag ser po dang ljang gu rang gi shes rab la 'khyud cing /
T02TD1401E:58b-20: rdo rje gtun shing dang klu'i zhags pa thogs nas sdigs mdzub byed pa'o //
T02TD1401E:58b-21: khro bo thams cad kyang sna tshogs padma dang nyi ma'i dbus su gyur pa'i 'jig rten skyong ba brgya da g-yas brkyang bas mnan nas bzhugs pa ste /
T02TD1401E:59a-6: rlung bdag dang dbang ldan gyi lha'o //
T02TD1401E:59a-7: steng du ni lha'i bdag po tshangs pa'o //
T02TD1401E:59a-8: 'og tu ni thags bzangs ris te /
T02TD1401E:59a-9: de dag gi snying gar lugs su 'byung ba dang lugs las bzlog pa dgod do //
T02TD1401E:59a-10: khro bo thams cad kyang skra kham pa gyen du 'bar zhing smin ma bsnyer ba'i khro gnyer rnam par gtsigs pa'i zhal can thung zhing gsus pa 'phyang ba spyan gsum ba dmar zhing zlum pa mgo bo'i phreng pas do shal byas shing mi rus kyi rgyan gyis bklubs pa /
T02TD1401E:59a-11: mtha' yas sngon po'i sbrul gyi spyi gtsug gi nor bu byas shing /
T02TD1401E:59a-12: 'jog po dmar po'i 'od bsgyings pas rna cha byas pa'o //
T02TD1401E:59a-13: padma dkar po do shal byas pas brgyan zhing /
T02TD1401E:59a-14: stobs kyi rgyu ljang gus ni mchod phyir thogs byas pa'o //
T02TD1401E:59a-15: dung skyong ser pos ni lag gdub byas pa'o //
T02TD1401E:59a-16: rigs ldan sna tshogs kyi mchog can ni dpung rgyan du yang dag par btags pa'o //
T02TD1401E:59a-17: padma dkar pos ske rags su byas pa'o //
T02TD1401E:59a-18: nor rgyas kyi bu mdog padma'i rtsa dang 'dra bas rkang gdub byas pa ste /
T02TD1401E:59a-19: skad cig tsam gyis sku dang gsung dang thugs brgyan zhing ;
T02TD1401E:59a-20: byang chub kyi sems kyi chus dbang bskur bas rang gi rigs las byung ba'i dbu rgyan can rdo rje 'bar ba'i 'od 'khrug cing drag po rang gi lus las rnam par spro ba nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor g-yogs pa /
T02TD1401E:59a-21: phyogs bcu'i mthar thug par khro bo 'bar ba'i rigs kyis 'khrug pa'o ;
T02TD1401E:59a-24: de nyid rig pas g-yon du bskor //
T02TD1401E:59a-25: lha rnams sems kyis brtan byas nas //
T02TD1401E:59a-26: de nas bgegs ni med par 'gyur //
T02TD1401E:59a-27: shin tu rnam dag de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD1401E:59a-28: 'di ni rnyed pa tsam gyis su //
T02TD1401E:59a-30: nyon mongs bdud dgra 'joms par byed //
T02TD1401E:59a-33: dpal ldan rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi //
T02TD1401E:59a-34: 'khor lor sbyor bdag rdza rngar bcas //
T02TD1401E:59a-35: bstan pa'i las rnams brtsam byas nas //
T02TD1401E:59b-1: / dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel sgrub pa'i thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u sum cu pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02TD1401E:59b-3: // / de nas sha chen thams cad kyi //
T02TD1401E:59b-4: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la thams cad ni zhe sdang la sogs pa nyon mongs pa rnams te /
T02TD1401E:59b-5: dam tshig rnams kyi mthus de rnams 'jigs par 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD1401E:59b-7: rdo rje skyes zhes bya ba ni rdo rje ni dbyer med pa'i ye shes so //
T02TD1401E:59b-8: de las skyes pa ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sku'o //
T02TD1401E:59b-9: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni 'di rnams te /
T02TD1401E:59b-10: gdug pa thams cad kyis zhes bya ba ni zhe sdang la sogs pa'i 'jigs byed mi bzad pa'o //
T02TD1401E:59b-11: rdo rje skyes zhes bya ba'i nye bar bsdus pa'o //
T02TD1401E:59b-12: 'di ltar khyi dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa bza' ba yang yin la sbyin sreg kyang yin pas na /
T02TD1401E:59b-13: bza' ba sbyin sreg gtor ma bya //
T02TD1401E:59b-15: rtog dang bral bas bya zhes bya ba ni rang gi rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD1401E:59b-16: de yang kha na ma thob med pa rnyed nas /
T02TD1401E:59b-17: rdo rje'i rnal 'byor can gyis bya ba ste /
T02TD1401E:59b-18: gzhan du na sems can la gnod pa byas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1401E:59b-20: sems can gnod pa tsam gyis ni //
T02TD1401E:59b-21: phyag rgya'i dngos grub thob mi 'gyur //
T02TD1401E:59b-22: rnam par mi rtog sems gang zhig / thab khung sgra ni rab tu grag / rnam dben me ni rab sbar la //
T02TD1401E:59b-23: ma lus rnam par rtog pa yis //
T02TD1401E:59b-24: sha dang sha chen spyin sreg bya //
T02TD1401E:59b-25: skye bo smad pa gang ci'ang rung //
T02TD1401E:59b-26: srog chags yan lag las byung dang //
T02TD1401E:59b-27: sna tshogs chang ni btung bar bya //
T02TD1401E:59b-29: ma lus pa ni 'jig rten gsum po'o //
T02TD1401E:59b-30: de dang de rnams su gang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa de ni lus pa med pa ste dngos grub ces bya ba'i don no //
T02TD1401E:59b-31: rgyal srid thams cad ces bya ba ni rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid do //
T02TD1401E:59b-32: dung dang nya phyis mu tig rnams //
T02TD1401E:59b-33: gsum char rgyu las byung yin na //
T02TD1401E:59b-34: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rgyu ni las mi dge ba rnams te de las yang dag par byung ba'o //
T02TD1401E:59b-35: des ni 'gro ba drug las mi'i 'gro ba bsod nams 'phags par ston te /
T02TD1401E:59b-37: chos kyi ye shes lus can gyi //
T02TD1401E:59b-38: thod pa la ni su zhig smod //
T02TD1401E:59b-40: smad par mi bya ba kho na'o zhes bya ba'i don no //
T02TD1401E:60a-1: ba'i las kyis skye ba 'bras bu dang bcas pa ni mi nyid de bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po las byung bas na shin tu rnyed par dka' ba'o //
T02TD1401E:60a-2: ye shes dang thar pa rab tu sgrub pas na /
T02TD1401E:60a-3: chos kyi dbyings kyi lus can gyi thod pa ste mi'i'o //
T02TD1401E:60a-4: gzugs mdzes yon tan gnas yin pas //
T02TD1401E:60a-5: phyag rgya lnga ni rab tu spras //
T02TD1401E:60a-6: rus phreng shin tu nges par ni //
T02TD1401E:60a-7: dag byed rgyan ni bzang po'o //
T02TD1401E:60a-10: dpa' bo rnams kyis dbang phyug bshad //
T02TD1401E:60a-12: brda zhes bya ba ni kla klo ste sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD1401E:60a-13: 'di ni dpa' bo'i gnas yin te //
T02TD1401E:60a-14: zhes bya ba la sangs rgyas lnga'i rang bzhin can 'byung ba lnga'i bdag nyid brtan pa dang g-yo ba'i 'gro ba ma lus pa sna tshogs pa rnams rtsa lnga'i rang bzhin las skyes pa'i bde ba'i bdag nyid ji lta bde bzhin du mngon par byang chub du yang dag pa'i don ston no //
T02TD1401E:60a-15: g-yon pa ni shes rab ste rang bzhin med pa'i ngo bo'o //
T02TD1401E:60a-16: de nyid kun rdzob pa yongs su dris pa ni chos rnams kyi gnyis su med pa'i de bzhin nyid nye bar mtshon par byed pa'o //
T02TD1401E:60a-17: mdza' ba thams cad 'dus pa zhes bya ba ni dpal he ru ka dang phag mo gnyis su med pa'i bde ba mngon par byang chub pa ni snying po la mngon par phyogs shing mya ngan las 'das pa la gzhol ba'o //
T02TD1401E:60a-19: rang nyid rdo rje 'dzin slob dpon //
T02TD1401E:60a-20: dpal ldan sangs rgyas kun gyi pha //
T02TD1401E:60a-21: rigs drug go rims ji bzhin du //
T02TD1401E:60a-22: lag pa g-yon par bkod de bzla //
T02TD1401E:60a-23: a'a li k'a li mnyam sbyar la //
T02TD1401E:60a-24: sde tshan grangs kyi go rims bzhin //
T02TD1401E:60a-28: srin lag ni tha ltag go //
T02TD1401E:60a-29: tha ma ni mthe chung ngo //
T02TD1401E:60a-30: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02TD1401E:60a-31: dpa' bo zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa'o //
T02TD1401E:60a-32: gang du gnas pa'i sngags kyi yi ge de nyid kyi rigs kyi ming nas 'bod cing /
T02TD1401E:60a-33: de'i sbyor bas byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD1401E:60a-34: kye che ge mo rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o //
T02TD1401E:60a-35: de la rigs kyi go rims ni 'di yin no //
T02TD1401E:60a-36: aa a'a ka tsa ta ta pa ya sha zhes bya ba 'di rnams ni rnam par snang mdzad rgyal po sde tshan gyi yi ge dgu'i bdag nyid do //
T02TD1401E:60b-0: ai a'i kha @60b tsha tha tha pha ra sha ni sde tshan gnyis pa ste rin chen rgyal po'o //
T02TD1401E:60b-1: au a'u ga dza da da ba la sa ni sde tshan gsum pa ste 'od dpag med kyi'o //
T02TD1401E:60b-2: ae aee gha dzha dha dha bha ha'i sde tshan ni bzhi pa ste don yod pa'i'o //
T02TD1401E:60b-3: ao aoo aam aa: nga nya na na ma'i sde tshan ni mi bskyod pa'i ste lnga pa'i'o //
T02TD1401E:60b-4: de ltar de dag ni 'jig rten thams cad skye ba dang 'jig pa dang gnas pa'o //
T02TD1401E:60b-5: des sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bdag po'i rdo rje'i ming dang rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du sbyar bar bya ste /
T02TD1401E:60b-6: drug pa rdo rje sems dpa' ni cod pan no //
T02TD1401E:60b-8: rgyu la 'bras bus rgyas btab cing //
T02TD1401E:60b-9: 'bras bu la yang rgyu rgyas gdab //
T02TD1401E:60b-14: rdo rje rtag pa rnams ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi rigs kyi ming ngo //
T02TD1401E:60b-15: shes rab myu gu'i rdo rje dang /
T02TD1401E:60b-16: rdo rje myu gu'i rdo rje dang /
T02TD1401E:60b-17: mchog tu dga' ba'i rdo rje dang /
T02TD1401E:60b-18: bde bar dga' ba'i rdo rje dang /
T02TD1401E:60b-19: 'bebs pa'i rdo rje rnams ni las kyi rigs kyi ming ngo //
T02TD1401E:60b-20: rdo rje bde ba'i myu gu dang /
T02TD1401E:60b-22: rdo rje padma'i myu gu dang /
T02TD1401E:60b-23: dga' ba'i rdo rje rnams ni rin po che'i rigs kyi ming ngo //
T02TD1401E:60b-25: yid bzhin nor bu rdo rje dang /
T02TD1401E:60b-26: yan lag med pa'i rdo rje dang /
T02TD1401E:60b-27: spyan ras gzigs rdo rje rnams ni padma'i rigs kyi ming ngo ;
T02TD1401E:60b-28: / bde ba chen po'i rdo rje dang /
T02TD1401E:60b-31: shes rab kyi rdo rje dang /
T02TD1401E:60b-32: pha rol tu phyin pa'i rdo rje rnams ni zhe sdang gi rigs kyi ming du gyur pa ste /
T02TD1401E:60b-33: phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub kyi bde ba can gyi zhing du byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
T02TD1401E:60b-34: de bzhin du 'di dag kyang phyag rgya chen po'i ming du gyur pa ste /
T02TD1401E:60b-37: rdo rje ae ma bde dang /
T02TD1401E:60b-38: rdo rje bdag med ma dang /
T02TD1401E:60b-39: rdo rje'i spyan te de rnams ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi rigs can no //
T02TD1401E:60b-42: rdo rje phreng ba ma dang /
T02TD1401E:60b-43: rdo rje mdza' ma rnams ni rin po che'i rigs can ma'i ming ngo //
T02TD1401E:60b-46: rdo rje do shal ma dang /
T02TD1401E:60b-47: rdo rje phreng ba ma dang /
T02TD1401E:60b-48: rdo rje bzhad ma rnams ni padma'i rigs can ma'i ming ngo //
T02TD1401E:61a-0: rdo rje rgod ma rnams ni las kyi @61a * //
T02TD1401E:61a-4: rdo rje phreng ba ma dang /
T02TD1401E:61a-6: rdo rje blo gros ma dang /
T02TD1401E:61a-7: rdo rje kong ka ma dang /
T02TD1401E:61a-8: rdo rje la la n'a dang /
T02TD1401E:61a-10: rdo rje lag pa rnams ni zhe sdang gi rigs can ma'i phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub kyi ming ngo //
T02TD1401E:61a-11: 'di dag ni lag tu dgod par bya ste /
T02TD1401E:61a-12: g-yon pa shes rab las byung ba //
T02TD1401E:61a-13: 'gro ba skyed byed rgyu yin te //
T02TD1401E:61a-14: rtsa lnga 'byung ba lnga dag gsungs //
T02TD1401E:61a-15: sa ni spyan zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1401E:61a-20: dar ma ste de rnams su legs par gnas pa'o //
T02TD1401E:61a-21: pha rol tu phyin pa ni bzhi'o //
T02TD1401E:61a-24: chos kyi skye gnas bde 'dzin ma //
T02TD1401E:61a-25: gang zhig dngos med nyid shes rab //
T02TD1401E:61a-26: dngos po'i mtshan nyid 'dir thabs so //
T02TD1401E:61a-29: he ru ka yi thugs rje'o //
T02TD1401E:61a-30: des na thabs ni skyes bur brjod //
T02TD1401E:61a-31: stong pa bud med gzugs rnams la //
T02TD1401E:61a-32: bsam med lhun gyis grub pa yis //
T02TD1401E:61a-33: 'dod chags chos ni rten byed pa //
T02TD1401E:61a-34: de yi de la brten bzhin pas //
T02TD1401E:61a-35: mngal 'dzin pa las blang bar bya //
T02TD1401E:61a-36: mdun du rdo rje 'dzin gnyis pas //
T02TD1401E:61a-37: de yi cho ga sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1401E:61a-38: dpa' po dam pa mchod par bya //
T02TD1401E:61a-39: mchod pa sna tshogs nyer bsdus pas //
T02TD1401E:61a-40: de nas rjes su gnang ba sbyin //
T02TD1401E:61a-41: byang chub snying po mthar thug par //
T02TD1401E:61a-42: phyogs kyi 'khor lo ma lus kun //
T02TD1401E:61a-43: chos kyi 'khor lo bla med pa //
T02TD1401E:61a-44: sems can mchog la yang dag bskor //
T02TD1401E:61a-45: shes rab thabs dag rigs pa yis //
T02TD1401E:61a-46: yid bzhin nor bu ji lta bar //
T02TD1401E:61a-47: zhum pa'i 'dus pa yongs spangs nas /
T02TD1401E:61a-48: deng nas brtsams te 'gro don gyis //
T02TD1401E:61a-49: dbang bskur thob cing rjes gnang ba'i //
T02TD1401E:61a-50: bya ba byas pa rab dga' bas //
T02TD1401E:61a-51: 'gro kun dga' bar byed pa ni //
T02TD1401E:61a-52: 'jam pa'i tshig gis smra bar bya //
T02TD1401E:61a-53: deng du bdag tshe 'bras bur bcas //
T02TD1401E:61a-54: mi yi gson pa 'bras bu yod //
T02TD1401E:61a-55: de ring bdag gis bdag nyid rig / de ring bdag gis bde longs spyad //
T02TD1401E:61b-0: mkha' 'gro mas gsungs bsam mi @61b khyab ;
T02TD1401E:61b-1: / rgyud ni de ring bdag gis rnyed //
T02TD1401E:61b-2: de ring bdag la lha mnyes shing //
T02TD1401E:61b-3: de ring bdag gis dngos grub ldan //
T02TD1401E:61b-4: de ring sangs rgyas rigs su skyes //
T02TD1401E:61b-5: sangs rgyas sras por deng bdag gyur //
T02TD1401E:61b-6: slob ma'i bya ba yongs rdzogs nas //
T02TD1401E:61b-7: rgyab tu zhes bya ba ni phyi nas te /
T02TD1401E:61b-8: gshegs su gsol bar bya ba ni /
T02TD1401E:61b-13: gar dang mchod pa rnams kyis /
T02TD1401E:61b-14: de ltar nye bar bsdu ba nas /
T02TD1401E:61b-15: lhan cig zas la brtsam par bya //
T02TD1401E:61b-16: zhes bya ba ni 'di nyid du dbang bskur ba rnams dang lhan cig tu'o //
T02TD1401E:61b-17: 'di ni mi bshad ces bya ba ni yang dag par sbyin pa shin tu sba ba'o //
T02TD1401E:61b-19: dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor bas //
T02TD1401E:61b-20: mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde mchog yin //
T02TD1401E:61b-22: dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel sgrub pa'i thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u sum cu rtsa gcig pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02TD1401E:61b-24: // / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
T02TD1401E:61b-25: sbyin sreg bza' bca' 'dus pa yi //
T02TD1401E:61b-27: las gang gis ni sems can rnams //
T02TD1401E:61b-29: thabs chen rnams dang ldan pa la //
T02TD1401E:61b-31: phyugs zhes bya ba ni bong bu la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1401E:61b-32: sangs rgyas lnga'i rnam par dag pa yin la /
T02TD1401E:61b-33: de dag kha na ma tho ba med par bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD1401E:61b-34: mi rnams ji ltar phyugs yin zhe na /
T02TD1401E:61b-35: rigs rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD1401E:61b-36: phyugs kyi sgras ni dam pa bzung bas na /
T02TD1401E:61b-37: rigs rnams las rigs kyi mchog phyugs bzung ste /
T02TD1401E:61b-38: yon tan thams cad ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1401E:61b-39: sngar bstan rim pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1401E:61b-40: skye ba bdun pa shin tu mtshon pa'o //
T02TD1401E:61b-41: yang na thun mong ba ste nad kyis ma myos shing shu ba dang mdze la sogs pa dang bral ba thob pa'o //
T02TD1401E:61b-42: yang na sngar bstan zhes bya ba ni lag pa'i brda ji ltar bstan pa de'i bya bas so //
T02TD1401E:61b-43: gnas dang nye gnas zhing rnams su //
T02TD1401E:61b-44: dngos grub sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor ni //
T02TD1401E:61b-45: 'khor chen mdun du bdar byas la //
T02TD1401E:61b-46: gus par byas te bzung byas nas //
T02TD1401E:62a-0: he ru ka dpal sbyor ba'i @62a * //
T02TD1401E:62a-1: bdag / tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor grub par 'gyur //
T02TD1401E:62a-2: krishna shva na'i thug pa ni //
T02TD1401E:62a-3: ma sha 'bras ni nag po ldan //
T02TD1401E:62a-4: zhes bya ba ni ro langs chen po bsgrub par bya ba'i don du /
T02TD1401E:62a-5: dang por ting nge 'dzin dang mchod pa rnam pa lnga la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de snying po'i sngags 'bum bzlas la /
T02TD1401E:62a-6: phyi nas sgrub pa brtsam par bya'o //
T02TD1401E:62a-8: rma med cing ma nyams pa gzugs mdzes pa rnyed nas mar ngo'i tshes brgyad dang bcu bzhi la /
T02TD1401E:62a-9: dben pa'i yul phyogs su song nas ri'i rtse mo 'am dur khrod du /
T02TD1401E:62a-10: dur khrod kyi rdzas thams cad kyi phye mas rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ste /
T02TD1401E:62a-11: gru ba zhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02TD1401E:62a-12: ka ba brgyad dang rta babs ldan //
T02TD1401E:62a-13: dbus su 'dab brgyad bris byas te //
T02TD1401E:62a-14: kha dog sna tshogs nyi mas mtshan //
T02TD1401E:62a-15: de nas sgrub pa'i grogs mchog snying stobs can dang lhan cig tu bsgrub par bya ste /
T02TD1401E:62a-16: me tog dang bdug pa chal du bkram zhing rgyal mtshan gyis mdzes par mchod pa dang gtor ma rab tu rgyas par byas la dri'i chu bdud rtsi lnga dang bcas pas ro bkru bar byas la /
T02TD1401E:62a-17: til mar chen pos byugs la yi dags kyi me tog gis mchod par bya'o //
T02TD1401E:62a-18: bum pa gcig gam brgyad khrag dang zhag dang shas dgang bar bya'o //
T02TD1401E:62a-19: dur khrod kyi ras kyis mgrin pa dkri bar bya ste /
T02TD1401E:62a-20: zhag dang khrag la sogs pa'i lha bshos dang sre mong gi lus phye mar byas pa gu gul chen po dang bcas pa'i bdug pa dang /
T02TD1401E:62a-21: yam shing aarka'i bal gyi sdong pu la ra tshil gyis lan bdun byugs la til mar chen pos thod par me sbar ba'i du bas de'i mig byugs la /
T02TD1401E:62a-22: go cha gnyis kyis bsrung ba dang phur bu dang ra ba'i bsam gtan ji lta ba bzhin 'dir yang byas nas dril bu dang cang te'u'i sgra dang yi ge h'um gi sgras brjod par bya ste /
T02TD1401E:62a-23: zan dang ma sha'i sran thug dang /
T02TD1401E:62a-24: khrag dang bcas pa'i gtor ma yi dags rnams la sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD1401E:62a-25: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su mgo shar du bzhag nas de'i snying gar dpa' bo kha shar du bltas te 'dug la g-yon logs su aarka'i snod bzhag go //
T02TD1401E:62b-0: gzhan yang khyi nag po'i @62b 'o ma'am /
T02TD1401E:62b-1: ba nag po'i 'o ma bdud rtsi lnga dang bsres pa ma sha nag po dang 'bras dang bcas pa'i thug pa zhag dang sha dang khrag dang bcas pa dur khrod kyi kham phor du thod pa'i steng du legs par bzhag nas de'i kha cung zad phye la /
T02TD1401E:62b-2: shing la sogs pas me sbar ba mchog ster bar mngon par phyogs par bya'o //
T02TD1401E:62b-3: de nas de'i snying gar dpal he ru ka'i bka'i 'khor lo bsgoms la snying po'i sngags kyis brgya rtsa brgyad dam brgyad brgya sbyin sreg bya zhing /
T02TD1401E:62b-4: dpal he ru ka dang phag mo'i mkha' 'gro ma bye ba snyed kyis ha ha zhes cher bzhad pas bskor zhing ce spyang bye bas bskor ram /
T02TD1401E:62b-5: phyogs bcur sdigs par byed dam /
T02TD1401E:62b-6: srin po'i tshogs rnams 'jigs pa'i sgra dbyangs sgrogs pa dag mthong yang 'jigs par mi bya ste /
T02TD1401E:62b-7: brtson 'grus brtan pos mnyam par gzhag par bya zhing g-yas phyogs su sgrub pa'i grogs bzhag la /
T02TD1401E:62b-8: dril bu gsil zhing phyag na rdo rje'i dbang byed par bya'o //
T02TD1401E:62b-9: bdug pas rgyun mi 'chad par bdugs na /
T02TD1401E:62b-10: de nas ro de langs nas ni //
T02TD1401E:62b-11: ci bgyi zhes ni smra bar 'gyur //
T02TD1401E:62b-12: de la aargha sbyin byas la //
T02TD1401E:62b-13: kye legs so dpa' bo chen po //
T02TD1401E:62b-14: rdo rje sems dpa' brtul zhugs bzang //
T02TD1401E:62b-15: grub pa bdag ste bde legs kyi //
T02TD1401E:62b-16: dngos grub bdag la rab tu stsol //
T02TD1401E:62b-17: sgrub po yid la gang 'dod pa'i //
T02TD1401E:62b-18: gcig sbyin nas ni rang gnas 'gro //
T02TD1401E:62b-19: dpa' bo srin po'i 'khor gyis bskor //
T02TD1401E:62b-20: sgrub pa po ni dpal dang ldan //
T02TD1401E:62b-21: de yi skad cig de la ni //
T02TD1401E:62b-23: lha yi lus su'ang de 'gyur te //
T02TD1401E:62b-24: 'dod pa'i gzugs can dpa' bo che //
T02TD1401E:62b-25: 'jig rten gsum po ma lus na //
T02TD1401E:62b-26: skal bzang de bzhin gshegs pa 'dra //
T02TD1401E:62b-27: nam mkha'i khams bzhin rgas pa dang //
T02TD1401E:62b-28: 'chi ba dag ni rnam par spangs //
T02TD1401E:62b-30: srid pa kun du rnam par rgyu //
T02TD1401E:62b-31: lci ba'i thal ba nyid dag dang //
T02TD1401E:62b-32: lhag ma mgo skam mtshon cha'o //
T02TD1401E:62b-33: zhes bya ba ni bskyed pa'i rim pa brten pa'i rnam par bshad pa ste /
T02TD1401E:62b-36: mgo bo skam zhes bya ba ni me'o //
T02TD1401E:62b-37: mtshon cha zhes bya ba ni rlung ste /
T02TD1401E:63a-0: de dag ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i dkyil @63a * //
T02TD1401E:63a-2: ri chen po'i ngo bor bya zhes bya ba ri'i rgyal po lhun po'o //
T02TD1401E:63a-3: de la rim pa 'di yin te /
T02TD1401E:63a-4: yi ge yom yongs su gyur pa las rlung gi dkyil 'khor sngon po gzhu lta bu la ba dan gyis mtshan pa yam gis byin gyis brlabs pa ste /
T02TD1401E:63a-5: rngams su ni dpag tshad sa ya drug 'bum grangs med pa'o //
T02TD1401E:63a-6: de'i steng du ni yi ge ram yongs su gyur pa las me'i dkyil 'khor gyi mchog gru gsum mdog dmar po 'bar bas mtshan pa 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrug par bsam zhing nyi ma bye ba lta bur gsal ba ste /
T02TD1401E:63a-7: rngams su stong phrag gsum dang brgya phrag phyed dang bzhi'o /
T02TD1401E:63a-8: chur ni rngams su stong phrag nyi shu dang bcu gcig lhag pa'o //
T02TD1401E:63a-9: me'i steng du yi ge bam las yang dag par byung ba'i chu ste /
T02TD1401E:63a-10: gsal zhing kha ba lta bu /
T02TD1401E:63a-11: bum pa dkar pos mtshan pa zlum po 'od kyi phreng ba can no //
T02TD1401E:63a-12: de'i steng du yi ge lam yongs su gyur pa las gser gyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa dpangs su 'bum phrag brgyad pa zheng du 'bum phrag bcu gnyis pa'i sa'i dkyil 'khor te phyis lhag ma'ang gser du 'gyur ba ste /
T02TD1401E:63a-13: de la yi ge kham yig rtse gsum pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje'o //
T02TD1401E:63a-14: sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba la yi ge sum las byung ba'i ri rab ste /
T02TD1401E:63a-15: dpangs su brgyad cu rtsa bzhi la gru bzhi pa rin po che sna bzhi'i rang bzhin /
T02TD1401E:63a-16: steng gi cha la gdugs lta bu'i rnam pa can /
T02TD1401E:63a-17: rgyar stong phrag brgyad cu pa'o //
T02TD1401E:63a-18: de'i shar gyi phyogs su ni yi ge aa yongs su gyur pa las shar gyi lus 'phags te /
T02TD1401E:63a-19: zheng du dpag tshad brgyad stong /
T02TD1401E:63a-20: chung ni dgu stong zla ba phyed pa'i rnam pa can no //
T02TD1401E:63a-21: byang phyogs su ni yi ge ai yongs su gyur pa las sgra mi snyan te chu dang zheng du stong phrag bcu pa la gru bzhi pa /
T02TD1401E:63a-22: nub phyogs su ni yi ge au yongs su gyur pa las ba lang spyod chu dang zheng du dpag tshad dgu stong zla ba yongs su rdzogs pa lta bu'i rnam pa can no //
T02TD1401E:63a-23: lho phyogs su ni yi ge ae yongs su gyur pa las 'jam bu'i gling ste /
T02TD1401E:63a-24: chu dang zhing du dpag tshad bdun stong pa byang phyogs yangs la lho phyogs zhum pa'i rnam pa'o //
T02TD1401E:63a-25: de dag gi ngos kyi phyogs gnyis gnyis su yang shar dang lho dang nub dang byang rnams su yang /
T02TD1401E:63b-2: yi ge de dag gis lus dang lus 'phags /
T02TD1401E:63b-3: rnga yab dang rnga yab gzhan /
T02TD1401E:63b-5: sgra mi snyan dang sgra mi snyan gyi zla ste /
T02TD1401E:63b-6: gling phran brgyad po de dag re re zhing yang gling lnga brgyas yongs su bskor ba'o //
T02TD1401E:63b-7: de'i steng du yi ge ram yongs su gyur pa las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD1401E:63b-8: de'i steng du yi ge h'um yongs su gyur pa las sna tshogs rdo rje /
T02TD1401E:63b-9: de'i lte ba la yang h'um ste de las rdo rje phur bu dang ra ba bsams la /
T02TD1401E:63b-10: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi 'khor lo'i bsam gtan bya'o //
T02TD1401E:63b-11: h'um mdzad yongs su gyur pa las kun du bzang po'o //
T02TD1401E:63b-12: de las srid pa gsum gyi bye brag gi chos kyi 'byung gnas gru gsum pa la dkar po gyen du 'greng ba la nang gi nam mkha'i rang bzhin du padma dmar po la yi ge bhr'um dang 'khor lo yongs su gyur pa las rnam par snang mdzad ser po zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa la ral pa dang cod pan dar gyis mtshan pa g-yas na 'khor lo dang cang te'u /
T02TD1401E:63b-13: g-yon na dril bu dang thod pas brgyan pa'i kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa /
T02TD1401E:63b-14: g-yas brkyang ba'i gnas pas bzhugs pa gshin rje ma sngon mo la 'khyud pa'o //
T02TD1401E:63b-15: gshin rje sngon mo yang zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa ste /
T02TD1401E:63b-16: g-yas pa cang te'u dang zangs gri thogs pa /
T02TD1401E:63b-20: skra grol zhing gcer bu phyag rgya lngas brgyan ba'o //
T02TD1401E:63b-21: de ltar rnam par snang mdzad rig ma dang bcas pa las byung ba ri rab kyi rtse mo'i gzhal yas khang bsam par bya ste /
T02TD1401E:63b-22: nam mkha' ltar yangs shing rin po che sna lnga'i rang bzhin can bzang po ste /
T02TD1401E:63b-23: gru bzhi pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa rdo rje'i ka ba tva ra na dang bcas pa dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa dang dang dang me tog gi phreng ba 'phyang ba chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa rgyu mthun pa rdo rje'i skud pas brgyan pa'o //
T02TD1401E:64a-0: de'i dbus su a'a li k'a li de'i steng du h'um dang aam gnyis las rdo rje dang zangs gri de dag gi lte ba la yang sa bon de rnams yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje sems dpa' zhal gsum pa phyag drug pa ston ka'i nam mkha' ltar 'od dri ma med cing zla ba bye ba ltar gsal bar 'dzin pa zhal g-yas pa dang g-yon pa sngo ba dang dmar po rdo rje dril bu bsnams @64a * //
T02TD1401E:64a-2: phyag g-yas na cang te'u dang tshangs pa'i mgo //
T02TD1401E:64a-3: g-yon pa na thod pa dang kha tv'am ga thogs ba spyi gtsug tu mi bskyod pas brgyan pa'o //
T02TD1401E:64a-4: sngags pa'i lte bar bsam bya ba //
T02TD1401E:64a-5: dbus su rlung dang de bzhin me //
T02TD1401E:64a-6: de dbus a'a li k'a li ste //
T02TD1401E:64a-7: de dbus stong pa'i ri mo'o //
T02TD1401E:64a-8: bde ba chen por yang dag sbyar //
T02TD1401E:64a-9: gnyis med gnyis su med pa'i mchog / sgra yis bskul ba byas pa yis //
T02TD1401E:64a-10: sems can thams cad 'ong gyur nas //
T02TD1401E:64a-11: sangs rgyas rjes chags sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1401E:64a-12: sems can khams ni rnam par sbyangs //
T02TD1401E:64a-13: bde ba las byung dkyil 'khor te //
T02TD1401E:64a-14: bhr'um aam hrim ho h'um hi //
T02TD1401E:64a-15: de nas sems rgyun dbang bskur la //
T02TD1401E:64a-16: ai yig sa bon gyis dbyung bya //
T02TD1401E:64a-19: padma gar gyi dbang phyug dang /
T02TD1401E:64a-22: de bzhin du he ru ka'o //
T02TD1401E:64a-23: aom h'um aam aa kham ham /
T02TD1401E:64a-26: de bzhin du phrag dog dang /
T02TD1401E:64a-30: l'am m'am p'am t'am zhes bya ba'i sa bon ni /
T02TD1401E:64a-35: aom a'a: h'um zhes bya bas 'gro ba gsum gyi lus ngag yid gsum rdzogs par bya'o //
T02TD1401E:64a-36: phung po dang skye mched dang khams rnams ni zhal gcig pa dang /
T02TD1401E:64a-37: phyag gnyis pa la sogs pa ji ltar 'dod pa'i gzugs su bsam gtan gyis 'gro ba gsum po ma lus par rdzogs par bya'o //
T02TD1401E:64a-38: de nas nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor du /
T02TD1401E:64a-39: aom a'a: h'um zhes bya ba'i yi ge ho: dmar po gnyis dang spel pa dri za'i sems can lta bu nam mkha'i phyogs nas smon lam gyi sems kyis yi ge lnga bkug ste /
T02TD1401E:64a-40: snying gar zhugs nas thabs dang shes rab rjes su chags pas bskyed pa'i 'dod chags chen pos me sbar bas padmar sku gnyis zhu bar gyur te ;
T02TD1401E:64a-41: nam mkha' ltar dri ma med cing 'byung ba thams cad kyi gnas chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi gzugs brnyan lta bur gyur pa'o //
T02TD1401E:64a-42: de'i rjes la thog ma med pa'i dus nas goms pa'i smon lam gyi sems bskyed pa'i byams pa chen po dang /
T02TD1401E:64b-0: dga' ba dang btang snyoms kyi @64b rang bzhin de'i 'od zer las spros pa'i lha mo spyan rab tu rgyas pa dang ldan pa nam mkha'i gzugs brnyan lta bu rnams glu 'di yis mgon po skul bar byed pa ni /
T02TD1401E:64b-1: kye srid gsum bde ba khyod 'dir bzhengs /
T02TD1401E:64b-2: aa la la la la ho //
T02TD1401E:64b-3: padma'i gnas ni mthong mdzod la //
T02TD1401E:64b-4: rdo rje 'dzin rgyal bde ba che //
T02TD1401E:64b-5: rgyal ba yi ni sdom pa mdzod //
T02TD1401E:64b-6: aa la la la la ho //
T02TD1401E:64b-7: khyod ni snyong pa kun gyi mchog / bde gshegs snying po mthong mdzod la //
T02TD1401E:64b-8: mdzes ma dang dus bde ba ni //
T02TD1401E:64b-9: srid pa gsum na snying po'o //
T02TD1401E:64b-10: aa la la la la ho //
T02TD1401E:64b-11: bde ba'i bdag po thong thong thong //
T02TD1401E:64b-12: rgyal ba'i bdag po chos sku ho //
T02TD1401E:64b-13: zhes bya ba'i glus bskul ma thag tu /
T02TD1401E:64b-14: yi ge h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje snying po'i ste /
T02TD1401E:64b-15: mngal nas skyes pa'i rim pa'o zhes pa'o //
T02TD1401E:64b-16: yang na rus sbal dag gi'o //
T02TD1401E:64b-17: zhes bya ba las rus sbal ni sgo nga las skyes pa'o //
T02TD1401E:64b-18: de'i rim pa ni skad cig tsam gyis rnal 'byor gyi lha'i rnam pa bsgom par bya ba thogs pa med pa'i ye shes 'byung ba rtsom pa med cing rgyun chad pa med pa'i snying rje chen po'i thabs dang shes rab kyi phyag rgya chen po'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni rus sbal zhes bya ste /
T02TD1401E:64b-19: mi 'gyur bar nges pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1401E:64b-20: phyag bzhi pa dang zhal bzhi pa //
T02TD1401E:64b-21: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rim pa gnyis ka la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD1401E:64b-22: sku mdog dkar po zhes bya ba la ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'i khyad par cho ga bzhin du shes par byas la /
T02TD1401E:64b-23: lha thams cad bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1401E:64b-24: dngos grub 'dod pas dngos grub phyir //
T02TD1401E:64b-25: skad cig tsam yang gzhan sems skyes //
T02TD1401E:64b-26: mkhas pas 'bad de gnas mi bya //
T02TD1401E:64b-27: de lta'i yon tan khyad par gyis //
T02TD1401E:64b-28: rnal 'byor pa ni thams cad kyis //
T02TD1401E:64b-30: dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel sgrub thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02TD1401E:64b-32: // / de nas zhes bya ba ni thams cad shes par byas nas so //
T02TD1401E:64b-33: sbyor ba kun gyi dam pa ni //
T02TD1401E:64b-34: bde ba'i mchog ste phyag rgya ni //
T02TD1401E:64b-35: dngos grub kyi ni thabs chen po //
T02TD1401E:64b-36: mkha' 'gro dra ba'i sdom pa yin //
T02TD1401E:64b-37: de bas na sgrub pa po'i sgrub thabs mchog med de /
T02TD1401E:64b-38: bsod nams chen po sogs pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1401E:65a-1: kyi dkyil 'khor brtsam par bya ste /
T02TD1401E:65a-2: 'phags pa lha'i zhal snga nas kyi spyod pa bsdus pa'i sgron ma las /
T02TD1401E:65a-3: ji skad gsungs pa bzhin no //
T02TD1401E:65a-4: bza' ba dang bca' ba la sogs pa ni sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
T02TD1401E:65a-5: de nas pho nya rab sbyin zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rang gi phang ba la ni rang gi yan lag go //
T02TD1401E:65a-6: dpa' bo gnyis med mchod par bya //
T02TD1401E:65a-7: zhes bya ba la dpa' bo rnams spyin par bya ba'o //
T02TD1401E:65a-8: ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'am zhes bya ba ni gang zhig skal ba dang ldan par gyur pa ste /
T02TD1401E:65a-9: gzhan du na ma dag par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1401E:65a-10: de dag thams cad ni bdag nyid mchod pa'i phyir gzhag pa'o //
T02TD1401E:65a-11: bcings pa las ni grol bar bya //
T02TD1401E:65a-12: zhes bya ba ni bag chags las grol bar bya ba'i don du ste /
T02TD1401E:65a-13: bag chags spangs pa las grol bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD1401E:65a-14: slob dpon lus su legs gnas te //
T02TD1401E:65a-15: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rdo rje 'dzin pa'i skur dmigs nas thams cad byas la /
T02TD1401E:65a-16: phyi nas dpa' bo'i dpa' mo kun spyad par bya ste /
T02TD1401E:65a-17: snang ba med pa las langs nas zung du 'jug pa'i 'byung ba'i rim pas sangs rgyas kyi sku mngon sum du byas nas rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi yon tan thams cad kyis brgyan nas gnas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1401E:65a-18: sa 'og 'gro ba'am zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sems can gyi don du gang cung zad zhi ba la sogs pa yid la ci 'dod pa de dag thams cad sgrub po'i bka' tsam gyis 'grub par the tshom med pa'o //
T02TD1401E:65a-19: dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel sgrub thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02TD1401E:65a-21: // / de nas mkha' 'gro ma'i dra ba'i //
T02TD1401E:65a-22: 'khor lo'i cho ga rgyas pa ste //
T02TD1401E:65a-23: zhes bya ba la ji ltar bstan pa'i 'khrul 'khor dang sngags kyi rab tu sbyor ba /
T02TD1401E:65a-24: de dag thams cad bsgrubs pas grub par the tshom med do //
T02TD1401E:65a-25: sgrub thabs yid la brten pa ste /
T02TD1401E:65a-26: aa ba dh'u t'i'i gnas rnyed pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1401E:65a-28: dpa' bo kun dang rnal 'byor ma //
T02TD1401E:65a-29: padma'i lte bar nges par sbyar //
T02TD1401E:65a-30: zhes bya ba la lte ba ni lte ba'i padma'i snying po'i ste der nges par spyar ba'o //
T02TD1401E:65a-31: rnam par rtog pa'i sdig bskyod pas na aa ba dh'u t'i'i ste /
T02TD1401E:65b-0: me 'bar ba'i gzugs @65b can yin la /
T02TD1401E:65b-1: de'i bdag po yang aa ba dh'u t'i'i zhes brjod do //
T02TD1401E:65b-2: de'i gnas ni rab tu gnas pa ste /
T02TD1401E:65b-3: rten pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD1401E:65b-4: de yis rnal 'byor pa la yang de bzhin du gsungs so //
T02TD1401E:65b-5: gang du zhe na smin ma'i bar du zhes bya ba ste /
T02TD1401E:65b-6: zla ba dang padma'i bar du a'a li'i ri mo bcu drug gis bskor ba'o //
T02TD1401E:65b-7: dpa' bo 'chol pa'i zhal du zhes bya ba la /
T02TD1401E:65b-8: 'chol pa ni 'jigs su rung ba ste bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du'o //
T02TD1401E:65b-9: rgyu des na me lha zhes bya ba dbyangs yig dang po'i rang bzhin las langs pa'i me lha la bsreg par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD1401E:65b-10: 'di dag ces bya ba ni rdzas 'di dag gis so //
T02TD1401E:65b-11: bsreg bya lnga zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga rnam par dag pa rnams kyis so //
T02TD1401E:65b-12: bsreg bya dgu zhes bya ba ni re re zhing ste /
T02TD1401E:65b-13: bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i sbyin sreg bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD1401E:65b-14: de nas 'bar phreng rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i rab tu 'bar ba dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD1401E:65b-15: bsam zhes bya ba ni sngags pas so //
T02TD1401E:65b-16: de ci zhig bya zhe na /
T02TD1401E:65b-18: kun nas sgo zhes bya ba ni khams gsum ma lus pa'i dkyil 'khor te rang byung ba'i lhag pa'i lha'o //
T02TD1401E:65b-19: dpa' bo'i dpa' bo zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rang gi lhag pa'i lha'i sbyor bas so //
T02TD1401E:65b-20: dpa' bo'i gnas zhes bya ba ni gzhal yas khang dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD1401E:65b-21: 'dab ma la pho nya ma bzhi'o zhes bya ba ni lte ba'i padma'i 'dab ma bzhi la mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa bzhi'o //
T02TD1401E:65b-22: 'khor los sgyur ba'i dpa' bo dang //
T02TD1401E:65b-23: gnyis med par ni ci bde bar //
T02TD1401E:65b-24: khanda ro ha phyi rol sbyin //
T02TD1401E:65b-25: zhes bya ba ni ji ltar 'dod par bsgoms nas de la lhag par mos pas sbyin sreg bya'o zhes bya'o //
T02TD1401E:65b-26: phyi rol pa gang zhe na khva'i gdong pa la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1401E:65b-27: gang gi gzugs kyis she na /
T02TD1401E:65b-28: rang gi gzugs su zhes bya ba ste /
T02TD1401E:65b-29: ji lta ba'i gzhal yas khang gi sgo dang /
T02TD1401E:65b-30: mtshams bzhir sngags pas de'i gzugs su blta ba'o //
T02TD1401E:65b-31: bstan par bya zhes bya ba ni bsgom pa'o //
T02TD1401E:65b-35: dngos grub thams cad sgrub byed yin //
T02TD1401E:66a-0: zhes bya ba la ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i padma dkar po la mtshan ma'i sa bon @66a * //
T02TD1401E:66a-1: gyi thig le'i nang du khams gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi sems kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom pa ni /
T02TD1401E:66a-2: 'od zer bye bas rab brgyan cing //
T02TD1401E:66a-3: sangs rgyas sprin gyis rab tu 'khrigs //
T02TD1401E:66a-4: thig le'i rnal 'byor bsdus byas pa //
T02TD1401E:66a-5: phra mo'i rnal 'byor rnam par bsgom //
T02TD1401E:66a-6: rigs kyi rim pa'i mtshan ma'i nang du h'um las gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor nam mkha'i ngos ltar yangs pa rgyal ba'i rin po che'i gnas bde ba chen po shin tu phra ba'i rdul phra rab bsags pa ye shes kyi 'od zer gyi phreng ba las rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sku mtha' yas pas ma lus pa'i sems can rnams rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i dam tshig gi byin gyis brlabs pa srog dang rtsol ba rab tu bsdams shing /
T02TD1401E:66a-7: sems shin tu brtan par bzung ba na /
T02TD1401E:66a-8: zhag bdun gyis 'dar ba dang bskyod pa dang 'bebs pa dang g-yo ba dang 'phar ba dang mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ba la the tshom med do //
T02TD1401E:66a-10: rdo rje snying po snying rje che //
T02TD1401E:66a-11: rig pa'i rgya mtsho zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02TD1401E:66a-12: de'i le'u dang por 'khor lo bstan pa de 'dir yang de bzhin du the tshom mi bya'o //
T02TD1401E:66a-13: pho nya gnyis med sbyor ba'i bdag / ces bya ba ni shin tu rnyed par dka' ba'i sngags kyi gzhung rnyed nas bzlas brjod dang bsgom pa dang mngon par ldan pa de ni 'dir gdon mi za bar grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya'o //
T02TD1401E:66a-14: dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel sgrub thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u sum cu rtsa bzhi pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02TD1401E:66a-16: // / de nas las kyi rab mchog ni //
T02TD1401E:66a-17: ji bzhin ram gyis mtshon ba ste //
T02TD1401E:66a-18: zhes bya ba la rim ni yongs su brgyud pa ste /
T02TD1401E:66a-19: bla ma gcig nas gcig tu 'ongs pa'i gzhung lugs nyams pa med par bya ba'i don to //
T02TD1401E:66a-20: mchod pa gnyis med sbyor ba'i bdag / ces bya ba ni gnyis su med pa'i mchod pa ste /
T02TD1401E:66a-21: thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'o //
T02TD1401E:66a-22: de'i sbyor ba'i bdag nyid kyi sngags pas las kyi mchog bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
T02TD1401E:66a-23: las ni so sor sbyor bar bya //
T02TD1401E:66a-24: zhes bya ba ni zhi ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1401E:66a-25: gang 'grub par byed pa'i sngags zhes bya ba ni sde tshan brgyad do //
T02TD1401E:66a-26: de yi dbye ba rim ji bzhin //
T02TD1401E:66b-0: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la yi ge ni dbyangs yig dang gsal byed sum cu rtsa gsum @66b mo ;
T02TD1401E:66b-1: / pho nya ni rtsa'i rang bzhin gyi rnal 'byor ma'o //
T02TD1401E:66b-2: sogs pa'i sgras ni dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi bzung ste /
T02TD1401E:66b-4: mda' yi shugs kyis yongs su 'khor //
T02TD1401E:66b-5: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la mda' ni rlung ste /
T02TD1401E:66b-6: de'i shugs kyis 'gro ba yin la des 'khor ba ste /
T02TD1401E:66b-7: 'gro ba dang 'ong bar nges par 'jug pa'o //
T02TD1401E:66b-8: phan tshun 'dus pa'i sngags ni zhes bya ba ni a'a li k'a li dag 'dus pa ste 'dus pa'o //
T02TD1401E:66b-9: yul nyid kyis ni phye ba'o //
T02TD1401E:66b-10: zhes bya ba ni snying ga dang mgrin pa dang lte ba dang mgo ste de rnams su dgod pa'o //
T02TD1401E:66b-11: sa bon phreng bde dag zin //
T02TD1401E:66b-12: h'um ni mtha' ru gnas pa yin //
T02TD1401E:66b-13: zhes bya ba la gang du 'gugs shing gzhug pa la yi ge h'um gnas pa'o //
T02TD1401E:66b-14: de la don ni 'di yin te /
T02TD1401E:66b-15: g-yon pa dang g-yas pa'i ngos gnyis su /
T02TD1401E:66b-16: dbyangs yig bcu gnyis kha gyen du bltas par dgod do //
T02TD1401E:66b-17: 'og tu bltas pa ni yi ge ka la sogs pa phreng ba gnyis te de'i dbus su chud par bya'o //
T02TD1401E:66b-19: g-yon dang g-yas kyi ngos gnyis su //
T02TD1401E:66b-20: dbyangs yig bcu gnyis gnas pa ste //
T02TD1401E:66b-21: steng du bltas par yang dag bshad //
T02TD1401E:66b-22: ka la sogs pa mngon par spel //
T02TD1401E:66b-24: bsgrub bya 'gog par gyur na ni //
T02TD1401E:66b-25: 'gog pa ni rgyu ba gnyis rnam par bcings pa'o //
T02TD1401E:66b-26: bsgrub bya zhes bya ba dngos grub tu gyur pa ste /
T02TD1401E:66b-27: rten med pa'i bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD1401E:66b-30: rlung gis 'gro ba med pa'i phyir 'gro bar bya ba'i yul mi srid pa ste /
T02TD1401E:66b-31: de dang de nyid rang bzhin gyis ro gcig tu gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1401E:66b-32: kha sbyor sbyar bar gyur pa dang //
T02TD1401E:66b-33: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1401E:66b-34: kha sbyor sbyar bar gyur pa ni //
T02TD1401E:66b-35: zla ba nyi mar rnam par bshad //
T02TD1401E:66b-36: g-yon dang g-yas kyi ngos gnyis su //
T02TD1401E:66b-37: rdo rje lu gu rgyud bcings pa //
T02TD1401E:66b-38: steng gi sgo ru rtag gnas pa'i //
T02TD1401E:66b-39: snang byed 'bar ba'i phreng ba can ;
T02TD1401E:66b-40: / rnam par grol ba'i lam gyi tshogs su rgyun gyi mchog tu dga' ba sbyor ba ni kha sbyor ro //
T02TD1401E:66b-41: yang na lag pa gnyis kun du 'khyud pa ni /
T02TD1401E:66b-42: rdo rje lu gu rgyud bcings brjod //
T02TD1401E:66b-43: thabs dang shes rab mnyam sbyor ba //
T02TD1401E:66b-44: kha sbyor zhes ni bshad pa yin //
T02TD1401E:66b-45: rdo rje dbye ba nyid dang ni //
T02TD1401E:67a-5: sgro chun sprang rtsir byed par bshad //
T02TD1401E:67a-7: bde dang dga' ba'i rang bzhin gyis //
T02TD1401E:67a-8: zhags pa padmar bcug pa ste //
T02TD1401E:67a-9: 'dod la chags pa'i lcags kyu yis ;
T02TD1401E:67a-10: / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgug / mi 'khrug 'khrug byed rdo rje ste //
T02TD1401E:67a-11: de ni gtun shing rab tu grags //
T02TD1401E:67a-12: bza' ba rdo rje 'debs pa la //
T02TD1401E:67a-14: dbugs la mda' ni sbyar byas te //
T02TD1401E:67a-15: zhes bya ba la mda' ni sgra'o //
T02TD1401E:67a-16: yan lag kha tv'am ga dang sbyar //
T02TD1401E:67a-17: zhes bya ba la kha tv'am ga ni lha'i sku ste /
T02TD1401E:67a-18: nam mkha' lta bu'i yan lag pas na kha tv'am ga'o //
T02TD1401E:67a-19: thod pa'i mchod yon snod du ni //
T02TD1401E:67a-20: zhal du mchod yon nges par sbyar //
T02TD1401E:67a-22: sngags pas lte bar bsam bya ba //
T02TD1401E:67a-23: rlung gi dbus su me'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD1401E:67a-24: de steng sna tshogs padma dang //
T02TD1401E:67a-25: de steng thod pa byang chub kyi //
T02TD1401E:67a-26: ye shes bdud rtsis yongs bkang ba'o //
T02TD1401E:67a-27: de dbus a'a li k'a li dang //
T02TD1401E:67a-28: ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin can //
T02TD1401E:67a-29: h'um yig gis ni byin brlabs la //
T02TD1401E:67a-30: bdag nyid bam las rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor bas zhi ba dang /
T02TD1401E:67a-31: snying rje'i go 'phang can ston ka'i nam mkha' ltar dri ma med pa zla ba ltar 'od zer gyi phreng ba du ma 'phro ba /
T02TD1401E:67a-32: bdud bzhi zhabs kyis mnan pa phag mo dang gnyis su med pa'i bde ba chen po'o //
T02TD1401E:67a-33: spyi bo'i zla ba'i steng du mi shigs pa /
T02TD1401E:67a-34: aa ta sa'i me tog ltar shin tu sngo ba las ba'i 'o ma'i rgyun nyin dang mtshan du 'bab pa'o //
T02TD1401E:67a-36: zla ba nyi mas brgyan pa ste //
T02TD1401E:67a-37: lte ba'i dbus su de bsam bya //
T02TD1401E:67a-38: rlung gi dbus su me dkyil 'khor //
T02TD1401E:67a-39: lus med par ni mi lta ste //
T02TD1401E:67a-40: rab tu zhi ba'i yid kyis sbyar //
T02TD1401E:67a-41: yang mgo bor yi ge lam las dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor la klu she sha n'a ga'i lhag ma bde ba chen po'i gzugs can gdengs ka gsum gyis mdzes pa'o ;
T02TD1401E:67a-42: / thig les bar brgyan pa las char pa'i rgyun ltar 'bab par bsam mo //
T02TD1401E:67a-43: yi ge ai ni bdud rtsi'i rgyun //
T02TD1401E:67a-44: mig gnyis su ni dgod par bshad //
T02TD1401E:67a-45: kunda zla ba dkar dang mtshungs //
T02TD1401E:67a-46: dbang po'i mtshon chas brgyan pa'o //
T02TD1401E:67a-47: steng du sprin gyis g-yogs bya ba //
T02TD1401E:67a-48: 'brug dang glog gis brgyan pa ni //
T02TD1401E:67b-0: @67b nam mkha'i dbus su khyab par bsam //
T02TD1401E:67b-1: bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun rab 'bab pas //
T02TD1401E:67b-2: grong khyer mthar ni zhi bar byed //
T02TD1401E:67b-3: bsgrub bya'i steng du 'dug bsams na //
T02TD1401E:67b-4: dug dang tsha ba'i rims la sogs //
T02TD1401E:67b-5: bsam gtan tsam gyis spel bar byed //
T02TD1401E:67b-6: dkyil 'khor dbus chud kha dog dbyibs //
T02TD1401E:67b-7: gang zhig rtag tu bsam byas na //
T02TD1401E:67b-8: de yi tshe ni zad 'gyur na'ang //
